quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.quote: A poet's mission is to make words do more work than they normally do, to make them work on more than one level.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Rhymes are dynamic, voice is titanic, gigantic, suckers get frantic, and then panic. A smooth talker, â€˜cause I'm a Queens New Yorker, My rhymes bring more Good Times than Jimmie Walker.
quotes.author: Kool G. Rap

quotes.quote: It's bad poetry executed by people that can't sing. That's my definition of Rap.
quotes.author: Peter Steele

quotes.quote: I didn't have nothin' going for me, school, home, until I found something I loved, which was music, and that changed everything.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I start to think, and then I sink into the paper, like I was ink. When I'm writing I'm trapped in between the lines, I escape when I finish the rhyme. I got soul.
quotes.author: Rakim

quotes.quote: It's deep-rooted, the music of being young and dumb, it's never muted, in fact, it's much louder where I'm from.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm gonna change the world, but I guarantee that I will spark the brain that will change the world.
quotes.author: 2Pac

quotes.quote: Got a freaky, freaky, freaky-freaky flow, control the mic like Fidel Castro.
quotes.author: Jeru Tha Damaja

quotes.quote: When you're a little kid, you don't see color, and the fact that my friends were black never crossed my mind. It never became an issue until I was a teenager and started trying to rap.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Rap is hardcore street music but there are women out there who can hang with the best male rappers. What holds us back is that girls tend to rap in these high, squeaky voices. It's irritating. You've gotta rap from the diaphragm.
quotes.author: Cheryl James

quotes.quote: My take on rap is driven by straightforward American southern rock and blues.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.quote: The business of hip hop is probably the most tangible example of the genre's dramatic maturation.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: My whole thing is to inspire, to better people, to better myself forever in this thing that we call rap, this thing that we call hip hop.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: Street's disciple, my raps are trifle. I shoot slugs from my brain just like a rifle.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: A digital sound sample in angry rap doesn't correspond to the graffiti but the wall.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: My earliest memories of rap music was mixed with my earliest memories of reggae music. They were big sounds around the way, heavy bass lines, strong messages, definitely.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: Big up to Flex. Stop taking so much cizock in his mizouth.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: It ain't no fun if the homies can't have none.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.quote: In rap music, even though the element of poetry is very strong, so is the element of the drum, the implication of the dance. Without the beat, its commercial value would certainly be more tenuous.
quotes.author: Archie Shepp

quotes.quote: Rap is a gimmick, but I'm for the hip-hop, the culture.
quotes.author: Method Man

quotes.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: That perfect bliss and sole felicity, the sweet fruition of an earthly crown.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: We're so engaged in doing things to achieve purposes of outer value that we forget that the inner value, the rapture that is associated with being alive, is what it's all about.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: We ought to dance with rapture that we might be alive... and part of the living, incarnate cosmos.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A beauty is not suddenly in a circle. It comes with rapture. A great deal of beauty is rapture. A circle is a necessity. Otherwise you would see no one. We each have our circle.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Illustrious acts high raptures do infuse, And every conqueror creates a muse.
quotes.author: Edmund Waller

quotes.quote: Occasionally in life there are those moments of unutterable fulfillment which cannot be completely explained by those symbols called words. Their meanings can only be articulated by the inaudible language of the heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Laughter is complete rapture vocalized.
quotes.author: Allison Kearney

quotes.quote: Ecstasies enjoyed by religious mystics are usually called religious experiences no matter what the nature of the ecstasy or the trigger inducing it.
quotes.author: L. A. Michael

quotes.quote: We reach ecstasy by a contestation of knowledge. Were I to stop at ecstasy and grasp it, in the end I would define it.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: For every rapture there is a price and nothing is sustained forever. The path that destiny takes in the end leads to a balance of payments. No one remains overdrawn forever. Destiny's bank is inexorable, all accounts must balance.
quotes.author: Dorothy Fuldheim

quotes.quote: Sit in a room and readâ€“and read and read. And read the right books by the right people. Your mind is brought onto that level, and you have a nice, mild, slow-burning rapture all the time.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Real elation is when you feel you could touch a star without standing on tiptoe.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: There is no rapture in the love which is prompted by esteem; such affection is lasting, not passionate.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is the moment of exaltation from wholeness!
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The glow of inspiration warms us; it is a holy rapture.
quotes.author: Publius Ovidius NasoOvid

quotes.quote: Rapture's self is three parts sorrow.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: A kiss is but a little sweetness, Leaping the road to rapture.
quotes.author: Philip Moeller

quotes.quote: A lie will easily get you out of a scrape, and yet, strangely and beautifully, rapture possesses you when you have taken the scrape and left out the lie.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Montague

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like jumping off a really tall building. Your brain tells you it is not a good idea, but your heart tells you, you can fly.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.
quotes.author: Sharon Draper

quotes.quote: A certain feeling comes from throwing your good life away, and it is one part rapture.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The purest joy for the human spirit and the sheerest delight for man's heart are the rapture of the spirit contained within the love of God.
quotes.author: Said Nursi

quotes.quote: Words are coin. Words alienate. Language is no medium for desire. Desire is rapture, not exchange.
quotes.author: J. M. Coetzee

quotes.quote: The rapture of pursuing is the prize the vanquished gain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Beauty is an expression of that rapture of being alive.
quotes.author: BILL MOYERS

quotes.quote: Life's sharpest rapture is surcease of pain.
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: Art is a kind of rapture. Surrender enough, you find truth.
quotes.author: Kirsty Eagar

quotes.quote: The highest ecstasy is the attention at its fullest.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: I am rare, and there is value in all rarity; therefore, I am valuable.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime.
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.quote: It's rare for anyone to value the opinions of a teenage girl.
quotes.author: Billie Eilish

quotes.quote: It is a very rare man who does not victimize the helpless.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: It's a rare moment when we take a break from the tribulations of the daily rat race to reflect on assumptions and values that we casually accept as gospel.
quotes.author: Graydon Carter

quotes.quote: It is a rare privilege to watch the birth, growth, and first feeble struggles of a living mind; this privilege is mine.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.quote: It is rare that one can see in a little boy the promise of a man, but one can almost always see in a little girl the threat of a woman.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: It's a rare man who can stand being around an intelligent woman, let alone married to her.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: It's a rare person who wants to hear what he doesn't want to hear.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: The rare pleasure of being seen for what one is, compensates for the misery of being it.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: It was so rare to find someone who was both so young and so wise, both so fresh and so jaded.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Rare is the man who seeks not only to heal himself but to heal his fellow man.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: It is rare for people to be asked the question which puts them squarely in front of themselves
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: It is a rare life that remains orderly even in private.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Rare is the man who suffers no remorse as he passes from the state of confidant to that of rival.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Rare is the human being, immature or mature, who has never felt an impulse to pretend he is some one or something else.
quotes.author: George Pierce Baker

quotes.quote: It's the rare book that's able to transport you in a way that a movie does.
quotes.author: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.quote: It is rare to find learned men who are clean, do not stink and have a sense of humour.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: It's a rare opportunity when you can do something for the greater good.
quotes.author: Scott Borchetta

quotes.quote: One rare and exceptional deed is worth far more than a thousand commonplace ones.
quotes.author: Saint Ignatius

quotes.quote: In those rare individual cases where women approach genius they also approach masculinity.
quotes.author: Otto Weininger

quotes.quote: It's a rare gift to understand that your life is wondrous, and that it won't last forever.
quotes.author: Steven Galloway

quotes.quote: These rare senses and powers of reasoning were given to be used freely, but not audaciously, to discover, not to pervert the truth.
quotes.author: William John Wills

quotes.quote: It's rare to find women who have that balance between work and life, who are really psyched for another woman's success.
quotes.author: Dana Fox

quotes.quote: It is a rare and difficult attainment to grow old gracefully and happily.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: It is very rare or almost impossible that an event can be negative from all points of view.
quotes.author: Brie Larson

quotes.quote: It is a rare piece of legislation indeed where there is so much agreement about the goals.
quotes.author: Mike Pence

quotes.quote: Suddenly, as rare things will, it vanished.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: It's a rare reader who doesn't go to the novel looking for a kind of encouragement to live.
quotes.author: Norman Rush

quotes.quote: Excellent things are rare.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Rarity gives a charm; so early fruits and winter roses are the most prized; and coyness sets off an extravagant mistress, while the door always open tempts no suitor.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Very rare, the intelligence of the heart. The intelligence of the whimsical brain is less rare, less attaching, sometimes tedious
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Make your company a rarity, and people will value it. Men despise what they can easily have.
quotes.author: James Burgh

quotes.quote: Our uniqueness is what makes us rare, and what makes us rare is our value to the marketplace.
quotes.author: Shannon Tanner

quotes.quote: The rare individual who has learned to govern himself is too fed up with the labor of it to want to govern anybody else.
quotes.author: Henry S Haskins

quotes.quote: Rare indeed, is the relationship in which the other is not cultivated for what one can get for oneself.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Rare is the man who seeks not only to heal himself but to heal his fellow man.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: It is very rare or almost impossible that an event can be negative from all points of view.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
quotes.author: Louisa Thomsen Brits

quotes.quote: Rare indulgence produces greater pleasure.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: The rare pleasure of being seen for what one is, compensates for the misery of being it.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: Kindness is no common virtue. It is a rare gift.
quotes.author: David Samuels

quotes.quote: It is a rare and difficult attainment to grow old gracefully and happily.
quotes.author: Lydia Maria Francis

quotes.quote: It is a rare and high privilege to be in a position to help people understand the differences that they can make not only in their own lives but in the lives of others by simply giving of themselves.
quotes.author: Helen Boosalis

quotes.quote: Its a rare thing to know one completly to the core and stil love him.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Rare is the person who can weigh the faults of others without putting his thumb on the scales.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To be really great in little things, to be truly noble and heroic in the insipid details of everyday life, is a virtue so rare as to be worthy of canonization
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher-Stowe

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are, and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: The Rastafari identity can serve as a radical challenge to oppression because it demands that reform begin with oneself.
quotes.author: Charles Price

quotes.quote: There are as many kinds of Rastas as the reeds that grow on the riverbank. There's the baldhead Rasta, like me. There's the white Rasta, like you. There's the rootical Rasta...There's Congo Dread and Coptic Dread. But it all stem from the same thing, and it all go through the same place, the heart, you know.
quotes.author: Gerald Hausman

quotes.quote: What is it about this movement--developing in the slums of West Kingston, Jamaica--that makes it so appealing to people of very different nationalities, ethnic backgrounds, socioeconomic standings, and academic interests?
quotes.author: Nathaniel Samuel Murrell

quotes.quote: To many, dreadlocks are a symbol of defiance against 'Babylon', to others a way of manifesting individual, personal choice and being different from the mainstream aesthetic norms, whilst to others they are simply the natural way of wearing ones hair according to biblical scripture.
quotes.author: Katrin Hansing

quotes.quote: Any interpretation of the significance of Rastafari must begin with the understanding that it is a conscious attempt by the African soul to free itself from the alienating fetters of colonialism and its contemporary legacies.
quotes.author: Ennis B. Edmonds

quotes.quote: Rasta psychology is...resistance and liberation psychology--the sum total of the organized and spontaneous campaign against racist subjection, fired by the burning desire to be free from all forms of social, economic, and political dimination.
quotes.author: Clinton Hutton

quotes.quote: Rasta is a concept, Rasta is a religion, Rasta is a faith, Rasta is you. You make yourself to be a Rasta. And in order to be a Rasta, you have to seek first the Kingdom of God, and all things shall be added.
quotes.author: Brother Yendi

quotes.quote: Rastafarianism is the first mass movement among West Indians preoccupied with the task of looking into themselves and asking the fundamental question, Who am I? or What am I?
quotes.author: Dennis Forsythe

quotes.quote: Above my bed, Bob's face I saw, my daddy looking at me so passionately, little brother. Well, in his eyes I saw the truth, mommy, the truth of a Rastaman, the truth of a iyaman.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: For if one days its coffee, the next day it may be tea, but if there is nothing at all, ALMIGHTY, I-n-I will still give thanks to Thee.
quotes.author: Robert Athlyi Rogers

quotes.quote: JAH would never give the power to a baldhead. Run some crucify the dread. Time alone, oh! time will tell. Think you're in heaven, but you living in hell.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: It is not only war that can stop war but men of goodwill, conscious of their mission can deal with such deadly enemy.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Everyone will someday be judged for what they do, and Jah is the only judge.
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality . Wake Up and Live!
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: This world was not created piecemeal. Africa was born no later and no earlier than any other geographical area on this globe. Africans, no more and no less than other men, possess all human attributes, talents and deficiencies, virtues and faults.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie I

quotes.quote: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Life and Jah are one in the same. Jah is the gift of existence. I am in some way eternal, I will never be duplicated. The singularity of every man and woman is Jah's gift. What we struggle to make of it is our sole gift to Jah. The process of what that struggle becomes, in time, the truth.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The more people smoke herb, the more Babylon fall.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Rastafarianism isn't recognized my the prison service, shall I register you as null religion.
quotes.author: Maureen Chadwick

quotes.quote: A Rasta is someone who has been elected and who is making his calling and election sure to enter, holy Zion!
quotes.author: Empress Yuajah

quotes.quote: Not every Rasta knows he is Rasta yet, but eventually he will have no choice but to know.
quotes.author: Empress Yuajah

quotes.quote: Born Rasta's have spiritually inherited the values and beliefs of what it means to be Rastafari. In Rastafari we value respect and show love.
quotes.author: Empress Yuajah

quotes.quote: Rastafari is a spiritual way of life, not a religion. We don't have hard and fast rules, we don't try to convert others, and we certainly don't believe anybody should die because they don't believe the same thing we do.
quotes.author: Empress Yuajah

quotes.quote: Rastafarians are pro-life. We believe all life is valuable at all times. There are no exceptions to this rule, ever!
quotes.author: Empress Yuajah

quotes.quote: Rastafari is a way of life that acknowledges Jah is some very specific, special and spiritual ways.
quotes.author: Empress

quotes.quote: To embrace Rastafari is a blessing. Convert to Rastafari is my way of sharing this blessing of my faith, with those who want to embrace it too. The more Rastafari minded individuals we have on the earth, the better the world will be.
quotes.author: Empress

quotes.quote: A Rasta is a person who loves and respects, and is spiritually aware of, the earth, himself, King Selassie I, Jah, and Jah creations.
quotes.author: Empress

quotes.quote: A rat is neither good nor evil. It does what a rat has to do.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.quote: The same rain that drowns the rat will grow the hay.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: Despite all my rage I am still just a rat in the cage.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: Better to share a house with rats than with a dissatisfied lover.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: I don't like rats any more than the next bloke, but they ain't wicked and cruel like people can be. They're just ratty in their habits.
quotes.author: Philip Pulman

quotes.quote: Besides, rats survived so well because they were rats. They knew when to keep quiet and they knew when to squeal.
quotes.author: Danielle Bennett

quotes.quote: And you know what happens when a ship gets too many rats on board? It sinks. That's what.I wondered if a ship had ever really sunk that way.
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: By gnawing through a dike, even a rat may drown a nation.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: You learned the two greatest things in life, never rat on your friends, and always keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: Rats have a sense of humor. Rats, in fact think the world is very funny. And they are right, dear reader. They are right.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: Beware of driving men to desperation. Even a cornered rat is dangerous.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Surely what a man does when he is taken off guard is the best evidence for what sort of man he is. If there are rats in a cellar, you are most likely to see them if you go in very suddenly. But the suddenness does not create the rats; it only prevents them from hiding. In the same way the suddenness of the provocation does not make me ill tempered; it only shows me what an ill-tempered man I am.
quotes.author: C.S.L

quotes.quote: it annoys me a bit how people like squirrels but not rats. at the end of the day they're the same thing, except that squirrels have had a better upbringing.
quotes.author: Karl Pikington

quotes.quote: So much of writing is discovery. Sometimes I feel like a rat in a maze, trying to discover the way out. My little heart is beating, and I'm racing down a path thinking, this is the route, it will get me there, as I turn this way and then that.
quotes.author: Will Hobbs

quotes.quote: A rotten carcass of a boat, not rigged, Nor tackle, sail, nor mast; the very rats Instinctively have quit it.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You're this rat in the American maze, working your way towards the cheese, which is a job.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: Our environments shape the way we see ourselves. If you have been condemned to live in an area that is pretty evidently a rat-run, then sooner or later you're gonna come to the conclusion that you're a rat.
quotes.author: Allan Moore

quotes.quote: A rat race is for rats. We're not rats. We're human beings. Reject the insidious pressures in society that would blunt your critical faculties to all that is happening around you, that would caution silence in the face of injustice lest you jeopardise your chances of promotion and self-advancement.
quotes.author: Jimmy Reid

quotes.quote: Even rats can only be kicked around for so long before they've had enough.
quotes.author: Joe Cowley

quotes.quote: It is worth thought what kind of mind or condition or disposition is open to flattery; for poison would not be spread if the rats ate it not.
quotes.author: James Vila Blake

quotes.quote: When cats are hairdressers, rats will always go around with uncombed hair.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: I’ve never had a rat, never chased one. I chase my own tail and that’s enough. I must now make plans for the day I catch it.
quotes.author: Chila Woychick

quotes.quote: It's a rare moment when we take a break from the tribulations of the daily rat race to reflect on assumptions and values that we casually accept as gospel.
quotes.author: Graydon Carter

quotes.quote: Common hypocrites pass themselves off as doves; political and literary hypocrites pose as eagles. But don't be fooled by their eagle-like appearance. These are not eagles, but rats or dogs.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: It is difficult to systematically beat the market. But it is not difficult to systematically throw money down a rat hole by generating commissions and other costs.
quotes.author: Michael Jensen

quotes.quote: When I listen to songs, I can smell a rat. I like songs that speak to me with some deeper truth.
quotes.author: Mike Dirnt

quotes.quote: I could no more define poetry than a terrier can define a rat.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: The world is not a rational place.
quotes.author: Bette Greene

quotes.quote: A rational process is a moral process.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If you want to feel good, be rational.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Only the rational and useful is beautiful.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: In the end, rational policy is always good.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: Rationalization is foreplay with one's conscience.
quotes.author: Doug Copper

quotes.quote: No crime can ever be defended on rational grounds.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: In everything one thing is impossible: rationality.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Rationality is not one of this industry's attributes.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: The real is the rational and the rational is the real.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: If you scare somebody enough, they stop being rational.
quotes.author: Etgar Keret

quotes.quote: A man has free choice to the extent that he is rational.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: What is rational is actual and what is actual is rational.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: A person is an individual substance of a rational nature.
quotes.author: Boethius

quotes.quote: Rational thinking which is free from assumptions ends therefore in mysticism.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Rational thinking is an important aspect of human nature, but we have imagination, we have ambition, we have irrational fear, we are swayed by other people, we get indoctrinated and we get influenced by advertising.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Man is not a rational animal, he is a rationalizing animal.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The man of regular life and rational mind never despairs.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: A rational prediction has an explanation based on theory.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Rational assessments too often led to rational surrenders.
quotes.author: Scott Jurek

quotes.quote: Rational argument can be defeated by refusing to argue rationally.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: In rational worlds all the hierarchies of our world are reversed.
quotes.author: Bruce Crown

quotes.quote: These are not free men in any rational and exact sense of the word.
quotes.author: Ralph Adams Cram

quotes.quote: Rational confidence [is] the just result of knowledge and experience.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: Rational thoughts never drive people's creativity the way emotions do.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: It is rational to believe, as it is our very existence that is at stake.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: If you're rational you don't get to believe whatever you want to believe.
quotes.author: Michael Huemer

quotes.quote: When the rational mind is shut off, we have the possibility of intuition.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: Rational beliefs bring us closer to getting good results in the real world.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Some battles are won with swords and spears, others with quills and ravens.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: "Take thy beak from out my heart, and take thy form from off my door!" / Quoth the Raven “Nevermore.”
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The raven spread out its glossy wings and departed like hope.
quotes.author: Cecilia Dart-Thornton

quotes.quote: Ravens are at home everywhere. They only have one enemy: humans.
quotes.author: Bernd Heinrich

quotes.quote: Ravens are the birds I'll miss most when I die. If only the darkness into which we must look were composed of the black light of their limber intelligence. If only we did not have to die at all. Instead, become ravens.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as ravens claws.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: My love, she's like some raven / At my window with a broken wing.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Needless to say, urgings by ravens are ignored at one's peril.
quotes.author: James D. Doss

quotes.quote: To fight the raven you may make alliance with the serpent until the battle is done.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Honestly, all crows are not ravens
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The cry of a young raven is nothing but the natural cry of a creature, but your cry, if it be sincere, is the result of a work of grace in your heart.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: And the crow once called the raven black.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: A fairly good crow or a raven can lay pretty nearly as good an egg.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: One raven does not peck out another's eyes.
quotes.author: Danish proverb

quotes.quote: Censure acquits the raven, but pursues the dove.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: The raven himself is hoarse / That croaks the fatal entrance of Duncan / Under my battlements.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: But the black raven, the bird over the fated men, will tell, will say to the eagle, how he succeeded at the meal, when he with the wolf plundered the slaughtered ones.
quotes.author: The Beowulf Poet

quotes.quote: For this reason, the lean wolf in the wold / rejoiced, and the dark raven, a bird greedy for slaughter.
quotes.author: Cynewulf

quotes.quote: It is said that when Raven created the first world, he made everything perfect, a world full of happiness and beauty, without pain, suffering, or ugliness. But Raven grew bored with this perfect world and started reshaping things.
quotes.author: Catharine Feher-Elston

quotes.quote: Raw foodists are kind of paddling upstream against evolution. The only reason they can do it and they don't all keel over is that they are using blenders. They're very Cuisinart dependent.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: The raw material from which social institutions are fashioned is always more or less recalcitrant and any human society will tend to produce a caricature of itself.
quotes.author: Barbara Ward

quotes.quote: Raw food is the best way to have the cleanest energy. We take so much care about what kind of fuel we put in our car, what kind of oil. We care about that sometimes more than the fuel that we're looking at putting in our bodies. It's cleaner burning fuel.
quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

quotes.quote: When you get close to the raw materials and taste them at the moment they let go of the soil you learn to respect them.
quotes.author: Rene Redzepi

quotes.quote: When a raw food becomes processed food, it can be best valued, protected, stored, and safely delivered to customers.
quotes.author: Anthony Pratt

quotes.quote: The right raw materials can double or triple the protective power of the immune system.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: The raw materials of life hammered and shaped into something with a purpose.
quotes.author: James A. Moore

quotes.quote: Raw emotions anger, frustration, bitterness, resentment are the feelings we tend to hide from people we want to impress but spew on those we love the most.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: The raw materials of reality without the glue of time are materials adrift and reality is as meaningless as the balsa parts of a model airplane scattered to the wind.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: Raw is a good place for an artist. It's where the truth comes out.
quotes.author: Keith Urban

quotes.quote: The raw materials of photography are light and time and memory.
quotes.author: Keith Carter

quotes.quote: When you get close to the raw materials and taste them at the moment they let go of the soil, you learn to respect them.
quotes.author: Rene Redzepi

quotes.quote: The raw truth you profess shows your abode
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: To declare the raw truth is to live in dominion.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The raw food wave has swept through, and now it is the superfoods wave. The next thing to happen will be super herbalism.
quotes.author: David Wolfe

quotes.quote: Raw ingredients trump recipes every time; farmers and ranchers who coax the best from the earth can make any of us appear to be a great cook.
quotes.author: Judy Rodgers

quotes.quote: To reach peace, teach peace.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Reach for a better feeling thought.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: You can reach higher heights by faith.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Always let your reach exceed your grasp.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: We shape ourselves by our imaginative reach.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: Dare to dream. Dare to reach beyond the stars.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We can't reach old age by another man's road.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Reach for the stars; you might just catch one.
quotes.author: Lori Greiner

quotes.quote: The mind reaches great heights only by spurts.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: No one reaches a high position without daring.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A Library goes on as far as thought can reach.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: The hand cannot reach higher than does the heart.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Reach for the sky but keep your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Phil Limbert

quotes.quote: Even a snail will eventually reach its destination.
quotes.author: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.quote: What's often in your heart is the hardest to reach.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: When you reach your highest goal, choose a new one.
quotes.author: Jay Van Andel

quotes.quote: When you reach that deeper level, you can't go back.
quotes.author: Matt Stone

quotes.quote: When you reach the top, that's when the climb begins.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: If you wish to reach the highest, begin at the lowest.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: We must pass through the darkness, to reach the light.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: Nothing should be out of the reach of hope. Life is a hope.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We have to embrace obstacles to reach the next stage of joy.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: Everyone can reach his goal, if he can think, wait and fast.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Extend your hand with the strongest reach.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: One reaches his goal by deciding to go away.
quotes.author: Jorge P. Guerrero

quotes.quote: Never stop taking risks. Just keep reaching.
quotes.author: Ryan Eggold

quotes.quote: Reaching out takes nothing more than a smile.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Only by focusing on God can we reach our goal.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Reach with all your heart to your divine-dreams.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: The major value of reaching goals is not to acquire it, but it's the person you become while you're working to acquire it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you want to reach a goal, you must see the reaching in your own mind before you actually arrive at your goal.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: You better keep your lane on this race of reaching out for our dreams and goals; don't stand in the middle of the road because you will be run over by those who are determined to reach the finishing line.
quotes.author: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Take the challenge of your life. Reach out to your goals. There is no limit to what you can achieve.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Believing you can achieve a goal is vital to reaching a goal.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in you. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: It's important to set your own goals and work hard to achieve them.
quotes.author: Yuichiro Miura

quotes.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Whether or not you reach your goals in life depends entirely on how well you prepare for them and how badly you want them.
quotes.author: Ronald McNair

quotes.quote: Goals. There's no telling what you can do when you get inspired by them. There's no telling what you can do when you believe in them. And there's no telling what will happen when you act upon them.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: To reach your own goals and dreams, you must learn how to assist others in reaching theirs.
quotes.author: Joe Gibbs

quotes.quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Goals give you a compass in order to direct your path through life. Goals focus your thoughts and actions on areas that have precise purpose and meaning.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: One part at a time, one day at a time, we can accomplish any goal we set for ourselves.
quotes.author: Karen Casey

quotes.quote: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The real value of setting and achieving goals lies not in the rewards you receive, but in the person you become as a result of reaching your goals.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The thing about goals is that living without them is a lot more fun, in the short run. It seems to me, though, that the people who get things done, who lead, who grow and who make an impact those people have goals.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The best way to approach a goal is to first break it down into very small bite size steps. Each one of these steps should lead logically to the next step to be completed in a linear order.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: Whoever wants to reach a distant goal must take small steps.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Stop waiting for others to tell you what you can do. Start putting faith into your own strengths and talents. Instead of questioning whether you can reach your goals, move forward with conviction and confidence.
quotes.author: Jane Powell

quotes.quote: To reach your goal authentically is probably, in the end, going to mean much more to you than having reached it in a false way.
quotes.author: K'naan

quotes.quote: People with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: If you work so hard to reach your goal but you lose your pole in the very last run, that's hard to take.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.quote: Action and reaction are equal and opposite.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: A complete stranger has the capacity to alter the life of another irrevocably. This domino effect has the capacity to change the course of an entire world. That is what life is; a chain reaction of individuals colliding with others and influencing their lives without realizing it. A decision that seems miniscule to you, may be monumental to the fate of the world.
quotes.author: J.D. Stroube

quotes.quote: You're only responsible for being honest, not for someone else's reaction to your honesty.
quotes.author: Kelli Jae Baeli

quotes.quote: Action triggers reaction. An object somehow responds when we observe it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: An action is at least a billion times less difficult to choose than a reaction.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Create gaps between stimulus and reaction and the gap will show you the path.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: If a man realizes who he is, he will not react to the negative things surrounding him
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The way you react in times of challenges will determine whether your challenges will weigh you down, or you will overthrow them.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The law of gratitude is the natural principle that action and reaction are always equal and in opposite directions.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: What is the true test of character unless it be its progressive development in the bustle and turmoil, in the action and reaction of daily life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: God’s reaction towards things is different from ours and He wishes that our reaction will line up with His
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The slightest pain that we have, is the reaction of the pain that we had given. So do what you find comfortable.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: You can only be in a state of non-reaction if you can recognize someone's behavior as coming from the ego, as being an expression of the collective human dysfunction. When you realize it's not personal, there is no longer a compulsion to react as if it were.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The first reaction is surely the most natural one, but not always the most correct one; thereupon, the invention of apologies
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: One must fight for a life of action, not reaction.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: The excessive increase of anything causes a reaction in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: How you react emotionally is a choice in any situation.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: Do not deny the classical approach, simply as a reaction, or you will have created another pattern and trapped yourself there.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: When you are paying attention to your thoughts, words, actions, feelings, food habits, reactions, decisions, secrets, patterns, and physique, you start tuning in consciously.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: No reaction means, the collapse and failure of an action.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote:
For every action there is an equal and opposite re-action.
A repercussion.
quotes.author: Brownell Landrum

quotes.quote: The rejection of knowledge (ignorance) attracts a reaction from God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: How we respond to something is just as important—if not more important—than our initial reaction.
quotes.author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg

quotes.quote: Acceptance is an active response to a temporary situation; surrender is a passive reaction to a situation that you think will last forever.
quotes.author: Oli Anderson

quotes.quote: Between an action and reaction, between a gesture and its consequences, everybody agrees that there is an exact relationship, but not necessarily a proportionate one.
quotes.author: Filippo Bologna

quotes.quote: Any reaction is better than none.
quotes.author: Gavin Rossdale

quotes.quote: To read is to fly: it is to soar to a point of vantage which gives a view over wide terrains of history, human variety, ideas, shared experience and the fruits of many inquiries.
quotes.author: A C Grayling

quotes.quote: The things I want to know are in books; my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A capacity and taste for reading gives access to whatever has already been discovered by others.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The more you read, the more you learn, the more you learn, the smarter you are.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: The book to read is not the one that thinks for you but the one which makes you think.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The man who does not read good books is no better than the man who can't.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Reading gives us someplace to go when we have to stay where we are.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Reading was my escape and my comfort, my consolation, my stimulant of choice: reading for the pure pleasure of it, for the beautiful stillness that surrounds you when you hear an author's words reverberating in your head.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: It is a good rule after reading a new book, never to allow yourself another new one till you have read an old one in between.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Keep reading books, but remember that a book's only a book, and you should learn to think for yourself.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: A fondness for reading changes the inevitable dull hours of our life into exquisite hours of delight.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: To read a writer is for me not merely to get an idea of what he says, but to go off with him, and travel in his company.
quotes.author: Andre Gride

quotes.quote: Reading builds the educated and informed electorate so vital to our democracy.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Reading without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Reading makes immigrants of us all. It takes us away from home, but more important, it finds homes for us everywhere.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: Children are made readers on the laps of their parents.
quotes.author: Emilie Buchwald

quotes.quote: Those who have trouble reading are those who have trouble moving ahead in the appreciation of all that life has to offer.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Reading a book by someone you respect allows some of their brilliance to rub off on you.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Reading well is one of the great pleasures that solitude can afford you.
quotes.author: Harold Bloom

quotes.quote: The reading of all good books is indeed like a conversation with the noblest men of past centuries who were the authors of them, nay a carefully studied conversation, in which they reveal to us none but the best of their thoughts.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: No entertainment is so cheap as reading, nor any pleasure so lasting.
quotes.author: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: The delight of opening a new pursuit, or a new course of reading, imparts the vivacity and novelty of youth even to old age.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The habit of reading is the only enjoyment in which there is no alloy; it lasts when all other pleasures fade.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: What is reading but silent conversation?
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If you are a kid, reading is really important stuff.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: We need to tell kids flat out: reading is not optional.
quotes.author: Walter Dean Myers

quotes.quote: Reading should not be presented to children as a chore or duty. It should be offered to them as a precious gift.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: If my books can help children become readers, then I feel I have accomplished something important.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: There are perhaps no days of our childhood we lived so fully as those we spent with a favorite book.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I believe we should spend less time worrying about the quantity of books children read and more time introducing them to quality books that will turn them on to the joy of reading and turn them into lifelong readers.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Let children read whatever they want and then talk about it with them. If parents and kids can talk together, we won't have as much censorship because we won't have as much fear.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Reading should not be presented to children as a chore, a duty. It should be offered as a gift.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: Reading aloud with children is known to be the single most important activity for building the knowledge and skills they will eventually require for learning to read.
quotes.author: Marilyn Jager Adams

quotes.quote: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Kennedy

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a child who hates to read; there are only children who have not found the right book.
quotes.author: Frank Serafini

quotes.quote: Children are made readers on the laps of their parents.
quotes.author: Emilie Buchwald

quotes.quote: One of the greatest gifts adults can give to their offspring and to their society is to read to children.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: You may have tangible wealth untold; caskets of jewels and coffers of gold. Richer than I you can never be. I had a mother who read to me.
quotes.author: Strickland Gillian

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for books in the life of a child.
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Chase

quotes.quote: So it is with children who learn to read fluently and well: They begin to take flight into whole new worlds as effortlessly as young birds take to the sky.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: I will defend the importance of bedtime stories to my last gasp.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: No book is really worth reading at age of ten which is not equally (and often far more) worth reading at the age of fifty.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The nonreading children are the greatest problem in American education.
quotes.author: Glenn Doman

quotes.quote: I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists mostly of building enough bookshelves.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Don't just teach your children to read. Teach them to question what they read. Teach then to question everything.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: When you read to a child, when you put a book in a child's hands, you are bringing that child news of the infinitely varied nature of life. You are an Awakener.
quotes.author: Paula Fox

quotes.quote: When I say to a parent, "read to a child", I don't want it to sound like medicine. I want it to sound like chocolate.
quotes.author: Mem Fox

quotes.quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: You tell a kid he doesn't like to read, and he'll believe you.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Zevin

quotes.quote: Every book is a children's book if the kid can read!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a kid who hates reading. There are kids who love reading and kids who are reading the wrong books.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Real estate is the key cost of physical retailers. That's why there's the old saw: location, location, location.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The best real-estate investments with the highest yields are in working-class neighborhoods, because fancy properties are overpriced.
quotes.author: Jane Bryant Quinn

quotes.quote: To be successful in real estate, you must always and consistently put your clients' best interests first. When you do, your personal needs will be realized beyond your greatest expectations.
quotes.author: Anthony Hitt

quotes.quote: Real estate is the closest thing to the proverbial pot of gold.
quotes.author: Ada Louise Huxtable

quotes.quote: I always felt very secure and very safe with real estate. Real estate always appreciates.
quotes.author: Ivana Trump

quotes.quote: Real estate is the best investment for small savings. More money is made from the rise in real estate values than from all other causes combined.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Real estate deals a lot with the government. It isn't like manufacturing, logistics, home appliances or the auto sector, which deal with consumers.
quotes.author: Wang Jianlin

quotes.quote: Real estate is a complicated, large, and emotional purchase. For all those reasons, it has been hard to adapt to e-business.
quotes.author: Steve Carpenter

quotes.quote: Real estate sales was perfect training for the experience to go into public life because you learn to accept rejection, learn to meet new people, learn to work with people and find common ground. That's the way you sell houses... that's also the way you win over constituency.
quotes.author: Johnny Isakson

quotes.quote: Real estate practice is not about selling or buying a home. It's about representing your client's greatest asset to your clients greatest benefit.
quotes.author: Alex Delgado

quotes.quote: In the real estate business you learn more about people, and you learn more about community issues, you learn more about life, you learn more about the impact of government, probably than any other profession that I know of.
quotes.author: Johnny Isakson

quotes.quote: Real estate stocks have had a good run, but once interest rates start to rise, the present value of developers' future earnings will start decrease. Shipping lines are in for a tough time.
quotes.author: Takashi Kamiya

quotes.quote: I view real estate as the most intriguing opportunity that I've seen in my business lifetime.
quotes.author: Richard Rainwater

quotes.quote: Real estate investing, even on a very small scale, remains a tried and true means of building an individual's cash flow and wealth.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Every person who invests in well-selected real estate in a growing section of a prosperous community adopts the surest and safest method of becoming independent, for real estate is the basis of wealth.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Commercial real estate always trails residential, and as residential growth flourishes, shopping centers flourish and service the communities, and jobs come out.
quotes.author: Johnny Isakson

quotes.quote: Real estate investment is certainly a vote of confidence on future activity.
quotes.author: Fiona Sigalla

quotes.quote: In the real estate industry, we are concerned about the precedent it sets to let banks be property managers and brokers.
quotes.author: Steve Cook

quotes.quote: Real Estate is a commodity bought and sold everyday. Just like a stock, you would buy from your broker. The difference is, if the value of my Real Estate goes down drastically, I still have a tangible security. If my stock plummets, all I have is a piece of paper.
quotes.author: Rico Vecc

quotes.quote: Now, one thing I tell everyone is learn about real estate. Repeat after me: real estate provides the highest returns, the greatest values and the least risk.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.quote: Real estate is an imperishable asset, ever increasing in value. It is the most solid security that human ingenuity has devised. It is the basis of all security and about the only indestructible security.
quotes.author: Russell Sage

quotes.quote: Real estate prices are so high and people of the low-income pay scale desperately need those public housing units. If they're proceeding cautiously because they do want to serve the population they serve, that's a good thing.
quotes.author: Ross Quotes

quotes.quote: Buy real estate in areas where the path exists and buy more real estate where there is no path, but you can create your own.
quotes.author: David Waronker

quotes.quote: Real estate is all about values. If investors expect there to be growth in income over time, then they're willing to take a little less going in when they buy the property with the knowledge that next year (the rental income) will be a little higher, and a little higher and a little higher.
quotes.author: Pete Korpacz

quotes.quote: Real estate is a fast-growing, exciting field that offers almost unlimited income potential to a person who is willing to work hard and to learn the special features of this very interesting business.
quotes.author: J. Bruce Lindeman

quotes.quote: he real estate agent had to go door-to-door in the apartment building we wanted to rent, asking if it was OK for this interracial family - my mom is white and I was a 1-year-old half-African kid - to live in the apartment building.
quotes.author: Tom Morello

quotes.quote: Real estate is at the core of almost every business, and it's certainly at the core of most people's wealth. In order to build your wealth and improve your business smarts, you need to know about real estate.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: In my experience, in the real-estate business past success stories are generally not applicable to new situations. We must continually reinvent ourselves, responding to changing times with innovative new business models.
quotes.author: Akira Mori

quotes.quote: Real estate is my life. It is my day job, if you will. But it consumes my nights and weekends, too.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: What we call real estate -- the solid ground to build a house on -- is the broad foundation on which nearly all the guilt of this world rests. A man will commit almost any wrong -- he will heap an immense pile of wickedness, as hard as granite, and which will weigh as heavily upon his soul, to eternal ages -- only to build a great, gloomy, dark-chambered mansion, for himself to die in.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: In real love you want the other person's good. In romantic love you want the other person.
quotes.author: Margaret Anderson

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you cant even put into words, how you feel for a person.
quotes.author: Dylan West

quotes.quote: We simply can't abandon ship every time we encounter a storm in our marriage. Real love is about weathering the storms of life together.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: To love deeply in one direction makes us more loving in all others.
quotes.author: Anne-Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: Real love is a permanently self-enlarging experience.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Real love means loving kindness and compassion, the kind of love that does not have any conditions.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If he can't handle you at your worst then he does not deserve you at your best. Real love means seeing beyond the words spoken out of pain, and instead seeing a person's soul.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: True love will not brook reserve; it feels undervalued and outraged, when even the sorrows of those it loves are concealed from it.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Love lives in those who are willing to make the greatest sacrifices without keeping account.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: My love for you has no depth, its boundaries are ever-expanding. My love and my life with you will be a never-ending story
quotes.author: Christina White

quotes.quote: Real love means remaining truthful, even when you have all the opportunity in the world to hurt someone.
quotes.author: Michael Hayssus

quotes.quote: Real love is seeing that the one you love is happy even when you do things for them that makes you unhappy. Because their happiness is paramount.
quotes.author: Jerry Elijah

quotes.quote: When you see love with all your heart you shall find its echoes in the universe.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Real love is a pilgrimage. It happens when there is no strategy, but it is very rare because most people are strategists.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: If the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is forever.
quotes.author: James O'Barr

quotes.quote: Real love is accepting other people the way they are without trying to change them.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The real love is the one that makes you forget all the others.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find meaning of life by ourselves alone we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Love is the desire to give, not to receive, something. Love is the art of producing something with the other's talents.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Real love moves freely in both directions. Don't waste your time on anything else.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: Real love is an expression of the best of you and others. It's moving, profound and essentially very simple at the same time.
quotes.author: Annette Vaillancourt

quotes.quote: You can't show love to someone at the expense of someone else who loves you.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: I know love is real because her love is visible.
quotes.author: Delano Johnson

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Loving someone is doing more than you say you'll do to show your love. Love is understood more when the words are replaced by actions.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: There is a hardly a more gracious gift that we can offer somebody than to accept them fully, to love them almost despite themselves.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Real love should draw no blood from the loved and buckets from the lover.
quotes.author: Emily Maguire

quotes.quote: Real love is to offer your life at the feet of another.
quotes.author: John Ajvide Lindqvist

quotes.quote: A real man can use power, rather than let power use him.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: A real man is capable of controlling himself before he controls his children.
quotes.author: Dorian "Doc" Paskowitz

quotes.quote: Manhood is defined and decided by the ability to nurture and to protect, by the capability to provide and to sustain.
quotes.author: JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: The real man is one who always finds excuses for others, but never excuses himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A real man ain't a coward, he stands by what he says, admits his faults, and corrects his mistakes.
quotes.author: Kiki Strack

quotes.quote: The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: You can't relate to a superhero, to a superman, but you can identify with a real man who in times of crisis draws forth some extraordinary quality from within himself and triumphs but only after a struggle.
quotes.author: Timothy Dalton

quotes.quote: To be a real man is to be unattached - not from responsibility or justice - but from those dependencies that inhibit responsibility and justice.
quotes.author: Tarek Saab

quotes.quote: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Treat her like you're still trying to win her, and that's how you'll never lose her. A real man will remind his woman daily to why she fell in love with him.
quotes.author: Kiki Strack

quotes.quote: Only a real man is able to stick to just one woman and treat her special, always.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: A real man don't call the plumbers. If he gonna call himself a man, he needs to know how to fix it, on the spot
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.quote: A man who brags about satisfying 30 women is immature. A real man is one who can satisfy the same woman for 30 years.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Real men don't buy girls-they protect them. We're recruiting real men who have the courage to stand up against this issue.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: The character of a true men is found out by his amusements.
quotes.author: Joshua Reynolds

quotes.quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A real man only lies to his woman when he's surprising her.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: A real man follows the three P's: pray, provide, and protect.
quotes.author: Mario Tomasello

quotes.quote: Real men are sadly lacking in this world, for when they are put to the test they prove worthless.
quotes.author: Franz Liszt

quotes.quote: A real man never stops trying to show a girl how much he cares, even if he already has her.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: A real man Provides, Protects, and always keeps a Promise.
quotes.author: Jivaro Brawley

quotes.quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and content in life than simply being a good husband and father.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: Real men invest in long term love, not short term lust.
quotes.author: Kaliana Dietrich

quotes.quote: It takes a real man to see the difference between a diamond and a rhinestone. Can't be mad when someone else takes the diamond, that you treated like a rhinestone.
quotes.author: Surgeo Bell

quotes.quote: Real men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for another woman, because they're too busy looking for new ways to love their own.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: There is one rule, above all others, for being a man. Whatever comes, face it on your feet.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: A real man doesn't have time to cheat because that man is too busy providing all of which a good woman deserves.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: It's a real man who can go out with a woman who's taller than he is. That's an alpha male right there.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.quote: Boys will break your heart. Real men will pick up the pieces.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Manhood is defined and decided by the ability to nurture and to protect, by the capability to provide and to sustain.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Being a real man doesn't mean you sleep with 100 girls, It means you fight for one girl even when 99 others are chasing you.
quotes.author: Lethu

quotes.quote: A real man ain't a coward, he stands by what he says, admits his faults, and corrects his mistakes.
quotes.author: Kiki Strack

quotes.quote: If you're a man, you don't cry about it, you take life, the ups and downs; if you're a real man you never go down, you just stay up!
quotes.author: Ric Flair

quotes.quote: A real man never stops trying to show a girl how much he cares, even if he already has her.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: It takes a real man to make a true confession - a Chocolate Soldier will excuse or cloak his sin.
quotes.author: Charles Studd

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The highest reward for man's toil is not what he gets for it but what he becomes by it
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Boys will break your heart. Real men will pick up the pieces.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: To be a man is, precisely, to be responsible.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: A man should be able to hear, and to bear, the worst that could be said of him.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: A real man does not think of victory or defeat. He plunges recklessly towards an irrational death.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A real man is one who fears the death of his heart, not of his body.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: Do not go about complaining how hard it is to live in this world. such behavior is entirely unworthy of a real man.
quotes.author: Nichiren

quotes.quote: You have to be a man before you can be a gentleman.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Only a real man is able to stick to just one woman and treat her special, always.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: The stronger a man is, the more gentle he can afford to be
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The real man is one who always finds excuses for others, but never excuses himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A real man Provides, Protects, and always keeps a Promise.
quotes.author: Jivaro Brawley

quotes.quote: A real man is one who rejects passivity, accepts responsibility, leads courageously, and expects the greater reward, God's reward.
quotes.author: Dr. Robert Lewis

quotes.quote: A real man protects your heart, he doesn't play with it.
quotes.author: keren Zhims

quotes.quote: Real men don't dance to other people's tune, instead, they play for others to dance.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Real Men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for other women because they're too busy looking for ways to love their own.
quotes.author: Miles Long

quotes.quote: A real relationship is like a river; the deeper it gets the less noise it makes.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: A real relationship is gritty and earthy, the stuff that life is made of.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: I tend to believe, when you're in a relationship, if you don't fight, it's not a real relationship. You have to have arguments and tensions, otherwise I don't believe it.
quotes.author: Richard LaGravenese

quotes.quote: People - not just in their teenage years - hold on to this fantasy of love when they're not ready to have a real relationship.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.quote: It is only when we no longer compulsively need someone that we can have a real relationship with them.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: Who has time for toxic relationships? If someone isn't honoring your feelings, it's not a real relationship. If you feel drained after spending time with someone, that's a red flag!
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Couples often live out years of falsehood trying to protect and save a relationship, all the while destroying any chance of real relationship.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: The more connections you and your lover make, not just between your bodies, but between your minds, your hearts, and your souls, the more you will strengthen the fabric of your relationship, and the more real moments you will experience together.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself — to laugh with me, but never at me; to cry with me, but never because of me; to love life, to love himself, to love being loved. Such a relationship is based upon freedom and can never grow in a jealous heart.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: In marriage you got to go through the same struggles as a relationship, that's if the relationship is real, because there's a lot of non-real relationships going on in the world right now. And I think that's just because of the day and age we're in, a lot of these relationships are taking place over text messages, it's not real substance. But when you got a real one, it's already like a marriage.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.quote: A lot of people seem to want to make the institution of marriage substitute for a real relationship.
quotes.author: Susan Faludi

quotes.quote: I think as humans we do want to control our relationships, and you can't. It's probably better that you can't. That wouldn't be a real relationship, and we'd never learn and grow.
quotes.author: Caroline Paul

quotes.quote: People that I care about, that I consider being friends of mine, most of the things I discuss with them I wouldn't discuss in public because it's a real relationship. It's not a relationship for the public, you know?
quotes.author: Common

quotes.quote: Forgiveness does not create a relationship. Unless people speak the truth about what they have done and change their mind and behavior, a relationship of trust is not possible. When you forgive someone you certainly release them from judgment, but without true change, no real relationship can be established.
quotes.author: William P. Young

quotes.quote: Realism is often mistakenly identified with the view that there is some special discipline which has privileged access to the real.
quotes.author: David K. Clark

quotes.quote: Realism is knowing fantasy and reality intersect constantly. Realism is living with the awareness that every act changes the world.
quotes.author: Ales Kot

quotes.quote: Pure realism is both unsustainable and purposeless.
quotes.author: John Bew

quotes.quote: Realism can break a writer's heart.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Realism arises from the maturity of the minds, while Idealism arises from their conformity.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Realism is simply Romanticism that has lost its reasonthat is its reason for existing.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Realism is the light that shines between change and challenge.
quotes.author: Balroop Singh

quotes.quote: It has been said that modern realism begins from the position that truth can be discovered by the individual through the senses.
quotes.author: Ian Watt

quotes.quote: Reality is a crutch for people who can't cope with drugs.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: People want to see realism in action now.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.quote: There's a level of realism you can only achieve through the imaginary.
quotes.author: Fumito Ueda

quotes.quote: Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn't go away.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick
