quotes.quote: It's hard to get everybody to recycle paper and plastic, let alone.
quotes.author: Richard Karn

quotes.quote: I own about 300 pairs of shoes. When I start to go over 300, I have mini-sales from my closet and give the money to charity. It's my way of recycling; I feel like I can give back to the universe.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: My number one thing is to recycle everything from newspaper to aluminum cans, and I even use a canvas bag instead of the plastic ones when I go to the grocery store.
quotes.author: Maiara Walsh

quotes.quote: All the human and animal manure which the world wastes, if returned to the land, instead of being thrown into the sea, would suffice to nourish the world
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: It started as a selfish act and has turned into a way of life. I can't stand to watch someone throw anything away that belongs in my green bin.
quotes.author: Jen Hatmaker

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as "away." When we throw anything away it must go somewhere.
quotes.author: Annie Leonard

quotes.quote: What's more important than recycling? Producing something to recycle.
quotes.author: Gordon Osmond

quotes.quote: Resurface. Reupholster. Repaint. Refinish. Make something old new again!
quotes.author: Natalie DiScala

quotes.quote: During holiday parties I end up recycling a lot of my cocktail dresses and just wearing a layering piece, like a blazer and tights, with it.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: Recycling is a good thing to do. It makes people feel good to do it. The thing I want to emphasize is the vast difference between recycling for the purpose of feeling good and recycling for the purpose of solving the trash problem.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Some people can't see the color red. That doesn't mean it isn't there.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: A red rose is not selfish because it wants to be a red rose. It would be horribly selfish if it wanted all the other flowers in the garden to be both red and roses.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Red is a colour I've felt very strongly about. Maybe red is a very Indian colour, maybe it's one of those things that I grew up with and recognise at some other level.
quotes.author: Anish Kapoor

quotes.quote: They averred that the symbol was not mere scarlet cloth tinged in an earthly dyepot, but was red-hot with infernal fire, and could be seen glowing all alight whenever Hester Prynne walked abroad in the nighttime. And we must needs say it seared Hester’s bosom so deeply, that perhaps there was more truth in the rumor than our modern incredulity may be inclined to admit.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The red sun was pasted in the sky like a wafer.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: Red lips are not so red as the stained stones kissed by the English dead.
quotes.author: Wilfred Owen

quotes.quote: If I could tell you about red i would sing to you of fire sweet like cherries burning like cinnamon smelling like a rose in the sun.
quotes.author: Dixie Dawn Miller Goode

quotes.quote: Red is the archetypal color, the first color humans mastered, fabricated, reproduced, and broke down into different shades, first in painting and later in dyeing. This has given it primacy over all other colors through the millennia.
quotes.author: Michel Pastoureau

quotes.quote: And now she lies flat on her folded arms / Face down, and towards the dust her red mouth leans / And it is full of silence like all red things.
quotes.author: Brewster Ghisilen

quotes.quote: The true color of life is the color of the body, the color of the covered red, the implicit and not explicit red of the living heart and the pulses. It is the modest color of the unpublished blood.
quotes.author: Alice Meynell

quotes.quote: Though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
quotes.author: Isaiah 1:18

quotes.quote: Red is the great clarifier bright and revealing. I can't imagine becoming bored with red it would be like becoming bored with the person you love.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Put on your red shoes, and dance the blues.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: Red goes with everything and red goes with nothing.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: When in doubt, make a red painting.
quotes.author: Kay WalkingStick

quotes.quote: Red is a benevolent dictatorship.
quotes.author: James Jannard

quotes.quote: She's wearing a tight red sweater and a red skirt and enough makeup to scare a hooker.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.quote: Red is the ultimate cure for sadness.
quotes.author: Bill Blass

quotes.quote: The man who invented the red carpet needed his head examined.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: She's applying her lipstick; I've always believed that the universe invented the color red solely for latinas.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Nothing attracts attention like a red dress.
quotes.author: Laura Bush

quotes.quote: People abusing their power makes me see red.
quotes.author: Neil Jackson

quotes.quote: Red serpents, fiery forms, and yelling hags, Fit company for mad adventurers.
quotes.author: Philip Freneau

quotes.quote: Candy apple red is my favorite color. It's a powerful color to wear. It's always been that way i've always been really attracted to that color.
quotes.author: Carly Rae Jepsen

quotes.quote: That red carpet has to be felt to be believed.
quotes.author: William H. Macy

quotes.quote: Their silver war is being paid for in red blood.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: The red was something none of them could contain.
quotes.author: E.J. Koh

quotes.quote: How red the rose that is the soldier.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Red is for fire red is for love too it lies in our hand what we wanna choose.
quotes.author: Shivangi Lavaniya

quotes.quote: Blondes are noticed but redheads are never forgotten.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Redheads keep the world on fire and men's hearts ablaze.
quotes.author: Kaliana Dietrich

quotes.quote: With the red hair, you get the white skin; it's a package deal. The cons are that you never look particularly attractive on the beach. The pros are in a softly lit room, you look pretty.
quotes.author: Marcia Cross

quotes.quote: It is observed that the red-haried of both sexes are more libidinous and mischievous than the rest, whom yet they much exceed in strength and activity.
quotes.author: Gullivers travels

quotes.quote: We redheads are a minority, we tend to notice each other you know, and notice our identity.
quotes.author: Juliann Moore

quotes.quote: When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: My hair is pretty dark red. And of course, it catches fire in the sunlight. A great time to bring out a redhead's coloring is right before sunset, when rose-colored clouds and golden light begin to streak across the sky.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The blood of a redheaded woman is three degrees cooler than the blood of a normal woman. This has been established by medical studies.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: People with red hair are supposed to get mad very easily and he had very red hair.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Redheaded women are either violent or false, and usually are both.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Red hair is my life long sorrow.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: All the action adventure girls have red hair. Whenever it is an independent girl, not a sidekick person, when she has her own mind or does as good as the guys, she has red hair.
quotes.author: Marion Roach

quotes.quote: Red hair is great. It's rare, and therefore superior.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: If you've got red hair, try washing it in cranberry juice. And, if you're blonde, a champagne rinse can work wonders.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Redheaded women buck like goats.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: I love that our hair isn't simply a color, but a real identity.
quotes.author: Erin La Rosa

quotes.quote: One of my favorite things is to pass another natural redhead on the street, and do that little acknowledgement thing that redheads do - a small nod, a tiny smile - we're proud and we cheer each other on.
quotes.author: Erin La Rosa

quotes.quote: Being a redhead means that I get to be a magical unicorn.
quotes.author: Erin La Rosa

quotes.quote: I'm part of the small population that naturally has this gorgeous color, and that makes me and my fellow gingers so incredibly unique.
quotes.author: Erin La Rosa

quotes.quote: Color connects with our emotions. In life, when we see color it affects our feelings.
quotes.author: Nick Arrojo

quotes.quote: Red can be associated with hot, and redheads are thought to be a fiery breed.
quotes.author: Nick Arrojo

quotes.quote: Hair is a huge part of a redhead's identity, not only because the color is unique, but also because it defines a person.
quotes.author: Adrienne Vendetti

quotes.quote: People recognize a redhead from miles away and commonly describe them as 'the one with red hair.
quotes.author: Adrienne Vendetti

quotes.quote: For a redhead, hair is everything because the color itself is attention grabbing. It screams, 'Look at me!' This is why redheads are under the most pressure to keep their locks looking gorgeous.
quotes.author: Adrienne Vendetti

quotes.quote: An exotic woman with a fiery temper. One of the most beautiful creatures on Earth, too bad there are so little of them. Redheads are commonly a human, characterized by pale skin, freckles and bright red hair.
quotes.author: Adrienne Vendetti

quotes.quote: Natural redheads do not turn gray like blondes and brunettes do. Red hair initially tends to turn blonde and then white.
quotes.author: Adrienne Vendetti

quotes.quote: Be careful of the power of the red lip, as some women may find it hard to live without it after wearing it…
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She has a way with words, red lipstick, and making an entrance.
quotes.author: Kate Spade

quotes.quote: Heels and red lipstick will put the God into people.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: If you’re sad, add more lipstick and attack.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Resolve to worry less and rock a red lip.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Nothing says confidence and glamour like a classic red lip.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: Red lipstick is instant glamour.
quotes.author: Charlotte Tilbury

quotes.quote: If you want a man to notice you, just wear red lipstick
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: There is a shade of red for every woman
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Put on a red lipstick and watch your confidence rise 3 inches.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Put on some red lipstick and live a little.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Red lipstick has always been a classic. You have seen the red lip on people from Marilyn Monroe to Marilyn Manson. The right shade of red can turn a boring look into a bold, eye-catching statement.
quotes.author: Jeffree Star

quotes.quote: A red lipstick is always the correct choice!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She was the kind of girl who wore dark lipstick and didn’t need to speak a word to seduce you.
quotes.author: Stephen F. Campbell

quotes.quote: Do your squats eat, your vegetables, wear red lipstick, [and] don't let boys be mean to you.
quotes.author: Kendall Jenner

quotes.quote: In life, redemption was walking up the down escalator: stop to congratulate yourself, and back you slid.
quotes.author: Amy Waldman

quotes.quote: There will be no redemption because the men who run this place do not want redemption. They want to be as near to hell as they can.
quotes.author: Colson Whitehead

quotes.quote: Between the radiant white of a clear conscience and the coal black of a conscience sullied by sin lie many shades of gray--where most of us live our lives. Not perfect but not beyond redemption.
quotes.author: Sherry L. Hoppe

quotes.quote: The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: Redemption is possible, and it is the measure of a civilized society.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: Redemption is not perfection. The redeemed must realize their imperfections.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Seeking to forget makes exile all the longer; the secret of redemption lies in remembrance.
quotes.author: Richard von Weizsaecker

quotes.quote: The mark of our society as civilized will come when we embrace confidence in the power of redemption.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: Hell is yourself and the only redemption is when a person puts himself aside to feel deeply for another person.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Language is conceived in sin and science is its redemption.
quotes.author: Willard Van Orman Quine

quotes.quote: Redemption sounds like a jubilee. Like a second line, if you will.
quotes.author: Dawn Richard

quotes.quote: The best way to use the gold of the Redeemer is for the redemption of those in peril.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: Redemption isn't giving a bank robber a job as a teller.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: [No] matter what a waste one has made of one's life, it is ever possible to find some path to redemption, however partial.
quotes.author: Charles Frazier

quotes.quote: We seek redemption, yet, we don't seek forgiveness.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: To be in Christ -- that is redemption; but for Christ to be in you -- that is sanctification!
quotes.author: Major W. Ian Thomas

quotes.quote: Life is complex. You don't have any person who is nice from the beginning until the end. You don't always have the notion of redemption. The bad people don't always pay.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: When you find your definitions in God, you find the very purpose for which you were created. Put your hand into God's hand, know His absolutes, demonstrate His love, present His truth, and the message of redemption and transformation will take hold.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
quotes.author: E. Stanley Jones

quotes.quote: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: The gospel comprises indeed, and unfolds, the whole mystery of man's redemption, as far forth as it is necessary to be known for our salvation.
quotes.author: Robert Boyle

quotes.quote: You have to be a little contrite to get redemption.
quotes.author: Steve Madden

quotes.quote: The Christian notion of the possibility of redemption is incomprehensible to the computer.
quotes.author: Vance Packard

quotes.quote: In all God's plans for human redemption, He proposes that men pray. The men are to pray in every place, in the church, in the closet, in the home, on sacred days and on secular days.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: I definitely know that I'm quirky. I know that I'm different. Red hair definitely made me different growing up.
quotes.author: Jayma Mays

quotes.quote: My husband said he wanted to have a relationship with a redhead, so I dyed my hair.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: I love being a redhead. It's a rare thing, so I think there's a bond between redheads.
quotes.author: Laura Prepon

quotes.quote: There is more, much more, to being a redhead than the color of one's hair.
quotes.author: G. Adam Stanislav

quotes.quote: When you're younger, being a redhead is... Well, my two brothers teased me no end.
quotes.author: Isla Fisher

quotes.quote: When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It was dreadful. They tried to put the little redhead in a cage.
quotes.author: Sarah Ferguson

quotes.quote: In British culture, redheads get teased at school. But I've grown up enough to realize I love my hair.
quotes.author: Lily Cole

quotes.quote: You can sleep with a blonde, you can sleep with a brunette, but you'll never get any sleep with a redhead!
quotes.author: Jamie Luner

quotes.quote: Redheaded women! Those blood oranges! Those cherry bombs! Those celestial shrews! And queens of copp! â€“ ode to redheads.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Redheads keep the world on fire and men's hearts ablaze.
quotes.author: Kaliana Dietrich

quotes.quote: While the rest of the species is descended from apes, redheads are descended from cats.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: All the action adventure girls have red hair. Whenever it is an independent girl, not a sidekick person, when she has her own mind or does as good as the guys, she has red hair.
quotes.author: Marion Roach

quotes.quote: I'm ready to be an action figure. I'd love that very much. And all the redheaded kids will get to go out and feel loved and be able to buy a redheaded action figure.
quotes.author: Caleb Landry Jones

quotes.quote: Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Red hair, sir, in my opinion, is dangerous.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: With the red hair, you get the white skin; it's a package deal. The cons are that you never look particularly attractive on the beach. The pros are in a softly lit room, you look pretty.
quotes.author: Marcia Cross

quotes.quote: Having red hair is never good when you're a kid. I was picked on a lot and didn't have a lot of friends. But I think that gave me a thick skin and helped make me a better person.
quotes.author: Jesse Tyler Ferguson

quotes.quote: People were making fun of redheads before I came along.
quotes.author: Chris Lilley

quotes.quote: We redheads are a minority, we tend to notice each other - you know, and notice our identity.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: I am for sure a redhead and there aren't that many of us out there in music.
quotes.author: Melissa Auf Der Maur

quotes.quote: If you're betwixt and between, trust the one with red hair.
quotes.author: O.R. Melling

quotes.quote: Redheaded women buck like goats.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: It's my red hair that interferes with my good sense. All that color so close to my brain, it plum disorients me most days.
quotes.author: Kimberly Frost

quotes.quote: The blood of a redheaded woman is three degrees cooler than the blood of a normal woman. This has been established by medical studies.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: I love having my hair and makeup done for red carpets, but to have that done every day would be exhausting.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Red hair is great. It's rare, and therefore superior.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: You'd find it easier to be bad than good if you had red hair.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Red hair is my life long sorrow.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: I'm stronger and sassier as a redhead.
quotes.author: Kate Walsh

quotes.quote: In Georgia, rednecks are just wolves in wolf clothing. In Detroit, you don't know who's a redneck until you go home and meet their parents.
quotes.author: Joseph Bruce

quotes.quote: To me, redneck is a sense of self and a way of life.
quotes.author: Gretchen Wilson

quotes.quote: You can talk any redneck into a challenge. That's why so many rednecks die in strange ways.
quotes.author: Jase Robertson

quotes.quote: You might be a Redneck if you take a load to the dump and bring back more than you took.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Redneck law: Must have a gun. Must shoot it regularly.
quotes.author: Willie Robertson

quotes.quote: I ain't a redneck 'cause I talk American real good!
quotes.author: Alec Straub

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if... you can recognize your friends by the sound of their mufflers
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If your neighbors think you're a detective because a cop always brings you home, you might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if your house doesn't have curtains, but your truck does.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: If you've ever made change in the offering plate, you might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck ifâ€¦your home has more miles on it than your car.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: I don't know any redneck that's not into fun. That's their middle name: Red-Fun-Neck.
quotes.author: Si Robertson

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if you've ever stolen toilet paper from a public restroom.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if instead of buying your girlfriend candy and flowers, you spray paint her name on an overpass.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
How is a redneck divorce similar to a tornado?
You know that somewhere, somehow, someone is gonna lose a trailer.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: This is what we call a redneck air conditioner. It keeps you cool, it keeps you wet, wet t-shirt contest all in one.
quotes.author: Honey Boo Boo Child

quotes.quote: You may be a redneck if... you have spent more on your pickup truck than on your education.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: You may be a redneck if...you have spent more on your pickup truck than on your education.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Let's all sing the redneck national anthem: Settle for what you can get.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Do you know why it's so hard to solve a Redneck murder? 'Cause there's no dental records and all the DNA is the same.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: My long hair just can't cover up my redneck.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.quote: There's an intelligent redneck in all of us somewhere.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.quote: If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: What this world needs is a few more Rednecks.
quotes.author: Charlie Daniels

quotes.quote: When in doubt, figure it out. That's the redneck way.
quotes.author: Jase Robertson

quotes.quote: Nobody out-rednecks the great state of America.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: If you're afraid they might discover your redneck past, there are a hundred ways to cover your redneck past.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: There's the old joke, "What's the difference between country and redneck? Well, that's three hundred dollars."
quotes.author: Larry the Cable Guy

quotes.quote: Once the referee throws the ball in the air, it's either your ball or their ball and you have to just take your shot.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: The referees have it hard enough and we have to be honest to make their job easier.
quotes.author: Miroslav Klose

quotes.quote: The objective of a referee is not to get mentioned. I tell a lot of young referees that not being mentioned is king. If you can achieve that, that then it has been a pretty good game.
quotes.author: Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: I don't have any ideas, my coaches have them. I just pass the ideas on and referee the arguments.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: No matter how calmly you try to referee, parenting will eventually produce bizarre behavior, and I'm not talking about the kids. Their behavior is always normal.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The trouble with referees is that they know the rules, but they do not know the game.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: I ruined my hands in the ring. The referee kept stepping on them.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Never take your eyes off the ball, even when it's in the referee's pocket.
quotes.author: Christy Ring

quotes.quote: Time is only linear for engineers and referees.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Having one child makes you a parent, having two you are a referee.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: I was waiting for my teammates to embrace me and no one came, I told them, come hug me or the referee isn't going to allow it.
quotes.author: Diego Maradona

quotes.quote: You don't notice the referee during the game unless he makes a bad call.
quotes.author: Drew Curtis

quotes.quote: Life was a damned muddle a football game with everyone offside and the referee gotten rid of everyone claiming the referee would have been on his side.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The referee is going to be the most important person in the ring tonight besides the fighters.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: Referees are the law. They have a whistle. They blow it and that whistle is the articulation of God's justice.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.quote: As all of us with any involvement in sports knows, no two umpires or no two referees have the same strike zone or call the same kind of a basketball game.
quotes.author: Herb Kohl

quotes.quote: Although people rarely died playing Quid-ditch, referees had been known to vanish and turn up months later in the Sahara Desert.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The referee told me this league has never had a brawl of that magnitude, said Mr. Penderwick after a long, painful silence. Of course, at the time I was pretending to be a casual passerby and not a father at all.
quotes.author: Jeanne Birdsall

quotes.quote: I think you and the referee were in a minority of one, Billy.
quotes.author: Jimmy Armfield

quotes.quote: If you're good enough, the referee doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Jock Stein

quotes.quote: You must get involved to have an impact. No one is impressed by the won lost record of the referee.
quotes.author: John H. Holcomb

quotes.quote: It annoys me when people who don't know what they're talking about boo the referee.
quotes.author: Jonah Lomu

quotes.quote: When I saw Rijkaard entering the referee's dressing room I couldn't believe it. When Didier Drogba was sent off, I wasn't surprised.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.quote: Life is a game with many rules but no referee. One learns how to play it more by watching it than by consulting any book, including the holy book. Small wonder, then, that so many play dirty, that so few win, that so many lose.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: I do swear a lot, but the advantage of that having played abroad is that I can choose a different language from the referee's.
quotes.author: Jurgen Klinsmann

quotes.quote: Anyhow, isn't it a bit wrong to think happiness is all smooth and serene. Isn't it mostly a great energetic struggle, you against the universe a great whopping opponent, with the referee in its pocket?
quotes.author: Margaret Mahy

quotes.quote: McCarthy shakes his head in agreement with the referee.
quotes.author: Martin Tyler

quotes.quote: When government in pursuit of good intentions tries to rearrange the economy, legislate morality, or help special interests, the cost come in inefficiency, lack of motivation, and loss of freedom. Government should be a referee, not an active player.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: I want fifteen referees to be at this fight, because there ain't no one man who can keep up with the pace I'm gonna set except me.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: He does not depend on insider tips, crooked referees, or other sorts of hustles to make his bets. Nor does he have a "system" of any kind. He uses computer simulations, but does not rely upon them exclusively.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings of which every man has many not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: If I speak of myself in different ways, that is because I look at myself in different ways.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you have to look back in order to understand the things that lie ahead.
quotes.author: Yvonne Woon

quotes.quote: Each person you meet is an aspect of yourself, clamoring for love.
quotes.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quotes.quote: Living in a way that reflects one's values is not just about what you do, it is also about how you do things.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: Learning without reflection is a waste. Reflection without learning is dangerous.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is no future without a past, because what is to be cannot be imagined except as a form of repetition.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: You are a mirror of yourself in others. Whatever you want, give. Be the best reflection of yourself.
quotes.author: Karen A. Baquiran

quotes.quote: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Our language is the reflection of ourselves.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: Time and reflection change the sight little by little 'till we come to understand.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: People of the world don't look at themselves, and so they blame one another.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Love your Enemies, for they tell you your Faults.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is a most mortifying reflection for a man to consider what he has done, compared to what he might have done.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Detached reflection cannot be demanded in the presence of an uplifted knife.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Everyone and everything that shows up in our life is a reflection of something that is happening inside of us.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: The more peace we have within our own lives, the more we can reflect into the outer world.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: A soul without reflection, like a pile Without inhabitant, to ruin runs.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to take a break and breathe before you can keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Kayla Panchisin

quotes.quote: The way we experience the world around us is a direct reflection of the world within us.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: If you don't know what you are doing wrong, you can never know what you are doing right.
quotes.author: Chen Xinhua

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to take a half step back to take two forward.
quotes.author: Vince McMahon

quotes.quote: Who apart from ourselves, can see any difference between our victories and our defeats?
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: If we are to go forward, we must go back and rediscover those precious values – that all reality hinges on moral foundations, and that all reality has spiritual control.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Reflection in the mirror makes reality look at you.
quotes.author: Mario

quotes.quote: We cannot see our reflection in running water. It is only in still water that we can see.
quotes.author: Zen

quotes.quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Reflection is the lamp of the heart. If it departs, the heart will have no light.
quotes.author: Abdullah ibn Alawi al-Haddad

quotes.quote: Without reflection, we go blindly on our way, creating more unintended consequences, and failing to achieve anything useful.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Reflection on the infinite seems to call, almost by definition, for infinite reflection.
quotes.author: Daniel Taylor

quotes.quote: Reflection increases the vigor of the mind, as exercise does the strength of the body.
quotes.author: Pierre-Marc-Gaston de Lévis

quotes.quote: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Like water which can clearly mirror the sky and the trees only so long as its surface is undisturbed, the mind can only reflect the true image of the Self when it is tranquil and wholly relaxed.
quotes.author: Indra Devi

quotes.quote: Everything that happens to you is a reflection of what you believe about yourself. We cannot outperform our level of self-esteem. We cannot draw to ourselves more than we think we are worth.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Reflection can be its own reward.
quotes.author: Alena Graedon

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has many; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Universe is an empty mirror. World is just the reflection of your thoughts
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Reflection is one of the most underused yet powerful tools for success.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: A little reflection will show us that every belief, even the simplest and most fundamental, goes beyond experience when regarded as a guide to our actions.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: Reflection is a flower of the mind, giving out wholesome fragrance; but revelry is the same flower, when rank and running to seed.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Self-reflection is the school of wisdom.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Since everything is a reflection of our minds,everything can be changed by our minds.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The moon is the reflection of your heart and moonlight is the twinkle of your love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Learning without reflection is a waste, reflection without learning is dangerous.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The difference between you and me, is the different reflection that we both see.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: If you want the truth about being different, all you have to do is look in the mirror
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Reflection must be reserved for solitary hours; whenever she was alone, she gave way to it as the greatest relief; and not a day went by without a solitary walk, in which she might indulge in all the delight of unpleasant recollections.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Reflections of the battlements shimmered in the deep green moat, casting an image of enduring strength, an image that defied the very siege of time.
quotes.author: Karen Azinger

quotes.quote: The reflections on a day well spent furnish us with joys more pleasing than ten thousand triumphs.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Study without reflection is a waste of time; reflection without study is dangerous.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Reflection is not something you have a lot of time for.
quotes.author: Robert Battle

quotes.quote: Reflection makes men cowards.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Reflection can transform something familiar.
quotes.author: Diane L. Dunton

quotes.quote: The older you get, the more you realize that the way you look is a reflection of how you treat yourself.
quotes.author: Hope Davis

quotes.quote: Reflection is a flower of the mind, giving out wholesome fragrance; but revelry is the same flower, when rank and running to seed.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: The act of going within, finding our truth, and then sharing it, it helps us far more than we know.
quotes.author: Kamal Ravikant

quotes.quote: Without reflection, we go blindly on our way, creating more unintended consequences, and failing to achieve anything useful.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings -- of which every man has many -- not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Most people appear to live an unexamined life, cruising through the years without much reflection about what it means, and/or taking what life hands them and believing it's all predestined.
quotes.author: Steve Blank

quotes.quote: All truly great thoughts are conceived while walking.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A little reflection will show us that every belief, even the simplest and most fundamental, goes beyond experience when regarded as a guide to our actions.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: The heart is the best reflective thinker.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Some nights are made for torture, or reflection, or the savoring of loneliness.
quotes.author: Poppy Z. Brite

quotes.quote: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Sometimes, a girl just has to dive under the duvet and regroup.
quotes.author: Jody Gehrman

quotes.quote: A battle lost or won is easily described, understood, and appreciated, but the moral growth of a great nation requires reflection, as well as observation, to appreciate it.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The individual who says it is not possible, should move out of the way of those doing it.
quotes.author: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.quote: Habit rules the unreflecting herd.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Action and faith enslave thought, both of them in order not be troubled or inconvenienced by reflection, criticism, and doubt.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: A soul without reflection, like a pile Without inhabitant, to ruin runs.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: You can't take people's opinions personally. Usually what people say about it is a reflection of them own issues.
quotes.author: Terrence J

quotes.quote: The past can't be changed, can it? It can just be forgiven.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Just as a snake sheds its skin, we must shed our past over and over again.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Good looks are not something you earn. But as you get older, how you look is a reflection of the life you've led.
quotes.author: Diana Quick

quotes.quote: People will walk in and walk out of your life, but the one whose footstep made a long lasting impression is the one you should never allow to walk out.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face. Frown at it, and it will in turn look sourly upon you; laugh at it and with it, and it is a jolly kind companion.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: When the world is itself draped in the mantle of night, the mirror of the mind is like the sky in which thoughts twinkle like stars.
quotes.author: Khushwant Singh

quotes.quote: Work needs to be a reflection of your social values. You are how you work!
quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: As social beings we live with our eyes upon our reflection, but have no assurance of the tranquillity of the waters in which we see it.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: Sorry, always sorry. What in the world can you buy with an apology?
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: Can you remember who you were, before the world told you who you should be?
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: There is no future without a past, because what is to be cannot be imagined except as a form of repetition.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: Education doesn't need to be reformed- it needs to be transformed.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: Every abuse ought to be reformed, unless the reform is more dangerous than the abuse itself.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: People who have reformed themselves has contributed their full share towards the reformation of their neighbor.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: If the heart has been reformed by the spirit, it makes use of both the useful and delightful things created and given by God in a holy manner and with thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: What we need are not prohibitory marriage laws, but a reformed society, an educated public opinion which will teach individual duty in these matters.
quotes.author: Alfred Russel Wallace

quotes.quote: No confession is inerrant; Reformed Christians are supposed to be those who seek to be constantly reformed according to the Word of God - and that includes our confessions as well.
quotes.author: Oliver D. Crisp

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The best way to improve our lives is to improve our thoughts.
quotes.author: Sterling W Sill

quotes.quote: A position of dignity is more easily improved upon than acquired.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: To improve your life, be prepared to make new choices and decisions.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you want to improve the world, start by making people feel safer.
quotes.author: Stephen Porges

quotes.quote: The only way to improve tomorrow is to know what you did wrong today.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: If you want to improve the organization, you have to improve yourself.
quotes.author: Indra Nooyi

quotes.quote: In order to improve the mind, we ought less to learn, than to contemplate.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: The improvement of the mind improves the heart and corrects the understanding.
quotes.author: Agathon

quotes.quote: Improve your spare moments and they will become the brightest gems in your life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The adult works to improve his environment while the child works to improve himself.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: If you want to improve your life and the lives of those around you, you must take action.
quotes.author: Tom Rath

quotes.quote: In Reformed theology, if God is not sovereign over the entire created order, then he is not sovereign at all. The term sovereignty too easily becomes a chimera. If God is not sovereign, then he is not God.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The best Reformed theology isn't just about careful arguments for theologically sophisticated conclusions. It is about how to live the Christian life.
quotes.author: Oliver D. Crisp

quotes.quote: Improve every opportunity to be melancholy.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Mistakes could be improved if, It hits on Heart
quotes.author: Samar Sudha

quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Improvement is not enough, you also need innovation.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: That is the great contribution of Reformed thinking to the Christian church: theology for a life well-lived.
quotes.author: Oliver D. Crisp

quotes.quote: Improve your performance by improving your attitude.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: The only way to improve is to set yourself harder goals.
quotes.author: Joanne Whalley

quotes.quote: All that is deformed ought to be reformed. The Word of God alone teaches us what ought to be so, and all reform effected otherwise is vain.
quotes.author: Francis Lambert

quotes.quote: To improve our conditions we must first improve ourselves.
quotes.author: Charles F. Haanel

quotes.quote: Reformed theology belongs to this confessional tradition, and Reformed theologians and churches continue to write confessions even today.
quotes.author: Oliver D. Crisp

quotes.quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: It is refreshing to be able to express my views without having to toe a party line. It has got me into trouble on the odd occasion, but I am not going to stop saying what I think.
quotes.author: Pauline Hanson

quotes.quote: The sour quality is set opposite to the bitter and the sweet, and is a good temper to all, a refreshing and cooling when the bitter and the sweet qualities are too much elevated or too preponderant.
quotes.author: Jakob Bohme

quotes.quote: I think it's refreshing when the people you're looking up to mess up just like you do, but somehow, things, in their own way, work out.
quotes.author: Melanie Scrofano

quotes.quote: A change of environment is pretty refreshing.
quotes.author: Owen Farrell

quotes.quote: A change of season calls for a change of scent that is both energizing and refreshing.
quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

quotes.quote: Engagement with young people is always a refreshing break with routine. It's also a reminder of how we need to constantly keep our thinking agile and unencumbered by traditional rules.
quotes.author: Frans van Houten

quotes.quote: It's really refreshing to get these types of moments when people can say, 'Yeah, you're one of the best.'
quotes.author: Nnamdi Asomugha

quotes.quote: An all-white space has a purity that is refreshing and serene.
quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

quotes.quote: A little morphine in all the air. It would be wonderfully refreshing for everyone.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Oh. It's so refreshing to see something other than violence on the news.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Greeting at end of journey like refreshing rain after long drought.
quotes.author: Robert Ellis

quotes.quote: It is so refreshing to have somebody approach education so rationally!
quotes.author: Adam Cooper

quotes.quote: It was refreshing, actually. It was nice to hear some honesty in and about the swamp.
quotes.author: David Guggenheim

quotes.quote: Someone once said that long periods of abstinence can actually refresh the soul.
quotes.author: David Angell

quotes.quote: It's so refreshing to work with someone who'll throw a saddle on a gift horse rather than look it in the mouth.
quotes.author: Beau Willimon

quotes.quote: Strong Droughts of Their Refreshing Minds / To drink—enables Mine / Through Desert or the Wilderness / As bore it Sealed Wine—
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Ore the flat Green refreshing Breezes run / To make young Days blow beneath the sun;
quotes.author: Thomas Parnell

quotes.quote: Pour me a glass of that barefoot / moscato no ice just chill. / Well refreshing! / I know wine and I know what I like, / relax from the music flowing in the / air releasing all of this stress.
quotes.author: Te'Arra Poetry

quotes.quote: Softly breathes into your ear / All its fertilizing fullness, / While the moon's refreshing coolness, / Magic-laden, hovers near; / And, alas! ye're watered ever
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: To hear the sweet philosophy that trickles in and out / The while he is discoursing of the things we talk about; / A fountain-head refreshing--a clear, perennial spring / Is the genial conversation of John Lyle King!
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: Rejoicing in the sun: / That when my time is run / And daylight too, / I so might rest once more / Cool with refreshing dew.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: And there in the summer season the mavis sings, / And with her charming notes the woodland rings; / And the sweet-scented zephyrs is borne upon the gale, / Which is most refreshing and invigorating to inhale.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: To-day, fair This be, winsome girl! / Strays o'er the mead where daisies blow, / Or, ling'ring where the brooklets purl, / Laves in the cool, refreshing flow.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: And pitch dark beams of night to fall in a sedative trance, / a blissfully refreshing, celestial sleep.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Live your life, whoa / Turn up the radio / Tonight is all about / Refreshing lights / We living stereo
quotes.author: Arbise Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Soul refreshing, to see your face / You pick me up when I'm feeling down / And you chase my blues away
quotes.author: Chris Herbert

quotes.quote: The wonderful thing about Your love / (Keeps me knowing) / It's renewing and refreshing / (That's what Your love is) / Vital and life-giving
quotes.author: Hammond Hill

quotes.quote: Surround us in this place / And breathe new life within us / Send a refreshing glory / Purify our hearts
quotes.author: Daniel Moore

quotes.quote: But since it was Sunday and sunny I went for a stroll / The peanuts and pigeons and people put me in a hole / A blessing refreshing in you did unfold / Dispelling depressing distressing thoughts from my soul
quotes.author: John Edmund Andrew Phillips

quotes.quote: Music is the refuge of souls ulcerated by happiness.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Consistency is the last refuge of the unimaginative.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the refuge of hope.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Art is man's refuge from adversity.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Obscurity is the refuge of incompetence.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Work is the refuge of people who have nothing better to do.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Writing is a refuge from unhappiness, but has its own sorrows.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Crying is the refuge of plain women, but the ruin of pretty ones.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: God is our refuge and our strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Public opinion is the last refuge of a politician without any opinion.
quotes.author: Mark Bonham Carter

quotes.quote: We take refuge in pride, because we are afraid to tell the truth to ourselves.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: Look not for refuge to anyone beside yourself. Heed fast to the truth as a lamp.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: One may make their house a palace of sham, or they can make it a home, a refuge.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Books are a refuge, a sort of cloistral refuge, from the vulgarities of the actual world.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.quote: Make an island of yourself, make yourself your refuge; there is no other refuge. Make truth your island, make truth your refuge; there is no other refuge.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is the intimate refuge of every man and every woman in a world seemingly gone mad.
quotes.author: John Larkins

quotes.quote: All the times these arms were my only refuge from the world. Perhaps not fully appreciated then, but so sweet in my memory, and now gone forever.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Music is a place to take refuge. It's a sanctuary from mediocrity and boredom. It's innocent and it's a place you can lose yourself in thoughts, memories and intricacies
quotes.author: Lisa Gerrard

quotes.quote: You are your own refuge There is no other You cannot save another You can only save yourself.
quotes.author: Guillaume Musso

quotes.quote: The temples are a refuge from life's storms even a never-failing beacon guiding us to safety.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Silence is the universal refuge, the sequel to all dull discourses and all foolish acts, a balm to our every chagrin, as welcome after satiety as after disappointment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Tolerance is our safest refuge and our fortress against the handicaps that arise from schism, factions, and the difficulties inherent in reaching mutual agreement.
quotes.author: Fethullah Gulen

quotes.quote: All men have one refuge, a good friend, with whom you can weep and know that he does not smile.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Home is the first refuge from – and last defense against – the disappointments and the terrors of life.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: My last refuge, my books: simple pleasures, like finding wild onions by the side of a road, or requited love.
quotes.author: Tracy Letts

quotes.quote: There'll be times when the only refuge is books. Then you'll read as if you meant it, as if your life depended on it.
quotes.author: Ken Bruen

quotes.quote: Science has destroyed even the refuge of the inner life. What was once a sheltering haven has become a place of terror
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The only refuge left to us was the poet's ivory tower, which we climbed, ever higher, to isolate ourselves from the mob.
quotes.author: Gérard de Nerval

quotes.quote: We can find true refuge within our own hearts and minds-right here, right now, in the midst of our moment-to-moment lives.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: A refugee is as helpless as a new born child but not so appealing! Besides, a new born child has no memories!
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Refugee problems can only be solved in the region (of origin) - maybe with a little help from the UN. Governments must provide something for their countries. They need to deliver.
quotes.author: Yoweri Museveni

quotes.quote: Refugees are not terrorists. They are often the first victims of terrorism.
quotes.author: António Guterres

quotes.quote: Refugees didn't just escape a place. They had to escape a thousand memories until they'd put enough time and distance between them and their misery to wake to a better day.
quotes.author: Nadia Hashimi

quotes.quote: Refugees cannot be stopped, but they can and must be managed better, more humanely, protecting migrants' human rights whilst accepting states' rights to control their borders.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: No one puts their children in a boat unless the water is safer than the land.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: Migrants and refugees are not pawns on the chessboard of humanity. They are children, women and men who leave or who are forced to leave their homes for various reasons, who share a legitimate desire for knowing and having, but above all for being more.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: While every refugee's story is different and their anguish personal, they all share a common thread of uncommon courage the courage not only to survive, but to persevere and rebuild their shattered lives.
quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

quotes.quote: A lasting solution, the possibility to begin a new life, is the only dignified solution for the refugee himself.
quotes.author: Poul Hartling

quotes.quote: Refugees are people, they're not numbers on a score card.
quotes.author: Michelle Rempel

quotes.quote: Refugees have been displaced by war or natural disaster or political catastrophes, and they are much more threatening because they are reminders to people that all the comforts that we take for granted can be taken away in just a moment.
quotes.author: Nguyen Viet Thang

quotes.quote: For a start, people who traveled for so many miles through such horrific conditions in order to find work cannot accurately be portrayed as lazy benefit-scroungers.
quotes.author: Patrick Kingsley

quotes.quote: Refugees are going to continue to come, and the only question is what we are going to do to help them.
quotes.author: Davan Yahya Khalil

quotes.quote: The refugee crisis shows we can't be isolated from the world's geopolitical troubles.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

quotes.quote: It is as if families on the run are shattered by something other than just grenades. The flight and fear tears us apart and those parts land in all kinds of places we don't even know where.
quotes.author: Henning Mankell

quotes.quote: The refugees flee to protect their families from violence; the Europeans, on the other hand, fear for their jobs that they need to feed their families.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: People floating like pollen in search of more fertile soil.
quotes.author: Andrew Crofts

quotes.quote: There is no exodus that is done with people smiling.
quotes.author: Alfonse Munyanza

quotes.quote: The root cause of many conflicts which produce refugees is economic.
quotes.author: Julius K. Nyerere

quotes.quote: Norway opened the door for me, and I will always be grateful for that. Not everyone would risk opening a door for someone running away from a wild beast.
quotes.author: Koigi wa Wamwere

quotes.quote: Going back or staying here, either way, we die.
quotes.author: Wilson Ndabateze

quotes.quote: The word in Swahili for refugees is Wakimbizi, 'They run away.' I do not like this term.
quotes.author: Julius K. Nyerere

quotes.quote: Once we had a country and we thought it fair, / Look in the Atlas and you'll find it here: / We cannot go there now, my dear, we cannot go there now.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: A big man is always accused of gluttony, whereas a wizened or osseous man can eat like a refugee at every meal, and no one ever notices his greed.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: When the crowded Vietnamese refugee boats met with storms or pirates, if everyone panicked, all would be lost. But if even one person on the boat remained calm and centered, it was enough. It showed the way for everyone to survive.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: We have nowhere to go. It is not easy to live in another man's country but your own.
quotes.author: Ruth Perry

quotes.quote: I was forced to leave and flee and go away / it’s a day that I can't let go astray from the wind to the rain / I felt the pain of being a refugee / forced to leave my country for the war.
quotes.author: Steven Tant

quotes.quote: O, great man! O, great woman! Choose anything that is better than To be a refugee! Be a pretty flower in the corner of Your pretty and ruined house and Never be a missing refugee! Be under a broken tree and don't Be a refugee in a bad tent! Be anywhere within your destroyed house And do not choose to be a refugee!
quotes.author: Mohammad Skati

quotes.quote: To be called a refugee is the opposite of an insult; it is a badge of strength, courage, and victory.
quotes.author: Tennessee Office for Refugee

quotes.quote: A refugee is someone who survived and who can create the future.
quotes.author: Amela Koluder

quotes.quote: Reggae music is not an easy music to like when it comes to the power in society. Cause it talks about changing society. You won't find it readily accepted.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: It does not matter how sweet you can sing a song of love. You must know how to dance along with it. You can't dance "salsa dance" on a "reggae song".
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Most of the reggae awareness is still among music industry people and people who are already into all types of music.
quotes.author: Billy Gibbons

quotes.quote: Just can't live that negative way, make way for the positive day.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The winds that sometimes take something we love, are the same that bring us something we learn to love. Therefore we should not cry about something that was taken from us, but, yes, love what we have been given. Because what is really ours is never gone forever.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: You can fool some people sometimes, but you can’t fool all the people all the time.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Beginnings are usually scary, and endings are usually sad, but it’s everything in between that makes it all worth living.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Until the philosophy Which hold one race superior And another inferior, Is finally and permanently, Discredited and abandoned Everywhere is war.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: In Hawaii, some of the biggest radio stations are reggae. The local bands are heavily influenced by Bob Marley.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.quote: This world was not created piecemeal. Africa was born no later and no earlier than any other geographical area on this globe. Africans, no more and no less than other men, possess all human attributes, talents and deficiencies, virtues and faults.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie I

quotes.quote: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted; the indifference of those who should have known better; the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most; that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie I

quotes.quote: I can put a hip-hop beat to reggae. That is, I can have real reggae in the drums and in the rhythm, and on top of it I can put The Rolling Stones' feeling, anyone's feeling on top. Nobody has ever done this before, man.
quotes.author: Ike Turner

quotes.quote: Reggae is a culture.
quotes.author: Shaggy

quotes.quote: My musical influence is really from my father. He was a DJ in college. My parents met at New York University. So he listened to, you know, Motown, and he listened to Bob Dylan. He listened to Grateful Dead and Rolling Stones, but he also listened to reggae music. And he collected vinyl.
quotes.author: Talib Kweli

quotes.quote: A bird sitting on a tree is never afraid of the branch breaking, because her trust is not on the branch but on its own wings. Always believe in yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Reggae has a philosophy, you know? It's not just entertainment. There's an idea behind it, a way of life behind the music, which is a positive way of life, which is a progressive way of life for better people.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Reggae music is simple music - but it's from the heart. Just as people need water to drink, people also need music. If it is true music, the people will be drawn to it.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: God is like the sun. When the sun shines, it shines for everyone. God is for everyone.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Make the most of your regrets; never smother your sorrow, but tend and cherish it till it comes to have a separate and integral interest. To regret deeply is to live afresh.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future.
quotes.author: Fulton Oursler

quotes.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Regret of neglected opportunity is the worst hell that a living soul can inhabit.
quotes.author: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.quote: Life is too short, time is too precious, and the stakes are too high to dwell on what might have been.
quotes.author: Hilary Clinton

quotes.quote: Regret is an appalling waste of energy, you can't build on it - it's only good for wallowing in.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: A man has cause for regret only when he sows and no one reaps.
quotes.author: Charles Goodyear

quotes.quote: It's not what your are, it's what you don't become that hurts.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: One doesn't recognize the really important moments in one's life until it's too late.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Regrets are idle; yet history is one long regret. Everything might have turned out so differently.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.author: Jonathan Larson

quotes.quote: For of all sad words of tongue or pen, The saddest are these: 'It might have been!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Something you need most might be something you turn away from, something you turn away from might be something you regret, and something you regret, in the end, might cost you the one chance you ever had.
quotes.author: Brian Judge

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: If only. Those must be the two saddest words in the world.
quotes.author: Mercedes Lackey

quotes.quote: We have to let go of all blame, all attacking, all judging, to free our inner selves to attract what we say we want.
quotes.author: Joe Vitale

quotes.quote: Regret is ... an unavoidable result of any loss, for in loss we lose the tomorrow that we needed to make right our yesterday or today.
quotes.author: Gerald Lawson Sittser

quotes.quote: Often regret is very false and displaced, and imagines the past to be totally other than it was.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Remorse is the poison of life.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: In history as in human life, regret does not bring back a lost moment and a thousand years will not recover something lost in a single hour.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: I have always found that each step we take in life is to be regretted-if we once begin to wonder how many other steps might have been possible.
quotes.author: John Oliver Hobbes

quotes.quote: Let the dead Past bury its dead!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
quotes.author: David Grayson

quotes.quote: Regrets only apply when we don't learn from a situation. No sense looking back, look forward with new knowledge and no regret.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I would rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Live in the present tense, facing the duty at hand without regret for the past or worry over the future.
quotes.author: William De Witt Hyde

quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: If only. Those must be the two saddest words in the world.
quotes.author: Mercedes Lackey

quotes.quote: Some choices we live not only once but a thousand times over, remembering them for the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: Remorse is virtue's root; its fair increase are fruits of innocence and blessedness.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Remorse. Never yield to remorse, but at once tell yourself: remorse would simply mean adding to the first act of stupidity a second.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future.
quotes.author: Fulton Oursler

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: I would much rather have regrets about not doing what people said, than regretting not doing what my heart led me to and wondering what life had been like if I'd just been myself.
quotes.author: Brittany Ren_e

quotes.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.author: Jonathan Larson

quotes.quote: Regret is ... an unavoidable result of any loss, for in loss we lose the tomorrow that we needed to make right our yesterday or today.
quotes.author: Gerald Lawson Sittser

quotes.quote: Often regret is very false and displaced, and imagines the past to be totally other than it was.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Remorse is the poison of life.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: In history as in human life, regret does not bring back a lost moment and a thousand years will not recover something lost in a single hour.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Is it really so difficult to tell a good action from a bad one? I think one usually knows right away or a moment afterward, in a horrid flash of regret.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: The What-ifs and the should-have's will eat your brain.
quotes.author: John O' Callaghan

quotes.quote: Don't let the past steal your present.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: I think I don't regret a single 'excess' of my responsive youth--I only regret, in my chilled age, certain occasions and possibilities I didn't embrace.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: To feel today what one felt yesterday isn't to feel - it's to remember today what was felt yesterday, to be today's living corpse of what yesterday was lived and lost.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: The most regular and most perfect soul in the world has but too much to do to keep itself upright from being overthrown by its own weakness.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: When you work regularly, inspiration strikes regularly.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: MindlessÂ habitualÂ behavior is the enemy of innovation.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: Criminals are just regular people who didn't have time to read all the laws.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.quote: OurÂ habitualÂ experience is a complex of failure and success in the enterprise of interpretation. If we desire a record of uninterpreted experience, we must ask a stone to record its autobiography.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: It is theÂ habitual, not the periodical thought that decides your destiny.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Whatever is difficult can be done with regular attention and actions. Stay focused.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Regular people laugh harder. Industry people are stuffy, very judgmental.
quotes.author: Tony Rock

quotes.quote: Regular feedback is one of the hardest things to drive through an organization.
quotes.author: Kenneth Chenault

quotes.quote: In the midst of regular life, running is the touchstone that breathes adventure into my soul.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: The man of regular life and rational mind never despairs.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Regular chiropractic adjustments go hand in hand with good health.
quotes.author: Peter Fonda

quotes.quote: Whatever you would makeÂ habitual, practice it; and if you would not make a thingÂ habitual, do not practice it, but accustom yourself to something else.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: When a regular person gets sick, they take an aspirin. When a writer gets sick, they take notes.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Regular people are used to rudeness; we get it all the time, we're inured to it. The wealthy aren't; it hurts their feelings, or whatever they have in there.
quotes.author: Michael Cleverly

quotes.quote: Take the regular wagon track and never leave it.
quotes.author: James Clyman

quotes.quote: Regular people should not underestimate people who are small. In every aspect, they can do the things that normal people can.
quotes.author: Jyoti Amge

quotes.quote: Things we doÂ regularly become buried with habits, and we lose the ability to extract their powers to inspire.
quotes.author: Sara Genn

quotes.quote: Regular and simple life is the life of God; the chaotic and the complex one is the Devil's!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Do you pay regular visits to yourself? Start now.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It's a journey, it's a fight everyday. There was a real effort to stay in the program. So far this has been a very successful rehab.
quotes.author: Peter Hobson

quotes.quote: Rehab is one thing, but it takes years to get that attitude adjustment.
quotes.author: Johnny Colt

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: All rehab can do is tell you what's wrong with you and then suggest ways for you to get better.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: One of the things you learn in rehab is that you're responsible for your own actions.
quotes.author: Dale Archer

quotes.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes the furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The hope of the world lies in the rehabilitation of the living human being, not just the body but also the soul.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Every experience in your life is being orchestrated to teach you something you need to know to move forward.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Rehab is endlessly repetitive. And it's never easy, because once you've mastered some movement or action or word, no matter how small, you move on to the next. You never rest.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Giffords

quotes.quote: We have developed our own approach towards rehabilitating people, involving psychological rehabilitation, social rehab within families and of our Religious Rehabilitation Group.
quotes.author: Tony Tan

quotes.quote: If you can't fly, then run. If you can't run, then walk. If you can't walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Amazing how we can light tomorrow with today.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Rehab is like college for your head.
quotes.author: James Hetfield

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: All the boys in rehab are totally available because their girlfriends have all given up on them. It's fantastic.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Learning to face reality, refusing refuge in cliches and lies, fighting to find a way out that's what rehab is about.
quotes.author: Antonia Bird

quotes.quote: Never quit. If you stumble, get back up. What happened yesterday no longer matters. Today is another day so get on track and move closer to your dreams and goals. You can do it
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Recovery is a bit like an addiction; you take it day by day. If you set yourself too many goalposts, you'll have problems.
quotes.author: Simon Weston

quotes.quote: One of the things that's often forgotten about drug rehabilitation, it's not a destiny. It's a journey.
quotes.author: Peter Hobson

quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
