quotes.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Experience is not what happens to you it is what you do with what happens to you.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Recovery didn’t open the gates of heaven and let me in. Recovery opened the gates of hell and let me out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Recovery is about progression, not perfection.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Addiction is a monster; it lives inside, and feeds off of you, takes from you, controls you, and destroys you. It is a beast that tears you apart, rips out your soul, and laughs at your weakness. It is a stone wall that stands to keep you in and the rest out. It is a shadow that always lurks behind you, waiting to strike. Addiction lives in everyone’s mind, sitting, staring, waiting.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I’m not telling you it is going to be easy, I’m telling you it’s going to be worth it.
quotes.author: Art Williams

quotes.quote: Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Here may we reign secure, and in my choice to reign is worth ambition, though in Hell. Better to reign in hell than serve in heaven.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: He who reigns within himself and rules passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Nature has placed you on the throne of royalty as the heir of all life that preceded you.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: When you have spoken the word, it reigns over you. When it is unspoken you reign over it.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: I am monarch of all I survey, My right there is none to dispute, From the centre all round to the sea, I am lord of the fowl and the brute.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: To be a king and wear a crown is a thing more glorious to them that see it than it is pleasant to them that bear it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: A smart woman fixes her own crown and does not dethrone other women from their own glory. For she knows on her own, she is strong.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Do not wait for a coronation; the greatest emperors crown themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Powerful, yes, that is the word that I constantly rolled on my tongue, I dreamed of absolute power, the kind that forces others to kneel, that forces the enemy to capitulate, finally converting him, and the more the enemy is blind, cruel, sure of himself, buried in his conviction, the more his admission proclaims the royalty of he who has brought on his defeat.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Do not mistake the rule of force for true power. Men are not shaped by force.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years, I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm, and their inspiration to work together.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: One cannot reign innocently: the insanity of doing so is evident. Every king is a rebel and a usurper.
quotes.author: Louis Antoine de Saint-Just

quotes.quote: Every man may reign secure in his petty tyranny, and spread terror and desolation around him, until the trump of the Archangel shall excite different emotions in his soul.
quotes.author: James Otis

quotes.quote: No one is free who has not obtained the empire of himself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Rule with the heart of a servant. Serve with the heart of a king.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: The reign of tears is over. The slums will soon be only a memory. We will turn our prisons into factories and our jails into storehouses and comcribs. Men will walk upright now, women will smile, and the children will laugh. Hell will be forever for rent.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: Learn to use yours ears more and your mouth less, or your reign will be shorter than I am.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: One's only rival is one's own potentialities. One's only failure is failing to live up to one's own possibilities. In this sense, every man can be a king.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: I know I have but the body of a weak and feeble woman, but I have the heart and stomach of a king, and of a king of England too.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: Yea, he who is a true king of men, will not say to himself, 'Lo! I am worthy to be crowned with laurels;' but rather will he say to himself, 'What more is there that I may do to make the world the better because of my endeavors?
quotes.author: Howard Pyle

quotes.quote: Why, if one were Queen, would one ever want to marry? If one is ruler, is it not better to both King and Queen? That is exactly what a woman can do if she remains without a mate.
quotes.author: Kathryn Larsky

quotes.quote: To understand the nature of the people one must be a prince, and to understand the nature of the prince, one must be of the people.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: I'd like to be queen of people's hearts.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: The rule of the many is not well. One must be chief In war and one the king.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Don't you understand, mister, you are royalty and God has chosen you to be priest of your home?
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Divine right of kings means the divine right of anyone who can get uppermost.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: To be Omnipotent but friendless is to reign.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: A cruel reign is disordered and hidden in darkness, and while all shake with terror at the sudden explosions, not even he who caused all this disturbance escapes unharmed.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is a process of moving from one state of mind to another. Whether you are in a body or out of a body is immaterial.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is implicit in the manifested universe and is a basic and fundamental.
quotes.author: Alice Bailey

quotes.quote: Reincarnation makes life what it is intended to be a glorious adventure in which victory is absolutely sure to be ours if we persist. It proves that man [is] ... master of his fate on his road to the stars.
quotes.author: Shaw Desmond

quotes.quote: Reincarnation involves a free choice of action constantly, and constantly an opportunity for re-making one's self and one's surroundings.
quotes.author: Eustace Miles

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is not something that occurs at death; it is something that takes place at every moment. Death and rebirth are occurring every second.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is but a lifetime away.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is a process in which a finite being will go through a series of transmutations and will perceive different things. There will be a continuity of perception.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is the evolution of spirit through matter. Over thousands and millions of lifetimes, the soul evolves. It comes into the light. The growth is slow.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: For the first forty days a child is given dreams of previous lives. Journeys, winding paths, a hundred small lessons and then the past is erased.
quotes.author: Michael Ondaatje

quotes.quote: Every morning is like a new reincarnation into this world. Let us take it then for what it is and live each moment anew.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: The essence of all reincarnation is to have the best lifetime now that you've ever had, no matter what's going on.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Human life holds the glorious potential of granting us immortality if we use it to redirect our love from the ephemeral to the eternal.
quotes.author: Chaitanya Charan

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is not necessarily linear. Sometimes people actually become more immersed in darkness or illusion than they were in previous lifetimes.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: The soul comes from without into the human body, as into a temporary abode, and it goes out of it anew. it passes into other habitations, for the soul is immortal.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is the dissolution of the self. It's like going swimming in the ocean, no one ever comes out, because one has become the ocean.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is a dance. It is a movement of life to the rhythm of the universe. Spirit and matter join together as one dancing partner. They dance and it goes on forever.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Whether or not we believe in survival of consciousness after death, reincarnation, and karma, it has very serious implications for our behavior.
quotes.author: Stanislav Grof

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is happening all the time. Every moment we are going through a change. Our being isn't solid. Reincarnation is now.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann 1st Viscount Cherwell

quotes.quote: If reincarnation is a useful biological idea it is certain that somewhere in the universe it will happen.
quotes.author: Kary Mullis

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is simply changing awareness. What you are reincarnating into are different states of mind. The whole show is on the inside.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: We are born and reborn countless number of times, and it is possible that each being has been our parent at one time or another. Therefore, it is likely that all beings in this universe have familial connections.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is not what a lot of people think. Yes, we are eternal. No, everyone does not attain enlightenment; it's not necessary; life is smarter than we are.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is, indeed, the key which unlocks all doors, the universal "combination," before which our manacles fall from our limbs -- the life-line by which the crooked way is made straight.
quotes.author: Shaw Desmond

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is not an exclusively Hindu or Buddhist concept, but it is part of the history of human origin. It is proof of the mindstream's capacity to retain knowledge of physical and mental activities. It is related to the theory of interdependent origination and to the law of cause and effect.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: We are born and reborn again and again. We are changing with the waves of time.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Do your thoughts continue and repeat a cycle Seed, growth, bloom, and seed again.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: All who live possess eternal life, and few would trade it for an immortal body, if they truly understood what it is to be alive.
quotes.author: Audrey Auden

quotes.quote: Reincarnation contains a most comforting explanation of reality by means of which Indian thought surmounts difficulties which baffle the thinkers of Europe.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Reincarnation is essential to enable the soul to evolve to its Divine right.
quotes.author: R. F. Goudey

quotes.quote: Reincarnation doesn't simply mean that at the end of this life you will move on to another life in another body, it means that the spirit of life is continually renewing itself and moving to a higher level.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It's comin' on Christmas / They're cutting down trees / They're putting up reindeer and singing songs of joy and peace / Oh, I wish I had a river I could skate away on.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Take those flying reindeer, Santa's red and white color scheme, and his jolly disposition, for example. They are all probably linked to the use of hallucinogenic toad stool in ancient rituals.
quotes.author: Roger Highfield

quotes.quote: Do not examine the reindeer given by the rich man lest you find it to be without horns.
quotes.author: Finnish Proverbs

quotes.quote: Since the last Ice age, the reindeer's extraordinary adaptation to cold has sustained human life over vast tracts of the earth's surface, providing meat, fur, and transport.
quotes.author: Piers Vitebsky

quotes.quote: Bells tinkle on the on the lead reindeer while dog on short leashes dive closely alongside through the snow like dolphins beside the boat.
quotes.author: Piers Vitebsky

quotes.quote: It seems a reindeer was still better than a horse for riding in the afterlife.
quotes.author: Piers Vitebsky

quotes.quote: The evolutionary success of reindeer is due to its exceptional adaptation to cold, its gregarious nature, and its enormous powers of migration.
quotes.author: Piers Vitebsky

quotes.quote: The reindeer seems to appear as a typical polar animal, but the species has a very extensive distribution.
quotes.author: Sven Skjenneberg

quotes.quote: Reindeer are called Caribou in North America.
quotes.author: Rebecca Pettiford

quotes.quote: Double coats keep reindeer warm. Short hairs near the skin trap air and heat.
quotes.author: Rebecca Pettiford

quotes.quote: Their outer hairs are hollow. These help reindeer stay warm and float in water.
quotes.author: Rebecca Pettiford

quotes.quote: Salt is as necessary for reindeer as for other kinds of livestock. On the coast, the reindeer obtain it in summer by drinking sea water or licking up saline deposits on the beach.
quotes.author: L.J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Reindeer teeth are quite small and flat, ideal for grinding up the grass and moss that they most like to eat.
quotes.author: Rod Green

quotes.quote: Reindeer can draw sledge-loads at a speed of twelve to fifteen miles an hour for hours at a time.
quotes.author: Edna Barth

quotes.quote: Grey wolves, polar bears, and brown bears hunt reindeer. Golden eagles sometimes attack young reindeers. Wolverines attack reindeer, too. People also hunt reindeer for their meat and antlers.
quotes.author: Katie Marsico

quotes.quote: Camels are snobbish and sheep, unintelligent; water buffaloes, neurasthenic--even murderous. Reindeer seem over-serious.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: I don't like reindeer. They seem like regular deer, only more dangerous
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: In China, I had my body lit on fire. And in Russia, I took a bath in reindeer blood, which apparently had some kind of youth-enhancing elements.
quotes.author: Hailey Gates

quotes.quote: And every mother's child is gonna spy / To see if reindeers really know how to fly?
quotes.author: George Strait

quotes.quote: Reindeer are the very twinkling in the eye of the holiday that we call Christmas.
quotes.author: Vector

quotes.quote: Reindeer are flight and motion and magic in moonlight beyond all recalling, made of Christmas dreams, spun from a place beyond all fearing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Reindeer are like metaphoric rain for Christmas lore: they soften the heart and give the soul dreams to grow on all year round.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Reindeer are not only for children; they are for grandmothers fond of watching the moon.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Reindeer are not just accompaniments or accessories to Christmas; they are the caboose and the train, literally.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Without reindeer Santa is like so much snow.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: ReinventÂ your business constantly. The end goal may be the same, but the tools and methods are constantly evolving.
quotes.author: Ken Tucker

quotes.quote: It takes courage to reinvent joys, to reinvent opportunities, to reinvent dreams, to reinvent connections, to reinvent hopes that you have set aside.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: The desire for reinvention seems to arise most often when companies hear the siren call of synergy and start to expand beyond their core businesses.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Reinventing the wheel is sometimes the right thing, when the result is the radial tire
quotes.author: Jonathan Gilbert

quotes.quote: Reinventing myself is a result of not appreciating myself. As such, that kind of reinvention needs an intervention.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: It's ok to reinvent yourself as many times as it takes to live out your most authentic self.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: We didn't reinvent the circus. We repackaged it in a much more modern way.
quotes.author: Guy Laliberte

quotes.quote: The idea of reinvention has always seemed bizarre to me.
quotes.author: Robert Smith

quotes.quote: We mustÂ reinventÂ a future free of blinders so that we can choose from real options.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: You have toÂ reinventÂ to stay fresh, to stay in the game
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: The reinvention of daily life means marching off the edge of our maps.
quotes.author: Bob Black

quotes.quote: You've got to keepÂ reinventing. You'll have new competitors. You'll have new customers all around you.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a war for the reinvention of lives.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: It's a lot of work to keepÂ reinventing yourself and coming up with new stuff, but that's what it takes to be in show business.
quotes.author: Donny Osmond

quotes.quote: Many people come to reinvention when life changes around them, but people come in all different stripes. I'm oriented to change.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.quote: To avoid becoming chronically unemployed, people need more than platitudes offering sympathy. Career reinvention requires encouragement and guidance.
quotes.author: Nina Easton

quotes.quote: Continue toÂ reinvent. Keep things moving and changing and growing and always a little bit out of reach.
quotes.author: Jad Abumrad

quotes.quote: As weÂ reinventÂ our life endlessly we should open our minds to the infinite possibilities that do exist.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: The physical reinvention of the world is endless, relentless, fascinating, exhaustive; nothing that seems solid is. If you could stand at just a little distance in time, how fluid and shape-shifting physical reality would be, everything hurrying into some other form, even concrete, even stone.
quotes.author: Mark Doty

quotes.quote: That's what leads to a reinvention of yourself - being fully present and in the moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You are designed toÂ reinventÂ and re-create yourself, over and over again. And, you are here-whether you want to acknowledge it or not; whether you even know it or not-for the evolution of your own soul.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Be prepared toÂ reinventÂ yourself. Be prepared to go out on a limb occasionally, and be prepared to do the things that you feel strongly about
quotes.author: Hillman Curtis

quotes.quote: We have toÂ reinventÂ the wheel every once every once in a while, not because we need a lot of wheels; but because we need a lot of inventors.Â
quotes.author: Bruce Joyce

quotes.quote: The good thing aboutÂ reinventing the wheel is that you can get a round one.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: ToÂ reinventÂ your own country you need a great audacity of hope.
quotes.author: Jurgen Moltmann

quotes.quote: Reinvention is the key to surviving this fashion industry. Madonna is the perfect example of reinvention. She has taken something that is so little and turned herself into a legend by simply never staying the same.
quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

quotes.quote: ReinventÂ new combinations of what you already own. Improvise. Become more creative. Not because you have to, but because you want to. Evolution is the secret for the next step.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Most fears of rejection rest on the desire for approval from other people. Don't base your self-esteem on their opinions.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: I take rejection as someone blowing a bugle in my ear to wake me up and get going, rather than retreat.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Rejection can disappoint you, depress you and may even stop you in your tracks... learn not to take rejection so personally... if you're honest with yourself and believe in your work, others will too.
quotes.author: Bev Jozwiak

quotes.quote: Artistic rejection is like taking cod liver oil; they say it's good for you, you know they're right, but it can be still tough to swallow.
quotes.author: Ian Semple

quotes.quote: Rejection doesn't have to mean you aren't good enough; it often just means the other person failed to notice what you have to offer.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: Dear to us are those who love us but dearer are those who reject us as unworthy, for they add another life; they build a heaven before us whereof we had not dreamed, and thereby supply to us new powers out of the recesses of the spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every rejection is incremental payment on your dues that in some way will be translated back into your work.
quotes.author: James Lee Burke

quotes.quote: Rejection is the sand in the oyster, the irritation that ultimately produces the pearl.
quotes.author: Burke Wilkinson

quotes.quote: A boo is a lot louder than a cheer. If you have 10 people cheering and one person booing, all you hear is the booing.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Human rejection can be God's divine protection.
quotes.author: Paula Hendricks

quotes.quote: Rejection gives you more power to push forward.
quotes.author: Jeremy Limn

quotes.quote: Rejection is part of the game. Or rather, rejection is part of the profession. A profession which at times can feel like a game.
quotes.author: Robin Black

quotes.quote: You get used to the rejection and you don't take it personally.
quotes.author: Daniel Craig

quotes.quote: Rejection is merely a redirection; a course correction to your destiny.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Each rejection brings us closer to acceptance.
quotes.author: Ramesh Lohia

quotes.quote: We are always afraid to ask because we aren't afraid of the answer but the feeling of rejection.
quotes.author: Anna R.

quotes.quote: There's nothing like rejection to make you do an inventory of yourself.
quotes.author: James Lee Burke

quotes.quote: Do not waste yourself in rejection; do not bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The effects of rejection can either kill your muse or change your life.
quotes.author: Jane Champagne

quotes.quote: It is necessary to put yourself out for rejection, and accept that you will be rejected.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Learn to eat rejection; it will make you stronger.
quotes.author: Bob Ragland

quotes.quote: A clear rejection is always better than a fake promise.
quotes.author: Rihanna A Mohammed

quotes.quote: Rejection isn't a sign that something is wrong for you it's a sign that they're wrong for you.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Don't feel bad if someone rejects you or ignore you. People usually reject and ignore expensive things because they can't afford them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Rejected pieces aren't failures; unwritten pieces are.
quotes.author: Greg Daugherty

quotes.quote: I always feel like rejection is my petrol. That's what keeps me going.
quotes.author: Laura Kightlinger

quotes.quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Just because you are different does not mean that you have to be rejected.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Really rejoice in being yourself. Have your own drumbeat.
quotes.author: Kim Cattrall

quotes.quote: When we rejoice in beautiful scenery, great art, and great music, it is but the flexing of instincts acquired in another place and another time.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You will be able to check envy if you rejoice with the man whom you envy whenever he rejoices, and grieve whenever he grieves.
quotes.author: Maximus the Confessor

quotes.quote: To rejoice in life, to find the world beautiful and delightful to live in, was a mark of the Greek spirit, which distinguished it from all that had gone before. It is a vital distinction.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: True joy is independence of circumstances - Choose to rejoice!
quotes.author: Andrew Wommack

quotes.quote: We have every reason in time and eternity to rejoice and give thanks for the quality of our lives and the blessings we have been given.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them, do not. Miss them, do not. Attachment leads to jealousy. The shadow of greed, that is. Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: Let us rejoice at the many unexplored fields in which there is unlimited fame and fortune to the successful explorer.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: To rejoice in conquest is to rejoice in murder.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Let us rejoice in the truth, wherever we find its lamp burning.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: It is cheerful to God when you rejoice or laugh from the bottom of your heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Christians rejoice even while they truly sorrow - because their rejoicing is in the hope of heaven... While joy overcomes sorrow, it does not put an end to it.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Men of this world all rejoice in others being like themselves, and object to others not being like themselves.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Rejoice and be glad, you have life, the greatest gift.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To rejoice in temporal comforts is dangerous, to rejoice in self is foolish, to rejoice in sin is fatal, but to rejoice in God is heavenly.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: You have no obligation under the sun other than to discover your real needs, to fulfill them, and to rejoice in doing so.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: When you appreciate the blessings in life, your soul rejoices.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Rejoice as summer should...chase away sorrows by living.
quotes.author: Melissa Marr

quotes.quote: Take spring when it comes and rejoice. Take happiness when it comes and rejoice. Take love when it comes and rejoice.
quotes.author: Carl Ewald

quotes.quote: Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Children have neither past nor future - they rejoice in the present.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.quote: Rejoice and be glad all you who hope in the Lord.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To rejoice in life, to find the world beautiful and delightful to live in, was a mark of the Greek spirit which distinguished it from all that had gone before. It is a vital distinction.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: Rejoice that you have still have a long time to live, before the thought comes to you that there is nothing more in the world to see.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He who rejoices even at the stake triumphs not over pain but over the absence of pain where he had anticipated feeling it. A parable.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: No one rejoices more in revenge than woman.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Rejoice while you have breath.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The proof of a well-trained mind is that it rejoices in which is good and grieves at the opposite.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: When you cannot rejoice in feelings, circumstances or conditions, rejoice in the Lord.
quotes.author: A. B. Simpson

quotes.quote: Rekindle the glowing spirit for success in your heart. Refresh your mind with possibility thoughts and never give way for your passion to drink from the cup of tiredness. Be renewed in your thoughts every single day.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We need to rekindle those values, those strengths as a nation and as a people... And we must do so as one people with one goal.
quotes.author: Kamla Persad-Bissessar

quotes.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Nothing revives the past so completely as a smell that was once associated with it.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Revive your inner spirit! Break free from all things weighing you down, grab hold of your strong rope and lift yourself out of hopelessness!
quotes.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quotes.quote: We must rekindle the fire of idealism in our society.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Withdraw from talking about leaving someone behind. Just rekindle the friendship and love while you still have that moment together.
quotes.author: RSCruz

quotes.quote: It is time to rekindle the spirit of the Renaissance to achieve a golden age that will be a turning point for human productivity and quality of life.
quotes.author: Joel Garreau

quotes.quote: Expect to have hope rekindled. Expect your prayers to be answered in wondrous ways. The dry seasons in life do not last. The spring rains will come again.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Read the Scripture to renew your mind. Mediate on the Scripture to nourish your soul. Affirm the Scripture to revive your spirit.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Rekindle the fire in your spirit.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Rekindled love is generally short-term.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: To revive sorrow is cruel.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The best way to revive a church is to build a fire in the pulpit.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: You can renew your mind and revive spirit by reading great stories.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Renew thyself completely each day.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You can renew your mind by filling it with the Word of God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Let us renew our trust in God, and go forward without fear.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Life alone can rekindle life.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: We dance to rekindle the soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Music revives the recollections it would appease.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Once your motivation is killed, it's kind of hard to revive it and bring it back to life.
quotes.author: Ginuwine

quotes.quote: Memory is the power to revive again in our minds those ideas which after imprinting have disappeared, or have been laid aside out of sight.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: God use times of adversity to revive the spirit of every man.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Positive thoughts revive the spirit, restore the soul and make the body healthy.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Relationships, marriages are ruined where one person continues to learn, develop and grow and the other person stands still.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Do what you did in the beginning of a relationship and there won't be an end.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Once you realize that your relationship is more important than your individual point of view. That's where the true definition of â€œunionâ€ lives.
quotes.author: Lauren Handel Zander

quotes.quote: In relationship, always remember: When the pain of holding on is greater than the pain of letting go, it's time to let go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Relationships are like birds. If you hold tightly they die. If you hold Loosely they fly. But, if you hold with care, they remain with you forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If a woman stands behind you, respect her; if she stands beside you, cherish her; if she stands with you, adore her.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: The best way to remain in your relationship is to keep other people out of your relationship.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No matter how long you have been waiting, the man God has for you will surpass your expectations. You will meet him when god says so. Not a minute early, not a moment later.
quotes.author: Michelle McKinney Hammond

quotes.quote: Every relationship is work.
quotes.author: Bill Hader

quotes.quote: The most important ingredient we put into any relationship is not what we say or what we do, but what we are.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In relationships, everyone makes mistakes. If you are forgiven for yours, don't take it for granted.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: If you can't be happy and content by yourself then you shouldn't be in a relationship.
quotes.author: Evan Sutter

quotes.quote: Relationships are like broken glass. Sometimes it's better to leave them broken than hurt yourself trying to put the pieces back together
quotes.author: Alex Haditaghi

quotes.quote: A great relationship should be based on two main principles: First, appreciate your similarities, and second, respect your differences.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good relationship starts with good communication.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Problems in relationship occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: A relationship with God is the most important relationship you can have.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you model your relationship on someone else's, your partner can never match up to the fantasy.
quotes.author: Nikki Bayley

quotes.quote: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Relationships end, but they don't end your life.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: In any relationship where one person depends on another to be his or her parachute -- and the other accepts this role -- both will fall to the ground.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
quotes.author: Domenico Cieri Estrada

quotes.quote: Relationships are not about "I want this" or "I want that", they are about two people caring for the other's desires.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't rush into any kind of relationship. Work on yourself. Feel yourself, experience yourself and love yourself. Do this first and you will soon attract that special loving other.
quotes.author: Russ Von Hoelscher

quotes.quote: `A happy relationship is made up of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: Women who marry for money and Men who marry for beauty are equally robbed in the end.
quotes.author: Harmon Okinyo

quotes.quote: Hold no grudges and practice forgiveness. This is the key to having peace in all your relationships.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Work on your relationships... Relationships need renewal or they die
quotes.author: Bo Sanchez

quotes.quote: Secrets are festering parasites to a relationship, devouring their hosts from within, leaving behind a empty hollow husk of what once was.
quotes.author: Mark W. Boyer

quotes.quote: For lack of an occasional expression of love, a relationship strong at the seams can wear thin in the middle.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: A lovers' quarrel is always about every quarrel you ever had.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Problems in relationship occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: In a relationship, it is demeaning to constantly seek your partner's approval. In such relationships, real caring, depth or even love is missing.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Never love anybody that treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If your love for another person doesn't include loving yourself then your love is incomplete.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Every relationship has its own problems. But sometimes what makes it perfect is if you still wanna be together, when things go the wrong way.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: Trouble is part of your life, and if you don't share it, you don't give the person who loves you enough chance to love you enough.
quotes.author: Dinah Shore

quotes.quote: There is no pain equal to that which two lovers can inflict on one another.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: The best person to talk to about the problems in your relationship is the person you're in a relationship with.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Every couple needs to argue now and then. Just to prove that the relationship is strong enough to survive. Long-term relationships, the ones that matter, are all about weathering the peaks and the valleys.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: How can our relationship grow when you don't respect my need to discuss everything that is wrong with you?
quotes.author: Michael Lipsey

quotes.quote: I love her too, but our neuroses just don't match.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: When you're in a relationship, you're always surrounded by a ring of circumstances... joined together by a wedding ring, or in a boxing ring.
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: In general, the problem in a relationship is when the couple stagnate.
quotes.author: Simon Baker

quotes.quote: When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.
quotes.author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock

quotes.quote: Miscommunication is endless.
quotes.author: JP Rattie

quotes.quote: Disrespect is fatal to a relationship.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: If you want equal rights in a relationship, then you need to put in equal efforts.
quotes.author: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.quote: A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself to laugh with me, but never at me; to cry with me, but never because of me; to love life, to love himself, to love being loved. Such a relationship is based upon freedom and can never grow in a jealous heart.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: A great relationship doesn't happen because of the love you had in the beginning, but how well you continue building love until the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A great relationship is about two things, first, find out the similarities, second, respect the differences.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A healthy relationship is built on unwavering trust.
quotes.author: Beau Mirchoff

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out you do not go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a rose. How long it lasts, no one knows. Love can erase an awful past, love can be yours, you'll see at last. To feel that love, it makes you sigh. To have it leave, you'd rather die. You hope you've found that special rose, cause you love and care for the one you choose.
quotes.author: Cella

quotes.quote: A relationship is lovely if you're happy, comfortable in it and you really like the person. I can think of nothing better. But there's nothing worse than having a relationship in which you feel no interest.
quotes.author: Susannah York

quotes.quote: A relationship, I think, is like a shark. You know? It has to constantly move forward or it dies. And I think what we got on our hands is a dead shark.
quotes.author: Woody Allen Annie Hall

quotes.quote: A true relationship is when you can tell each other anything and everything. No secrets and no lies.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All relationships have one law. Never make the one you love feel alone, especially when you're there.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: An intimate relationship does not banish loneliness. Only when we are comfortable with who we are can we truly function independently in a healthy way, can we truly function in a relationship. Two halves do not make a whole when it comes to a healthy relationship. It takes two wholes.
quotes.author: Patricia Fry

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Before we can have a successful relationship with anyone, we first need a perfect personal relationship.
quotes.author: Russ Von Hoelscher

quotes.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that prevents you from being yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of life's satisfaction comes from meaningful relationships.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Every good relationship, especially marriage, is based on respect. If it's not based on respect, nothing that appears to be good will last very long.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: Human relationships always help us to carry on because they always presuppose further developments, a future - and also because we live as if our only task was precisely to have relationships with other people
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I refuse to let my past relationships make me bitter. I still believe in love and am open to anything that will come my way!
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: If a relationship is to evolve it must go through a series of endings.
quotes.author: Lisa Moriyama

quotes.quote: In a relationship each person should support the other; they should lift each other up.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: In a relationship if you are giving and getting nothing back in return, stop giving so much, and spend time being. Give to yourself, be who you are.
quotes.author: Brenda Shoshanna

quotes.quote: In reality, the only way a relationship will last is if you see your relationship as a place that you go to give, and not a place that you go to take.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Our greatest joy and our greatest pain comes in our relationships with others
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement...all success... all achievement in real life grows.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Relationship is an art. The dream that two people create is more difficult to master than one.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Relationships are always stronger when you are best friends first and a couple second.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermen Hesse

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Love is unconditional, relationships are not.
quotes.author: Grant Gudmundson

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: Relationships end, but they don't end your life. But people do often spending more time finding out about failed relationships than finding successful ones.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Celebrate endings - for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: So often the end of a love affair is death by a thousand cuts, so often its survival is life by a thousand stitches.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In any relationship in which two people become one, the end result is two half people.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The end of a relationship is not always a failure. Sometimes all the love in the world is not enough to save something. In these cases, it is not a matter of fault from either person. Some things cannot be, it's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: A sad thing in life is that sometimes you meet someone who means a lot to you only to find out in the end that it was never bound to be and you just have to let go.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews Band

quotes.quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To meet, to know, to love and then to part, is the sad tale of many a heart.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering, of tarnishing.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The loss of love is not nearly as painful as our resistance to accepting it is.
quotes.author: Tigress Luv

quotes.quote: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Even the best of friends face conflicts, but that needn't mean the end of the relationship.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: If a relationship is to evolve, it must go through a series of endings.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Any time you end a relationship, and everyone has ended plenty in their life, it's always a tough thing and hard to get over.
quotes.author: Adam Brody

quotes.quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: If love breaks more than a heart, maybe it's a sign and time to step out.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: We mistakenly assume that if our partners love us they will react and behave in certain ways - the ways we react and behave when we love someone.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.author: Wiston Auden

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Think about any attachments that are depleting your emotional reserves. Consider letting them go.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You can love them, forgive them, want good things for them ... but still move on without them.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that loves knows not its own death until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every now and then go away, have a little relaxation, for when you come back to your work your judgment will be surer. Go some distance away because then the work appears smaller and more of it can be taken in at a glance and a lack of harmony and proportion is more readily seen.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The mind should be allowed some relaxation, that it may return to its work all the better for the rest.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Relaxation means releasing all concern and tension and letting the natural order of life flow through one's being.
quotes.author: Donald Curtis

quotes.quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Learn to relax. Your body is precious, as it houses your mind and spirit. Inner peace begins with a relaxed body.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: During [these] periods of relaxation after concentrated intellectual activity, the intuitive mind seems to take over and can produce the sudden clarifying insights which give so much joy and delight.
quotes.author: Fritjof Capra

quotes.quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It is necessary to relax your muscles when you can. Relaxing your brain is fatal.
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: When was the last time you spent a quiet moment just doing nothing - just sitting and looking at the sea, or watching the wind blowing the tree limbs, or waves rippling on a pond, a flickering candle or children playing in the park?
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: It is requisite for the relaxation of the mind that we make use, from time to time, of playful deeds and jokes.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Relax and refuse to let worry and stress rule your life. There is always a solution to every problem. Things will work out for you when you take time to relax, refresh, restore and recharge your soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: He enjoys true leisure who has time to improve his soul's estate.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's important to work for that pot of gold. But other times it's essential to take time off and to make sure that your most important decision in the day simply consists of choosing which color to slide down the rainbow.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: Man is so made that he can only find relaxation from one kind of labor by taking up another.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: If a man insisted always on being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: I relax my body completely, relax my mind completely, and then imagine myself at a level where anything can happen.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Take the next 24 hours and just relax with the knowing that everything is okay. Let go of the stress and worry for one day and see what happens.
quotes.author: Mike Basevic

quotes.quote: The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
quotes.author: Mark Black

quotes.quote: How beautiful it is to do nothing, and then to rest afterward.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Taking time out each day to relax and renew is essential to living well.
quotes.author: Judith Hanson Lasater

quotes.quote: It's a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: If you want to relax, watch the clouds pass by if you're laying on the grass, or sit in front of the creek; just doing nothing and having those still moments is what really rejuvenates the body.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
quotes.author: Jim Goodwin

quotes.quote: No matter how much pressure you feel at work, if you could find ways to relax for at least five minutes every hour, you'd be more productive.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: What is the answer to this fatigue? Relax! Relax! Relax! Learn to relax while you are doing your work!
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The more relaxed you can get, the better you'll do.
quotes.author: Isaac Mizrahi

quotes.quote: Release and resolve fear, and what you want flows freely.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Belief releases creative powers.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Imagination releases power to achieve goals.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: Yoga releases the creative potential in life.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Let your imagination release your imprisoned possibilities.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: You have permission to release your loyalty to past mistakes.
quotes.author: LaShaun Middlebrooks Collier

quotes.quote: You have to release your emotion in order to keep your sanity.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness lies in the mind's release from worldly ties.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Grief releases love and it also instills a profound sense of connection.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.quote: Love releases incredible energy that promotes the biochemistry of healing.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: When you believe in people, you motivate them and release their potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: With definite goals you release your own power, and things start happening.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You are a potential genius, so unleash your potential to release your genius.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The function of music is to release us from the tyranny of conscious thought.
quotes.author: Thomas Beecham

quotes.quote: When you release your faith in uncommon ways, you'll see God do uncommon things.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: To release others from the expectations we have of them is to really love them.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to release the emotions you have struggled all your life to contain.
quotes.author: Ellen Bass

quotes.quote: Release the joy that is inside of another, and you release the joy that is inside of you.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Release and regulate the flow of your inborn creative energy to reach your artistic potential.
quotes.author: Nita Leland

quotes.quote: Forgiveness releases you from a past that no longer defines you. Allow yourself to move on.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: When you release your expectations that the world should fulfill you, your disappointments vanish.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm releases the drive to carry you over obstacles and adds significance to all you do.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Release all the anxiety that keeps you from moving ahead. Keep breathing it out and letting it go
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: From time to time, one must release the grime built up inside them to to free their emotions like the ocean.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Release from fear, worry, and doubt leaves us free to function normally, healthfully, and confidently.
quotes.author: Joel S. Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Words have the power to release pent-up emotions as well as to define them in rational and meaningful terms.
quotes.author: Jeff Cohen

quotes.quote: Release what no longer serves you to create a space for that which does. And yes, sometimes this even means people.
quotes.author: Randy Gage

quotes.quote: We nurture our creativity when we release our inner child. Let it run and roam free. It will take you on a brighter journey.
quotes.author: Serina Hartwell

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure in order to embrace the new & unknown.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Dreams can be relentless tyrants.
quotes.author: Morgan Llywelyn

quotes.quote: Destiny is simply the relentless logic of each day we live.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Write relentlessly, until you find your voice. Then, use it.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: Be relentless in your looking, because you are the one you seek.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A brutal, relentless self-analysis lies at the heart of all despair.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Be kind and generous to your fellows, but hard and relentless with yourself.
quotes.author: Franz Bardon

quotes.quote: Be relentlessly generous, without focusing on when it will come back to you.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Stay the course. When thwarted try again; harder; smarter. Persevere relentlessly.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The future is not as loud as war, but it is relentless. It has a terrible fury all its own.
quotes.author: Lauren Beukes

quotes.quote: The secret to genius is not genetics but daily practice married with relentless perseverance.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: If you want to be the best in your industry you need to have a relentless dedication to your job.
quotes.author: Danica Patrick

quotes.quote: Gentlemen, we will chase perfection, and we will chase it relentlessly, knowing all the while we can never attain it. But along the way, we shall catch excellence
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Anger is the noise of the soul; the unseen irritant of the heart; the relentless invader of silence.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: We gain no easier advantage than by relentlessly pursuing our goal while others pursue an advantage.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Life is choices, and they are relentless. No sooner have you made one choice than another is upon you.
quotes.author: Atul Gawande

quotes.quote: A relentless focus on the outward markers of success can lead to complacency. It can make you lazy.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Some of us have a relentless urge to attempt what we can never be good at and neglect our true calling.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Keep a relentless eye on your goals! Perseverance, joyful dedication, and unwavering focus will get you there!
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: A man who relentlessly perspires to do excellence evidently inspires many with his intelligence and elegance.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Only a minute to minute relentless struggle can balance one's natural but stupefying insistence to remain unchanged.
quotes.author: Taisha Abelar

quotes.quote: Everything depends on how relentlessly one forces from experience the last drop, sweet or bitter, it can possibly give.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: Leaders relentlessly upgrade their team, using every encounter as an opportunity to evaluate, coach, and build self-confidence.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Nature is relentless and unchangeable, and it is indifferent as to whether its hidden reasons and actions are understandable to man or not.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: We all have a relentless yearning to attach and connect, to love and be loved. This relationship hunger is the fiercest longing of the human soul.
quotes.author: Dave Earley

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is another opportunity to relentlessly and confidently push harder with your dream. You definitely haven"t given it your all until you are living in its reality.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Be relentless in pursuing your happiness.
quotes.author: Theo Rossi

quotes.quote: Be relentless and then you'll break through.
quotes.author: Julie Brown

quotes.quote: Be relentless in your pursuit for expansion.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Would Christ feel comfortable in an environment where men and women are consuming alcoholic beverages, gambling away their money, and engaging in conversation that is often filled with the baser things of life? It is a relevant question. As a Christian, Christ lives in you and you carry him wherever you go, The Bible tells us to, 'come out from them and be separate.'
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Speech, if not relevant to the time, is rejected, and the speaker gets dishonoured much, even though he is Brihaspati.
quotes.author: Panchantantra -1.67

quotes.quote: The function of research is to provide information that is both true and relevant to some legitimate public concern.
quotes.author: Hammersley

quotes.quote: Keynesian theories became more relevant not because they were based on data not known earlier. They became more relevant because they were better theories that could comprehend and explain a larger gamut of already available experience.
quotes.author: Astad Dinshaw Gorwala

quotes.quote: If you concern yourself with remaining relevant, you'll probably disappear into oblivion.
quotes.author: Wade MacNeil

quotes.quote: That what's most relevant to you is whether and how you're doing something different from what everybody else is doing.
quotes.author: Roger G. Ibbotson

quotes.quote: If it is relevant there is always somebody else out there.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: There comes a time in your life where you're called to not only reinvent yourself but to rebuild your spirit. It's so relevant today.
quotes.author: Wilmer Valderrama

quotes.quote: Each man must reach his own verdict, by weighing all the relevant evidence.
quotes.author: Leonard Peikoff

quotes.quote: Staying relevant is key. When you're telling your story, you better have a modern story to tell. If I was still saying the same story I was saying 10 years ago, it would not be that interesting.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Even if we don't have any knowledge in this life, we have and tend to rely on relevant true beliefs; and that's sufficient for inquiry.
quotes.author: Gail Fine

quotes.quote: Once you have learned to ask questions â€“ relevant and appropriate and substantial questions â€“ you have learned how to learn and no one can keep you from learning whatever you want or need to know.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: You're only relevant to someone if you're beneficial to them somehow/some way.
quotes.author: Miguel

quotes.quote: Gravity is the only one of the four fundamental forces that is relevant in the macroscopic world of people, planets, and galaxies. The other three forces are only relevant in the sub-atomic quantum world inhabited by the fundamental particles, the quarks and leptons, which make up all matters in the universe.
quotes.author: James Stirling

quotes.quote: The talk about security both for the leaders and the people is still relevant. As long as the Armed Forces, the police and the Customs perform their duties conscientiously, the security of the people is assured.
quotes.author: Simeon Labanji Bolaji

quotes.quote: The completely filled vessel doesn't make noise. Half-filled vessels make noise. Likewise, a learned scholar never feels pride. A person with little understanding, however, keeps talking meaninglessly.
quotes.author: Subhashita Manjari

quotes.quote: The plays and poems of William Shakespeare are still relevant today— still capable of giving us goosebumps, still entertaining, disturbing, and profound.
quotes.author: Reginald McKnight

quotes.quote: I am doing mathematics. But it is relevant to what is around us. That is nature, too.
quotes.author: Albert Libchaber

quotes.quote: Even now, his voice remains clear and compelling, and his truths are as relevant and meaningful as they were in his lifetime.
quotes.author: Bob Blaisdell

quotes.quote: If you cannot make your very own snarky comments, you can still pass as having some grasp of this art by being able to recognize snark when it is spoken by someone else and to retain it in memory long enough to use it at a later time when it's relevant.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: When you read or hear something, think about it and how it connects to everything else you know. This is how knowledge will become useful to you. Don't simply collect facts— you'll only forget them later because they aren't relevant to your life.
quotes.author: John Stuat Mill

quotes.quote: Lincoln's wit and wisdom are still relevant today for both aspiring lawyers and practicing attorneys. Indeed, while the legal profession in the United States has changed in many ways over the past century and a half, many of Lincoln's principles are timeless.
quotes.author: Jonathan White

quotes.quote: To be always relevant, you have to say things which are eternal.	To be always relevant, you have to say things which are eternal.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Somehow, about forty percent of churchgoers seem to have picked up the idea that 'singing in church is for singers.' The truth is that 'singing is for believers.' The relevant question is not 'Do you have a voice?' but 'Do you have a song?'
quotes.author: Donald Hustad

quotes.quote: Niels Bohr is said to have advised Einstein to stop telling God what to do: the advise would be relevant to a lot of people besides Einstein.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as inherent or built-in relevance; no subject is relevant in itself, because every field of knowledge is equally the centre of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: What is relevant to the student is not what is related to what or where he is at the moment, but to what he may become or where he may arrive as the result of being a student.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: I think that relevance is something which the student has to establish for himself, whatever he studies. If he can't do that he isn't worthy of the very impressive and dignified title of student.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: It's important to be informed about issues like usability, reliability, security, privacy, and some of the inherent limitations of computers.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: As you get older, you do reflect more. They were great times, but the biggest thing we all had to deal with a lot more disappointment from an engineering point of view, there was not the reliability that there is now.
quotes.author: Nigel Mansell

quotes.quote: I can predict things. I can improve the up-time and the reliability. I can intervene and cause a better outcome before there's a problem.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: Technology does not always rhyme with perfection and reliability. Far from it in reality!
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Jarre

quotes.quote: It's so important that we tell customers what's going on as best as we can. And we're trying to do that. We don't often know ourselves, for so many different factors, but reliability, flexibility, and information are the three critical customer service orientations.
quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

quotes.quote: We often take for granted that our lights will come on when we flip the light switch, but the reality is that our reliability standards and the current state of the transmission grid leave us all vulnerable to blackouts.
quotes.author: Richard Burr

quotes.quote: Energy is a linchpin of economic prosperity, with energy security, reliability, and affordability key preconditions for sustainable growth.
quotes.author: Fatih Birol

quotes.quote: When you're limited on parts and you have reliability issues, you don't get the testing done. You need to really develop the car.
quotes.author: Rubens Barrichello

quotes.quote: There is no finish line when it comes to system reliability and availability, and our efforts to improve performance never cease.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Your personal brand is a promise to your clients... a promise of quality, consistency, competency, and reliability.
quotes.author: Jason Hartman

quotes.quote: Why don't you ever get the point / You're much too slow for me / Why don't we ever flip our coin / Reliability
quotes.author: Alex Callier

quotes.quote: They're whispering everything's the truth / But you say you're not interested in this little game / That this double-talk will never make me / Any less to blame / Well, I never said reliability was my middle name / Or my claim to fame
quotes.author: Jules Shear

quotes.quote: I'm unbreakable, unstoppable, I'm invincible / C'mon bring it to me, cause I'm always gonna be unbreakable / Reliable, undeniable / Come on give it to me, cause I'm always gonna be unbreakable
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: You are as reliable as a painting / In wave wet sand. / Look in your eyes and I can't see a thing
quotes.author: Jenny Berggren

quotes.quote: From predictable, Miss Reliable, so methodical / Wanna be individual and original / So radical and desirable
quotes.author: Edwin Birdsong

quotes.quote: The difference between love and comfort / Is that comfort's more reliable and true
quotes.author: Bradfield

quotes.quote: Being reliable means others can count on you.
quotes.author: Penny Tassoni

quotes.quote: A reliable person is dependable. A more specific definition of reliability is consistency in performance or behavior. In other words, a reliable person can be counted on time after time.
quotes.author: Barbara Farmer

quotes.quote: The most important way of being reliable is by following through on commitments. If you give your word, people expect that you will do what you say.
quotes.author: Barbara Farmer

quotes.quote: Reliability is a character trait that seems less important to some people than many of the other traits.
quotes.author: Barbara Farmer

quotes.quote: Reliability is used in everyday speech to describe persons or things. A reliable person can be counted on, hence a reliable employee turns up for work on time and performs assigned duties to the best of her or his abilities.
quotes.author: Ross E. Traub

quotes.quote: Reliability is also used to describe a particular quality of the numbers obtained by measuring the characteristics of person or things.
quotes.author: Ross E. Traub

quotes.quote: Reliability connotes a kind of consistency.
quotes.author: Ross E. Traub

quotes.quote: A person who does as promised can be considered reliable. Reliability is an admirable characteristic.
quotes.author: Shaman Elder Maggie Wahls

quotes.quote: The reliable person feels good knowing that he or she is trusted.
quotes.author: Shaman Elder Maggie Wahls

quotes.quote: Being considered reliable means that you are conscientious and keep you promises. A reliable person does not make excuses.
quotes.author: Shaman Elder Maggie Wahls

quotes.quote: The benefit of being reliable is that people trust you and feel the can count on you. A reliable person will get and keep friends much easier than someone who is careless in personal relationships.
quotes.author: Shaman Elder Maggie Wahls

quotes.quote: So yes, reliability is certainly part of impeccability. Doing the very best you can do at all times. It is also speaking your truth, isn't it? Reliability is also a shamanic trait.
quotes.author: Shaman Elder Maggie Wahls

quotes.quote: Keeping your promises is a key of being trustworthy. When you make a promise to someone, you create a reason for that person to rely on you.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman

quotes.quote: When you make an important promise to yourself, you also have an obligation to fulfill it.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman

quotes.quote: It's not the events of our lives that shape us, but our beliefs as to what those events mean.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Laughter is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: For fast-acting relief try slowing down.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: And thou wilt give thyself relief, if thou doest every act of thy life as if it were the last.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It's a relief to finally do it and get it over with.
quotes.author: Candace Parker

quotes.quote: Don't ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: To find relief in what has been, we must make ourselves eternal.
quotes.author: Violette Leduc

quotes.quote: Relief loosens tongues beyond measure.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: It's a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When you taste super-success after tasting super-failure, there is huge relief.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Stress should be a powerful driving force, not an obstacle.
quotes.author: Bill Phillips

quotes.quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Remember that stress doesn't come from what's going on in your life. It comes from your thoughts about what's going on in your life.
quotes.author: Andrew J. Bernstein

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is some relief to weep; grief is satisfied and carried off by tears.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Finding relief in your problem is fine, but it will not cure the problem.
quotes.author: Henry R Brandt

quotes.quote: For fast-acting relief, try slowing down.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Perhaps all pleasure is only relief.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Give your stress wings and let it fly away.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: There is a great relief in experiencing the worst vicariously.
quotes.author: Fiona Shaw

quotes.quote: If you want relief from pain just strive to touch more of every part of life.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If there is to be no loss whatever of dignity or self-respect in getting and staying on relief, then there can be no gain in dignity or self-respect in makings some sacrifices to keep off.
quotes.author: Henry Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Try a little harder to be a little better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: There's nothing like reading about a world that feels dead to throw your own beautiful, colorful life into sharp relief.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: Don't give up when dark times come. The more storms you face in life, the stronger you'll be. Hold on. Your greater is coming.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The relief that is afforded to mere want, as want, tends to increase that want.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: People who areÂ at easeÂ with their consciences always look happy.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: When we areÂ at ease, our bodies work efficiently, our minds settle, and space opens up for us to connect to our intuition, creativity, and sense of connectedness.
quotes.author: Tara Stiles

quotes.quote: Above all, beÂ at ease, be as natural and spacious as possible. Slip quietly out of the noose of your habitual anxious self, release all grasping, and relax into your true nature.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: BeingÂ at easeÂ with himself put himÂ at easeÂ with the world.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The effect of every burden laid down is to leave us relieved; and when the soul has laid down that of its faults at the feet of God, it feels as though it had wings.
quotes.author: EugÃ©nie de GuÃ©rin
