quotes.quote: A Republic without parties is a complete anomaly. The histories of all popular governments show absurd is the idea of their attempting to exist without parties.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce

quotes.quote: An aristocracy in a republic is like a chicken whose head has been cut off; it may run about in a lively way, but in fact it is dead.
quotes.author: Nancy Mitford

quotes.quote: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Conservatives understand that the power that binds our republic together is fierce independence held high on the shoulders of compassion.
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.quote: I have always considered it as treason against the great republic of human nature, to make any man's virtues the means of deceiving him.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: In a republic this rule ought to be observed: that the majority should not have the predominant power.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Toleration and liberty are the foundations of a great republic.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: In the republic of mediocrity, genius is dangerous.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: A republic - if you can keep it - is about limitation, and for good reason, because we are mortal and our actions are imperfect.
quotes.author: Mike Pence

quotes.quote: I don't think that voters should be fixated on public policy. In a healthy republic, they wouldn't have to worry every waking hour about what their government is doing.
quotes.author: David Harsanyi

quotes.quote: Behold a republic standing erect while empires all around are bowed beneath the weight of their own armaments a republic whose flag is loved while other flags are only feared.
quotes.author: William Jenings Bryan

quotes.quote: Only when a republic's life is in danger should a man uphold his government when it is wrong. There is no other time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In Republics, the great danger is, that the majority may not sufficiently respect the rights of the minority
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: An imbalance between rich and poor is the oldest and most fatal ailment of all republics.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The power to mould the future of the Republic will be in the hands of the journalists of future generations.
quotes.author: Joseph Pulitzer

quotes.quote: The Republican majority will stop at nothing to prevent access to the legal system for those who are hurt.
quotes.author: Joe Baca

quotes.quote: The Republicans believe in the minimum wage the more the minimum, the better.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Republican comes in the dictionary just after reptile and just above repugnant.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Republicans are men of narrow vision, who are afraid of the future.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Republicans absolutely support equal pay for equal work.
quotes.author: Cathy McMorris Rodgers

quotes.quote: The Republicans may be better off without an agenda. They don't scare people.
quotes.author: Bill Schneider

quotes.quote: Republicans stand for raw, unbridled evil and greed and ignorance smothered in balloons and ribbons.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Republicans are the party that says government doesn't work, and then they get elected and prove it.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Republicans are for both the man and the dollar, but in case of conflict the man before the dollar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Republicans don't want to save the world; they want to save the country from those who would save the world.
quotes.author: Richard D. Kahlenberg

quotes.quote: It is a greater thing to be a good citizen than to be a good Republican or a good Democrat.
quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: The republican is the only form of government which is not eternally at open or secret war with the rights of mankind.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Republicans prefer straight talk to politically correct talk!
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Given the choice between a Republican and someone who acts like a Republican, people will vote for the real Republican all the time.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Empathy is a foreign country to Republicans.
quotes.author: Julian Rogan

quotes.quote: Republicans are so empty headed, they wouldn't make a good landfill.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: Republicans want to be tough and say, 'Illegals, you're gone.' But the answer is a lot more complex than that.
quotes.author: Susana Martinez

quotes.quote: Republicans can also point to an alternate path. They can draw upon genuine experts to explain what should be done.
quotes.author: William Kristol

quotes.quote: If you want to live like a Republican, vote like a Democrat.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The Republican Party is a friend of Social Security the way Colonel Sanders was a friend of chickens.
quotes.author: Charles Taylor Manatt

quotes.quote: No one has ever seen a Republican mass meeting that was devoid of the perception of the ludicrous.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Republicans sleep in twin beds--some even in separate rooms. That is why there are more Democrats.
quotes.author: Will Stanton

quotes.quote: The true foundation of republican government is the equal right of every citizen in his person and property and in their management.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Republicans understand the importance of bondage between a mother and child.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: Although a republican government is slow to move, yet when once in motion, its momentum becomes irresistible.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Traditionally, Young Republicans have been a leading indicator of the direction of the party.
quotes.author: Roger Stone

quotes.quote: Really it's hard to know where the Republican Party ends and the Tea Party begins.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.quote: By restraining spending and by cutting the deficit, Republican policies are helping to keep our economy strong.
quotes.author: Dennis Hastert

quotes.quote: In a free and republican government, you cannot restrain the voice of the multitude.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The father is always a Republican toward his son, and his mother's always a Democrat.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The nicest feeling in the world is to do a good deed anonymously and have somebody find out.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: He who worries about reputation, has a reputation to worry about.
quotes.author: Edwin Leibfreed

quotes.quote: As a general rule, a reputation is built on manner as much as on achievement.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Until you've lost your reputation, you never realize what a burden it was or what freedom really is.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: A man can get a reputation from very small things.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Reputation is but a synonym of popularity: dependent on suffrage, to be increased or diminished at the will of the voters.
quotes.author: Washington Allston

quotes.quote: How many worthy men have we seen survive their own reputations!
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: When a man has once gained a Reputation not even with God's help can he get rid of it.
quotes.author: Abraham Miller

quotes.quote: You're not born with a walk like that. You have to earn it.
quotes.author: Donna Ball

quotes.quote: Associate with men of good quality, if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us; character is what God and angels know of us.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A reputation once broken may possibly be repaired, but the world will always keep their eyes on the spot where the crack was.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.quote: Begin somewhere. You cannot build a reputation on what you intend to do.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.quote: Concealed talent brings no reputation.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: At every word a reputation dies.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: No man can understand why a woman shouldn't prefer a good reputation to a good time.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Repetition makes reputation and reputation makes customers.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Arden

quotes.quote: Reputations, like beavers and cloaks, shall last some people twice the time of others.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: A good reputation is like the cypress; once cut, it never puts forth leaf again.
quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

quotes.quote: The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what you desire to appear.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: We would all like a reputation for generosity and we'd all like to buy it cheap.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Reputation is an idle and most false imposition; oft got without merit, and lost without deserving.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Treat a man as if he had a fine reputation to protect, and he will usually endeavor to deserve it.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The reputation of a man is like his shadow, gigantic when it precedes him, and pigmy in its proportions when it follows.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Your reputation is in the hands of others. That's what the reputation is. You can't control that. The only thing you can control is your character.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: We're our own dragons as well as our own heroes, and we have to rescue ourselves from ourselves.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: The word 'salvation' denotes rescue. Rescue? What from? Well, of course, ultimately death. And since it is sin that colludes with the forces of evil and decay, sin leads to death. So we are rescued from sin and death.
quotes.author: N.T. Wright

quotes.quote: There is no rescue team that awaits for you when ever you fall, you must team up with all you have inside of you so that you can rescue your self from the predicament
quotes.author: Tare Munzara

quotes.quote: I was not rescued by a prince; I was the administrator of my own rescue.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Reaching out to rescue one another under ANY condition is an eternal measure of love.
quotes.author: Ronald A. Rasband

quotes.quote: God is on the move to rescue people from misery to everlasting happiness, which can only be found in him.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Rescue someone unwilling to look after himself, and he will cling to you like a dangerous illness.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: People rescue each other. They build shelters and community kitchens and ways to deal with lost children and eventually rebuild one way or another.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: I need to be rescued from the thought that I don’t need to be rescued.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Today I will not wait for someone to come to my aid. I'm not helpless. Although help may come, I'm my own rescuer. My relationships will dramatically improve when I stop rescuing others and stop expecting others to rescue me.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Love is its own rescue; for we, at our supremest, are but its trembling emblems
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The faster you can signal for rescue, the faster you get out of that situation
quotes.author: Joe Teti

quotes.quote: It's difficult to be the victim and not the provider. We're usually the one coming to the rescue of others and not the one being rescued.
quotes.author: Takayama

quotes.quote: God uses rescued people to rescue people.
quotes.author: Christine Caine

quotes.quote: We cannot free ourselves from pride and selfish ambition; a divine rescue is absolutely necessary
quotes.author: CJ Mahaney

quotes.quote: Those who've been rescued from sin are best able to help in the rescue of others
quotes.author: Mrvin Williams

quotes.quote: Love has the power to rescue us and not let go, otherwise it isn't love
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Danger invites rescue... The wrongdoer may not have foreseen the coming of a deliverer. He is accountable as if he had
quotes.author: Benjamin Cordozo

quotes.quote: Research is to see what everybody else has seen, and to think what nobody else has thought.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: After all, the ultimate goal of all research is not objectivity, but truth.
quotes.author: Helene Deutsch

quotes.quote: If you steal from one author it's plagiarism; if you steal from many it's research.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Research is what I'm doing when I don’t know what I’m doing.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: No research is ever quite complete. It is the glory of a good bit of work that it opens the way for something still better, and this repeatedly leads to its own eclipse.
quotes.author: Mervin Gordon

quotes.quote: The common facts of today are the products of yesterday’s research.
quotes.author: Duncan MacDonald

quotes.quote: Research teaches a man to admit he is wrong and to be proud of the fact that he does so, rather than try with all his energy to defend an unsound plan because he is afraid that admission of error is a confession of weakness when rather it is a sign of strength.
quotes.author: H.E. Stocher

quotes.quote: Research is the process of going up alleys to see if they are blind.
quotes.author: Marston Bates

quotes.quote: If men liked shopping, they'd call it research.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nelms

quotes.quote: The way to do research is to attack the facts at the point of greatest astonishment.
quotes.author: Celia Green

quotes.quote: In my opinion, we don't devote nearly enough scientific research to finding a cure for jerks.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest form of research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The scholar's greatest weakness: calling procrastination research.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Do research. Feed your talent. Research not only wins the war on cliche, it's the key to victory over fear and its cousin, depression.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: Doing research on the Web is like using a library assembled piecemeal by pack rats and vandalized nightly.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: What is research, but a blind date with knowledge.
quotes.author: William Henry

quotes.quote: Research serves to make building stones out of stumbling blocks.
quotes.author: Arthur D. Little

quotes.quote: He who does not research has nothing to teach.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Research: the distance between an idea and its realization.
quotes.author: David Sarnoff

quotes.quote: Research is a way of taking calculated risks to bring about incalculable consequences.
quotes.author: Celia Green

quotes.quote: Nothing has such power to broaden the mind as the ability to investigate systematically and truly all that comes under thy observation in life.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: We don't ask research to do what it was never meant to do, and that is to get an idea
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: I believe in innovation and that the way you get innovation is you fund research and you learn the basic facts.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The outcome of any serious research can only be to make two questions grow where only one grew before.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: Research must continue to be the centerpiece of intellectual life, and our commitment to research must grow, because our problems are growing.
quotes.author: Ernest L. Boyer

quotes.quote: Research is about following the gleam into the dark. It's also about being sensitive enough to know which fact is "the creative fact; the fertile fact; the fact that suggests and engenders," as opposed to the fact that deadens and kills a delicate new project.
quotes.author: Lauren Groff

quotes.quote: Fools make researches and wise men exploit them.
quotes.author: H. G. [Herbert George] Wells

quotes.quote: Research now means a Google search.
quotes.author: John Palfrey

quotes.quote: Before the word 'resignation' became a euphemism for being fired, it connoted a sense of public integrity and personal honor.
quotes.author: Bret Stephens

quotes.quote: ResignationÂ is the courage of Christian sorrow.
quotes.author: Alexandre Vinet

quotes.quote: What isÂ resignation? It is putting God between one's self and one's grief.
quotes.author: Madame Swetchine

quotes.quote: What is called resignation is confirmed desperation.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Resignation, perhaps the most stifling word in the language.
quotes.author: Caitlin Thomas

quotes.quote: Resignation is putting God between ourselves and our troubles.
quotes.author: Anne Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: AÂ resignationÂ is a grave act; never performed by a right minded man without forethought or with reserve.
quotes.author: Salmon P. Chase

quotes.quote: Obedience andÂ resignationÂ are our personal offerings upon the altar of duty.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: ResignationÂ is a daily suicide.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Just as in the great moment ofÂ resignationÂ one does not mediate but chooses, now the task is to gain proficiency in repeating the impassioned choice and, existing, to express it in existence.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Everyone has the revolver of resignation in his pocket.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: ResignationÂ is a quality of the saintly souls.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: A good supply ofÂ resignationÂ is of the first importance in providing for the journey of life.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Insecurity andÂ resignationÂ mingle with the hope for a better order.
quotes.author: Gustav Heinemann

quotes.quote: Resignation is the timid sign of courage.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: We learnÂ resignationÂ not by our own suffering, but by the suffering of others.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Resignation, not mystic, not detached, butÂ resignationÂ open-eyed, conscious, and informed by love, is the only one of our feelings for which it is impossible to become a sham.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: TrueÂ resignation, which always brings with it the confidence that unchangeable goodness will make even the disappointment of our hopes, and the contradictions of life, conducive to some benefit, casts a grave but tranquil light over the prospect of even a toilsome and troubled life.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.quote: ResignationÂ is what kills people. Once they've rejectedÂ resignation, humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath.
quotes.author: Kohta Hirano

quotes.quote: Humility andÂ resignationÂ are our prime virtues.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo- far more flexible than you'd ever believe at first glance.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: No matter how much falls on us, we keep plowing ahead. That's the only way to keep the roads clear.
quotes.author: Greg Kincaid

quotes.quote: If your heart is broken, make art with the pieces.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.quote: I tried and failed. I tried again and again and succeeded.
quotes.author: Gail Borden

quotes.quote: The difference between a strong man and a weak one is that the former does not give up after a defeat.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: It may sound strange, but many champions are made champions by setbacks.
quotes.author: Bob Richards

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly, can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The farther backward you can look, the farther forward you are likely to see.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Things don't go wrong and break your heart so you can become bitter and give up. They happen to break you down and build you up so you can be all you were intended to be.
quotes.author: Charles Jones

quotes.quote: What ever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Forget mistakes. Forget failures. Forget everything except what you are going to do right now, and do it. Today is your lucky day.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Someone was hurt before you, wronged before you, hungry before you, frightened before you, beaten before you, humiliated before you, raped before you?yet, someone survived?You can do anything you choose to do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When we learn how to become resilient, we learn how to embrace the beautifully broad spectrum of the human experience.
quotes.author: Jaeda Dewalt

quotes.quote: It is really wonderful how much resilience there is in human nature. Let any obstructing cause, no matter what, be removed in any way, even by death, and we fly back to first principles of hope and enjoyment.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Resilience is very different than being numb. Resilience means you experience, you feel, you fail, you hurt. You fall. But, you keep going.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: We are not a product of what has happened to us in our past. We have the power of choice.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Resilience is the ability to attack while running away.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: Resilience is the ability to find the inner strength to bounce back from a set-back or challenge.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's the bounce that counts! Picking ourselves up after life's hurdle
quotes.author: Tessa Bielecki

quotes.quote: Resilience is not what happens to you. It's how you react to, respond to, and recover from what happens to you.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Part of resilience is deciding to make yourself miserable over something that matters, or deciding to make yourself miserable over something that doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: Resilience is based on compassion for ourselves as well as compassion for others
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Resilience is all about being able to overcome the unexpected. Sustainability is about survival. The goal of resilience is to thrive.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.quote: Every moment of resistance to temptation is a victory.
quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

quotes.quote: The spirit of resistance to government is so valuable on certain occasions that I wish it to be always kept alive.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Resistance to the organized mass can be effected only by the man who is as well organized in his individuality as the mass itself.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: The first resistance to social change is to say it's not necessary.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Resistance is feasible even for those who are not heroes by nature, and it is an obligation, I believe, for those who fear the consequences and detest the reality of the attempt to impose American hegemony.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance and least trouble is a mental rut already made. It requires troublesome work to undertake the alternation of old beliefs.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: The goal of any true resistance is to affect outcomes, not just to vent. And the only way to affect outcomes and thrive in our lives is to find the eye in the hurricane and act from that place of inner strength.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: There is no way a spirit of resistance that has sunk so deep in the population can be repressed.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: The resistance of a woman is not always a proof of her virtue, but more frequently of her experience.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: The resistance to praying is like the resistance of tightly clenched fists. This image shows a tension, a desire to cling tightly to yourself, a greediness which betrays fear.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Resistance to criminal rashness comes better late than never.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: Resistance at all cost is the most senseless act there is.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Out of resistance comes strength.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Resistance to oppression is second nature.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Intelligent resistance keeps the true self alive.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: Resistance to the disturbance is the disturbance.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: What looks like resistance is often a lack of clarity.
quotes.author: Chip Heath

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance will never make you proud.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The line of least resistance is to most people the lifeline.
quotes.author: Sophie Irene Loeb

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance leads to a life of no fulfillment.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: That which offers no resistance, overcomes the hardest substances.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The resistance to the unpleasant situation is the root of suffering.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance leads to crooked rivers and crooked men.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The resistance to a new idea increases by the square of its importance.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Resistance cannot be seen, touched, heard, or smelled. But it can be felt.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: When you experience resistance, you find the lessons that you are meant to learn
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: To offer no resistance to life is to be in a state of grace, ease, and lightness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: True resistance begins with people confronting pain... and wanting to do something to change it.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Resistance is experienced as fear; the degree of fear equates to the strength of Resistance.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: Dialogue is the only way to end war and terror. We need practical solidarity with those who are weaker and diplomacy from below.
quotes.author: Luisa Morgantini

quotes.quote: The resolution of the combat is seldom equal to the vehemence of the charge.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A resolution never to deceive exposes a man to be often deceived.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: But the life of freedom requires a beginning, and here a beginning is a resolution, and the resolution has its work and its pain-thus the beginning has its difficulty.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: When resolution hath prepar'd the will; It wants no helps to further any ill.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Perhaps a good resolution for the new year would be to keep asking what world we want to pass on to the next generation. Indeed to ask whether we have a real and vivid sense of that next generation.
quotes.author: Rowan Williams

quotes.quote: The resolution of conflict in self is like the making one of opposites in art.
quotes.author: Eli Siegel

quotes.quote: If you can't go around it, over it, or through it, you had better negotiate with it.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: When time and space and change converge, we find place. We arrive in Place when we resolve things. Place is peace of mind and understanding. Place is knowledge of self. Place is resolution.
quotes.author: Abdullah Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Resolution is struggle. Resolution is ego. Resolution is saying, "I cannot live spontaneously. ".
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: An apology is the superglue of life. It can repair just about anything.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: Never tell your resolution beforehand, or it's twice as onerous a duty.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: Resolutions require only words. Results take action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Definitive resolutions are made always and only in a state of mind that is not destined to last.
quotes.author: Alessandro Baricco

quotes.quote: Negotiation talks are the best way to solve anything. We must replace wars and weapons with negotiations and talks.
quotes.author: Akbar Ganji

quotes.quote: When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Make few resolutions, but keep them strictly.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: It takes resolution to go forth from the ease and beautiful simplicity of a well-formed hypothesis and struggle with amorphous facts.
quotes.author: John Maurice Clark

quotes.quote: Sudden resolutions, like the sudden rise of mercury in a barometer, indicate little else than the variability of the weather.
quotes.author: David Hare

quotes.quote: If you flee from the things you fear, there's no resolution.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Perhaps those, who, trembling most, maintain a dignity in their fate, are the bravest: resolution on reflection is real courage.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Good resolutions are simply checks that men draw on a bank where they have no account.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We can only move to a long-term resolution regarding terrorism and war by planting seeds of peace. We have to start with ourselves.
quotes.author: Peter Yarrow

quotes.quote: If civilization is to survive, we must cultivate the science of human relationships - the ability of all peoples, of all kinds, to live together, in the same world at peace.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: My resolution is to make positivity, thankfulness and happiness my new mantra.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.quote: A good resolution is like an old horse, which is often saddled but rarely ridden.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Inventing is the resolution of technical contradictions.
quotes.author: Genrich Altshuller

quotes.quote: For ebbing resolution ne'er returns, But falls still further from its former shore.
quotes.author: Alec Douglas-Home

quotes.quote: Making resolutions is a cleansing ritual of self-assessment and repentance that demands personal honesty and, ultimately, reinforces humility. Breaking them is part of the cycle.
quotes.author: Eric Zorn

quotes.quote: If you play smart, you may achieve your target without using up all your resources.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: We must protect our most precious resource, our environment, for future generations.
quotes.author: Alma Adams

quotes.quote: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The secret of concentration is the secret of self-discovery. You reach inside yourself to discover your personal resources, and what it takes to match them to the challenge.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Your greatest asset is your earning ability. Your greatest resource is your time.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Human potential is the only limitless resource we have in this world.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: The cost of our success is the exhaustion of natural resources, leading to energy crises, climate change, pollution, and the destruction of our habitat. If you exhaust natural resources, there will be nothing left for your children. If we continue in the same direction, humankind is headed for some frightful ordeals, if not extinction.
quotes.author: Christian de Duve

quotes.quote: The greatest natural resource our country has is not oil. It's not gas. It's not coal. It's the genius of our children.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: To blame my failures on the lack of resources is less about the lack of resources and more about my unwillingness to access those resources.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: I always say that people should not rush to change religions. There is real value in finding the spiritual resources you need in your home religion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Suicide is not chosen; it happens when pain exceeds resources for coping with pain.
quotes.author: David L. Conroy

quotes.quote: When you believe in your dream and your vision, then it begins to attract its own resources. No one was born to be a failure.
quotes.author: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: A great principle of minimalism is using the minimum amount of resources, which accords perfectly with our present-day need for sustainability.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Men and nature must work hand in hand. The throwing out of balance of the resources of nature throws out of balance also the lives of men.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Conservation means the wise use of the earth and its resources for the lasting good of men.
quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: More than poverty, more than degree of education, religion, access to natural resources, even degree of democracy - violence against females is the biggest indicator of whether a country will be violent in itself or be willing to use military violence against another country.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: We can't leave people in abject poverty, so we need to raise the standard of living for 80% of the world's people, while bringing it down considerably for the 20% who are destroying our natural resources.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: If I were to name the three most precious resources of life, I should say books, friends, and nature. And the greatest of these, at least the most constant and always at hand, is nature.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: For each human being, time is a necessary resource. It can neither be ignored nor changed.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: I can do something else besides stuff a ball through a hoop. My biggest resource is my mind.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: You weren't created just to consume resources, you were put on this Earth to make a contribution.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: There is nothing I fear more than waking up without a program that will help me bring a little happiness to those with no resources, those who are poor, illiterate, and ridden with terminal disease.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: No one should ever be forced to choose between food and education, or medicine and shelter when they don't have the resources. It's very unfair.
quotes.author: Rachel Brosnahan

quotes.quote: Pollution is nothing but the resources we are not harvesting. We allow them to disperse because we've been ignorant of their value.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: A great mentor will help bring people and resources together to help you overcome fears. Lemme know if you find one.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: A lack of resources may slow you down, but don't let it make you throw away a big idea. Give God five years, ten years, fifteen years, twenty years, twenty-five years, thirty years, forty years, or more. Give God all the time He needs to bring the resources to you!
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: I think the environment should be put in the category of our national security. Defense of our resources is just as important as defense abroad. Otherwise what is there to defend?
quotes.author: Robert Redford

quotes.quote: The world has enough food resources to feed the humans but lust and greed knows no boundaries in human terms.
quotes.author: Shivanshu K. Srivastava

quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you want to be respected by others, the great thing is to respect yourself. Only by that, only by self-respect will you compel others to respect you.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: That you may retain your self-respect, it is better to displease the people by doing what you know is right, than to temporarily please them by doing what you know is wrong.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: He that respects himself is safe from others; he wears a coat of mail that none can pierce.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: If we lose our love and self-respect and respect for each other, this is how we will finally die.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Respect commands itself and it can neither be given nor withheld when it is due.
quotes.author: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.quote: Respect is an invention of people who want to cover up the empty place where love should be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Tolerance implies a respect for another person, not because he is wrong or even because he is right, but because he is human.
quotes.author: John Cogley

quotes.quote: If men are to resect each other for what they are, they must cease to respect each other for what they own.
quotes.author: A.J.P. Taylor

quotes.quote: You can demand courtesy but you have to earn respect.
quotes.author: Lawrence Goldstone

quotes.quote: If we can respect the divine within us, if we can treat it with dignity, then we can respect others around us.
quotes.author: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.quote: Respect begins with this attitude: I acknowledge that you are a creature of extreme worth.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: People crave for more respect than love, because they expect love only from few people but they want respect from everyone.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Respect at the cost of others is disrespect in effect.
quotes.author: Muhammad Tariq Majeed

quotes.quote: When we love and respect people, revealing to them their value, they can begin to come out from behind the walls that protect them.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: The only true disability is the inability to accept and respect differences.
quotes.author: Comic Strip Mama

quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: It is not grey hair that makes one respectable but character.
quotes.author: Rana Junaid Mustafa Gohar

quotes.quote: Respect depends on reciprocity.
quotes.author: Nyang Proverb

quotes.quote: When we show our respect for other living things, they respond with respect for us.
quotes.author: Arapaho Proverb

quotes.quote: Deal with yourself as an individual worthy of respect and make everyone else deal with you the same way.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: A man's respect for law and order exists in precise relationship to the size of his paycheck.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton Powell Jr.

quotes.quote: Mutual respect is the foundation of genuine harmony.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The gentle and respectful ways of saying 'To hell with you' are being abandoned.
quotes.author: Millicent Fenwick

quotes.quote: The only way to teach respect is to model it.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: I'm not concerned with your liking or disliking me. All I ask is that you respect me as a human being.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: We must have respect for both plumbers and our philosophers, or neither our pipes or our theories will hold water.
quotes.author: John. W. Garner

quotes.quote: Let's respect women for the value let's respect everyone, men and women, for the value they bring to the workplace.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: When people respect someone as a person, they admire her. When they respect her as a friend, they love her. When they respect her as a leader, they follow her.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A woman is not an object. She is not something; she is someone. You treat a woman with respect. She is not your toy. She doesnt owe you anything just cause you are a man. When she come to you for comfort, you listen to her; you dont make a move on her. Grow up and start treating women how they deserve to be treated.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals; respect for others guides our manners.
quotes.author: Lawrence Sterne

quotes.quote: Be a woman of confidence and self-respect; give a man a reason worth fighting for.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Whenever you think about disrespecting a woman, think about how you were born into this world
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: This is about respect for women, the judgments that women make and their doctors about their reproductive health. It's an important part of who women are, their reproductive health.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Love and respect woman. Look to her not only for comfort, but for strength and inspiration and the doubling of your intellectual and moral powers. Blot out from your mind any idea of superiority; you have none.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

quotes.quote: We respect women and don't insult them by saying all they care about is reproductive rights. All issues are women's issues.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: Let's respect the dignity of women to make their own decisions about the size and timing of their families.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: In some respects woman is superior to man. She is more tender-hearted, more receptive, her intuition is more intense.
quotes.author: Abdu'l-Bahá

quotes.quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote:
Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to
self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt,
that's real power.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: All women are beautiful, regardless of their looks. You just need to touch their soul with respect and appreciation for their inner beauty and you will be rewarded with joy. The heart is way more important than the package. Women are the God's greatest gift to man and we should cherish and protect them, each and every one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every woman deserves a man who appreciates not only her lovely body and homemaking skills but also her witty and intelligent mind
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Men who cherish for women the highest respect are seldom popular with them.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: A woman is soft, kind, and loving. When you are in danger, she is always ready to sacrifice herself to save you. So never forget to respect her.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A woman takes off her claim to respect along with her garments.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: A man can build a home but it needs a woman to run a home.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Bring her flowers, give her chocolates, send her sweet messages, feed her hungry stomach. Make her feel like she is the most important woman in the world to you, because she is. She is.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Before loving someone, make sure you're loving yourself enough and treating yourself with respect before others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You should respect each other and refrain from disputes you should not, like water and oil, repel each other, but should, like milk and water, mingle together
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Have respect for yourself and no one can take away your self respect.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Only those who respect the personality of others can be of real use to them.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Treat people with respect and do it with feelings too, whatever you expect others is what you have to give.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: I hope people realize that there is a brain underneath the hair and a heart underneath the boobs.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Words of Love or Respect must uplift your spouse, edifying and never manipulating
quotes.author: Dr. Emerson Eggerichs

quotes.quote: Respect must include thankfulness spoken to or about your spouse; don't fixate on weakness and faults.
quotes.author: Dr. Emerson Eggerichs

quotes.quote: Always speak in uplifting way for your spouse's sake, and do not use love or respect as a manipulative ploy to meet your own need for love or respect.
quotes.author: Dr. Emerson Eggerichs

quotes.quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Respecting someone indicate the quality of your personality.
quotes.author: Mohammad Rishad sakhi

quotes.quote: Respecting others is best tool to earn respect.
quotes.author: Junaid Raza

quotes.quote: Every human being, of whatever origin, of whatever station, deserves respect. We must each respect others even as we respect ourselves.
quotes.author: U. Thant

quotes.quote: He who loves others is constantly loved by them. He who respects others is constantly respected by them.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Respect is a two-way street, if you want to get it, you've got to give it.
quotes.author: R.G. Risch

quotes.quote: I must respect the opinions of others even if I disagree with them.
quotes.author: Herbert H. Lehman

quotes.quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Deeply respecting yourself is the first step toward having a deep respect for others.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: As we grow as unique persons, we learn to respect the uniqueness of others.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: When we show our respect for other living things, they respond with respect for us.
quotes.author: ARAPAHO PROVERB

quotes.quote: Respect for the rights of others means peace.
quotes.author: Benito Juarez

quotes.quote: If you have some respect for people as they are, you can be more effective in helping them to become better than they are.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: You should respect each other and refrain from disputes; you should not, like water and oil, repel each other, but should, like milk and water, mingle together.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Men are respectable only as they respect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Only those who respect the personality of others can be of real use to them.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: You should show some respect for what other people see and feel, even though it be the exact opposite of what you see and feel.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: A man who pays respect to the great paves the way for his own greatness.
quotes.author: African Proverbs

quotes.quote: Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Period. No exceptions.
quotes.author: Kiana Tom

quotes.quote: If you treat people right they will treat you right...ninety percent of the time.
quotes.author: Frankling D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The respect you give others is a dramatic reflection of the respect you give yourself.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Respect a man, he will do the more.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: Probably no greater honor can come to any man than the respect of his colleagues.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: Respecting others is the biggest discipline.
quotes.author: Jp Joshi

quotes.quote: Respecting others' opinions doesn't mean being untrue to our own.
quotes.author: P. M. Forni

quotes.quote: The right to be respected is won by respecting others.
quotes.author: Vasyl Sukhomlynsky

quotes.quote: Those who enjoy responsibility usually get it; those who merely like exercising authority usually lose it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Men must necessarily be the active agents of their own well-being and well-doing... they themselves must in the very nature of things be their own best helpers.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Responsibility is the price of greatness.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Accountability breeds response-ability.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you want children to keep their feet on the ground, put some responsibility on their shoulders.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: The willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life is the source from which self-respect springs.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Responsibility's like a string we can only see the middle of. Both ends are out of sight.
quotes.author: William McFee

quotes.quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Success on any major scale requires you to accept responsibility. . .In the final analysis, the one quality that all successful people have is the ability to take on responsibility.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: The man who complains about the way the ball bounces is likely to be the one who dropped it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: All blame is a waste of time. No matter how much fault you find with another, and regardless of how much you blame him, it will not change you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: It is easy to dodge our responsibilities, but we cannot dodge the consequences of dodging our responsibilities.
quotes.author: Josiah Charles Stamp

quotes.quote: Responsibility walks hand in hand with capacity and power.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Man must cease attributing his problems to his environment, and learn again to exercise his will - his personal responsibility.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I must do something' always solves more problems than Something must be done.'
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Responsibility is the thing people dread most of all. Yet it is the one thing in the world that develops us, gives us manhood or womanhood fiber.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: It is easy to ignore responsibility when one is only an intermediate link in a chain of action.
quotes.author: Stanley Milgram

quotes.quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: He died that day because his body had served its purpose. His soul had done what it came to do, learned what it came to learn, and then was free to leave.
quotes.author: Garth Stein

quotes.quote: My life will end someday, but it will end at my convenience.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: He who has gone, so we but cherish his memory, abides with us, more potent, nay, more present than the living man.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Our death is not an end if we can live on in our children and the younger generation. For they are us, our bodies are only wilted leaves on the tree of life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Death is something inevitable. When a man has done what he considers to be his duty to his people and his country, he can rest in peace. I believe I have made that effort and that is, therefore, why I will sleep for the eternity.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: And because I love this life I know I shall love death as well The child cries out when From the right breast the mother Takes it away, in the very next moment to find in the left one its consolation.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: I know for certain that we never lose the people we love, even to death. They continue to participate in every act, thought and decision we make. Their love leaves an indelible imprint in our memories. We find comfort in knowing that our lives have been enriched by having shared their love.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: All say, How hard it is that we have to die—a strange complaint to come from the mouths of people who have had to live.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When you were born, you cried and the world rejoiced. Live your life in a manner so that when you die the world cries and you rejoice.
quotes.author: Native American Proverb

quotes.quote: Great Spirit when we come singing. When we face the sunset the last song, may it be, without shame, singing It is finished in beauty. It is finished in beauty!
quotes.author: Evelyn Eaton

quotes.quote: Grief is a normal and natural response to loss. It is originally an unlearned feeling process. Keeping grief inside increases your pain.
quotes.author: Anne Grant

quotes.quote: May tender memories soften your grief, may fond recollection bring you relief, and may you find comfort and peace in the thought of the joy that knowing your loved one brought. For time and space can never divide or keep your loved one from your side. When memory paints in colors true, the happy hours that belonged to you.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote: When it comes time to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with the fear of death,so when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over gain in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.
quotes.author: Chief Aupumut

quotes.quote: I want to find a quiet place, to sit with you a while, to talk about the happy times, and hope that makes you smile. Rest in Peace Darling.
quotes.author: Susan Smith

quotes.quote: We say that the hour of death cannot be forecast, but when we say this we imagine that hour as placed in an obscure and distant future. It never occurs to us that it has any connection with the day already begun or that death could arrive this same afternoon, this afternoon which is so certain and which has every hour filled in advance.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: My beloved soul, having awakened at last into My Peace, you can return consciously and completely to your own Original Source. As this homecoming fills you with in expressible joy it pervades Allah Most High with profound delight as well (You will) experience the perfect union with Love that is My highest Paradise.
quotes.author: Lex Hixon

quotes.quote: We tell the dead to rest in peace, when we should worry about the living to live in peace.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Loving memories last forever, I am at a loss for words during this sorrowful time. Please know that I am thinking of you and praying for peace and comfort.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Death is just another stage of life, although the one you kind of hope comes last.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes. Where ever you'll be, you'll be in my heart.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: I can't hold the tears back. It wasn't fair that your life had to end. I'll always keep you in my heart. Rest in peace my friend.
quotes.author: Jay Jay

quotes.quote: At first are moving tombs on the surface of the surface of the earth; then we become static tombs in the brims of the cemetary soil; waiting to become eternal people in fellowship for God. I know there is another fellowship in heaven!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The dead has always been within us, its just the graveyard where we lay to rest.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: I'll remember you. When I've forgotten all the rest. You to me were true. You to me were the best.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Those who walk uprightly enter into peace; they find rest as they lie in death.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.quote: Not everyone who died had left a memory and not everyone who had left a memory had left a blessed one. Therefore, not all have died should be tagged of a blessed memory.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Death is one of two things. Either it is annihilation, and the dead have no consciousness of anything; or, as we are told, it is really a change: a migration of the soul from one place to another.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Keep the door to her life open.
quotes.author: Edith Fogg Hickman

quotes.quote: Make it dark, make it grim, make it tough, but then, for the love of God, tell a joke.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Grief is not a disorder, a disease, or a sign of weakness. It is an emotional, physical, and spiritual necessity, the price you pay for love. The only cure for grief is to grieve.
quotes.author: Rabbi Earl Grollman

quotes.quote: Some minds are like soup in a poor restaurant better left unstirred.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: In a restaurant one is both observed and unobserved. Joy and sorrow can be displayed and observed "unwittingly," the writer scowling naively and the diners wondering, What the hell is he doing?
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: It's easier to be faithful to a restaurant than it is to a woman.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: Never eat in a restaurant that has a bowling trophy on the cash register.
quotes.author: Warren Miller

quotes.quote: Life is like a restaurant; you can have anything you want as long as you are willing to pay the price.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: But what makes my job so great is there's no one answer that's right for every restaurant.
quotes.author: David Rockwell

quotes.quote: It's very hard when you eat out every day for a living, and a new restaurant comes along and you haven't got that same vigour that you had 10 years ago.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Restaurants get you in with food to sell you liquor; religions get you in with belief to sell you rules.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: There are advantages to being a star though - you can always get a table in a full restaurant.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: A restaurant on the moon could not have had less atmosphere.
quotes.author: Geoff Dyer

quotes.quote: The secret of a successful restaurant is sharp knives.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Nothing goes perfectly, especially when you're opening a restaurant.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: A restaurant is a fantasy-a kind of living fantasy in which diners are the most important members of the cast.
quotes.author: Warner LeRoy

quotes.quote: When you go to a restaurant, the less you know about what happens in the kitchen, the more you enjoy your meal.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Wright

quotes.quote: Capitalism has turned human beings into commodities. To the owner of a restaurant: the cook and a bag of potatoes are equally important.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning. Great works are often born on a street corner or in a restaurant's revolving door.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Eating at fast food outlets and other restaurants is simply a manifestation of the commodification of time coupled with the relatively low value many Americans have placed on the food they eat.
quotes.author: Andrew F. Smith

quotes.quote: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: The disparity between a restaurant's price and food quality rises in direct proportion to the size of the pepper mill.
quotes.author: Bryan Miller

quotes.quote: The highway is replete with culinary landmines disguised as quaint local restaurants that carry such reassuring names as Millie’s, Pop’s and Capt’n Dick’s.
quotes.author: Bryan Miller

quotes.quote: I never eat in a restaurant that's over a hundred feet off the ground and won't stand still.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: I'm in favor of liberalized immigration because of the effect it would have on restaurants. I’d let just about everybody in except the English.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: Fame itself doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: A well-run restaurant is like a winning baseball team. It makes the most of every crew member's talent and takes advantage of every split-second opportunity to speed up service.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: I love Indian, Italian and Mexican food. And if it's a romantic type of thing, I like a good French restaurant.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: When I was a small boy, my father told me never to recommend a church or a woman to anyone. And I have found it wise never to recommend a restaurant either. Something always goes wrong with the cheese souffle.
quotes.author: Edmund G. Love

quotes.quote: I'm working harder than ever now, and I'm putting on my pants the same as I always have. I just get up every day and try to do a little better than the day before, and that is to run a great restaurant with great food, great wine, and great service. That’s my philosophy.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.quote: Great restaurants are, of course, nothing but mouth-brothels. There is no point in going to them if one intends to keep one’s belt buckled.
quotes.author: Frederic Raphael

quotes.quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: When you first entered the restaurant, I thought you were handsome and then, of course, you spoke.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt

quotes.quote: There is something about a closet that makes a skeleton terribly restless.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Our heart is restless until it rests in You.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: This restless world Is full of chances, which by habit's power to learn to bear is easier than to shun.
quotes.author: John Armstrong

quotes.quote: In most marriages, there is a contented partner and a restless one.
quotes.author: Jennifer Wilson

quotes.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Dreams and restless thoughts came flowing to him from the river, from the twinkling stars at night, from the sun's melting rays. Dreams and a restlessness of the soul came to him.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Humans are driven by a perpetual and restless desire of power.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Drawing is exercise for a restless imagination.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: We humans have lost the wisdom of genuinely resting and relaxing. We worry too much. We don't allow our bodies to heal, and we don't allow our minds and hearts to heal.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Remember: if you can cease all restless activity, your integral nature will appear.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The heart of man is restless until he finds rest in Thee.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Time flies on restless pinions - constant never.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The unorganized mind will always be restless until its content is reordered.
quotes.author: Ervin Seale

quotes.quote: Knowing that we are fulfilling God's purpose is the only thing that really gives rest to the restless human heart.
quotes.author: Charles Colson

quotes.quote: As a broken microphone cannot broadcast a message, so a restless mind cannot transmit prayers to God.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Man is a restless creature, nomadic at heart.
quotes.author: Tash Aw

quotes.quote: Be always restless, unsatisfied, unconforming. Whenever a habit becomes convenient, smash it! The greatest sin of all is satisfaction.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: If you become restless, speed up. If you become winded, slow down. You climb the mountain in an equilibrium between restlessness and exhaustion.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Success flourishes only in perseverance â€” ceaseless, restless perseverance.
quotes.author: Baron Manfred von Richthofen

quotes.quote: Men are restless, adventurous. Women are conservative - despite what current ideology says.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: The search for God means having the courage to set out on a risky path, it means following our restless hearts.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: We live on a restless planet in a violent universe.
quotes.author: Dale Jamieson

quotes.quote: The universe was born restless and has never since been still.
quotes.author: Henri Rousseau

quotes.quote: Restless thoughts are a kind of mental 'static' which must be silenced if we are to hear the whispers of our inner self.
quotes.author: John Novak

quotes.quote: A restless spirit who can't reach his goal, can't find a home until I've found my soul.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: His heart, like mine, was ticking off the time allotted to his small restless body.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: A man's body may grow old, but inside his spirit can still be as young and as restless as ever.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: But curiosity is a restless and scrupulous passion, and no one girl can endure, with patience, that hers should be baffled by another.
quotes.author: Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu

quotes.quote: In a restless heart the seed of betrayal lay.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Talented people are restless at their core.
quotes.author: Lorne Michaels

quotes.quote: I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The work of restoration cannot begin until a problem is fully faced.
quotes.author: Dan Allender

quotes.quote: By a Carpenter mankind was made, and only by that Carpenter can mankind be remade.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Most laws condemn the soul and pronounce sentence. The result of the law of my God is perfect. It condemns but forgives. It restores - more than abundantly - what it takes away.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: The restoration of the Church shall be of such a nature that it shall last for ever.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: We believe that the material substance of the world must be renewed and that this will not take place until the number of the elect is completed and that happy kingdom be made perfect and that after its completion there will be no more change.
quotes.author: Anselm

quotes.quote: Redemption means restoration—that is, the return to the goodness of an originally unscathed creation and not merely the addition of something supracreational.. This restoration affects the whole of creational life and not merely some limited area within it.
quotes.author: Albert Wolters

quotes.quote: Any nation concerned about the quality of life, now and forever, must be concerned about conservation. It will not be enough to merely halt the damage we've done. Our national heritage must be recovered and restored.
quotes.author: George Bush

quotes.quote: We must not only protect the countryside and save it from destruction, we must restore what has been destroyed and salvage the beauty and charm of our cities.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Renewal is the way of nature, and it must now become the way of man.
quotes.author: George Bush

quotes.quote: Restoration is an often disastrous solution: tourists in English cathedrals hear a good deal about the vandalism of Cromwell's soldiers, but the devastation wrought by Victorian restorers has been often far worse, however much better the motive.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: America's present need is not heroics, but healing; not nostrums, but normalcy; not revolution, but restoration.
quotes.author: Warren G. Harding

quotes.quote: The Church's Restoration / In eighteen-eighty-three / Has left for contemplation / Not what there used to be.
quotes.author: John Betjeman

quotes.quote: Repeat when you fail, and immediately seek God's forgiveness and restoration. Sin breaks our fellowship with God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When you hurt, be still! When you're restless, be still! When you feel lost, be still! It's in the stillness that you will find restoration, peace, and ultimately find yourself.
quotes.author: Earl Maree

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of the garden is the restoration of the five senses.
quotes.author: Hanna Rion

quotes.quote: For darkness restores what light cannot repair.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: To be violent in order to destroy is criminal. To be violent in order to restore is heroic.
quotes.author: Cesare Borgia

quotes.quote: Smaller change, greater change / So much here to rearrange / New concepts are hardly strange / Stand united welcome change / Restoration welcome change / Conservation bring the change / Re-establish forward change / For yes in time we will truly change.
quotes.author: Geraldine Taylor

quotes.quote: Bring back balance, bring restoration. / I saw the waves again, I felt the impact. / I saw the waves again, I watched the current sway us. / Bring back balance, bring restoration, go.
quotes.author: Andrew Jerome Trick

quotes.quote: Stretch out Your hand / And heal this nation / Stretch out Your hand / And bring restoration / Let Your mercy overflow us / Like a never failing stream / By the blood of Jesus cleanse us / O Lord it's You we seek / Cause Your face to shine upon us again.
quotes.author: Malcolm Duplessis

quotes.quote: Pourin' into each other hate and not love / Peace in our homes / In response our hearts bound / Makes it hard for us to love and understand each other / So out pour your spirit on ourselves cause there's / No power in prayer our minds are wondering / If this is all worth it because we are losing it / But through restoration and more of your spirit / More of your glory there's guaranteed victory.
quotes.author: J. Sheard

quotes.quote: He made all countries where he came his own; / And, viewing monarchs' secret arts of sway, / A royal factor for their kingdoms lay. / Thus, banished David spent abroad his time, / When to be God's anointed was his crime; / And, when restored, made his proud neighbours rue / Those choice remarks he from his travels drew. / Nor is he only by afflictions shown / To conquer others' realms, but rule his own.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: So Matthew Pengelly saved Jonathan Bately's son, / And the old man thanked God and Matthew for what he had done, / And the mother's heart was full of gratitude and joy, / For the restoration of her darling boy.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: With tranquil restoration:--feelings too / Of unremembered pleasure: such, perhaps, / As have no slight or trivial influence / On that best portion of a good man's life, / His little, nameless, unremembered, acts / Of kindness and of love.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: But resurrection is not just consolation — it is restoration. We get it all back — the love, the loved ones, the goods, the beauties of this life — but in new, unimaginable degrees of glory and joy and strength.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: Where do we even start on the daily walk of restoration and awakening? We start where we are.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: The worst of revolutions is a restoration.
quotes.author: Charles James Fox

quotes.quote: No one is really working for peace unless he is working primarily for the restoration of wisdom.
quotes.author: E. F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: Restoration and hope is available each time you return to God.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: True courage is a result of reasoning. A brave mind is always impregnable.
quotes.author: Jeremy Collier

quotes.quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
quotes.author: Jack Dixon

quotes.quote: When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no results.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Success action is cumulative in its results.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as failure. There are only results.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The greater the faith, the greater the result.
quotes.author: Frank Fools Crow

quotes.quote: You don't need to have extraordinary effort to achieve extraordinary results. You just need to do the ordinary, everyday things exceptionally well.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: The only way to accomplish big results is to think big and set big goals.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Enjoy your work so that others may enjoy the results.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: It is great to be introspective, self analysis can be useful, but only if it results in action.
quotes.author: Joe Sacco

quotes.quote: Doing well is the result of doing good. That's what capitalism is all about.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
