quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: An agreement cannot be the result of an imposition.
quotes.author: Nestor Kirchner

quotes.quote: The person who sends out positive thoughts activates the world around him positively and draws back to himself positive results.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: People have been known to achieve more as a result of working with others than against them.
quotes.author: Allan Fromme

quotes.quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Commitment comes as a result of choice, not conditions.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Big results require big ambitions.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: What we call results are beginnings.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Forget about style; worry about results.
quotes.author: Bobby Orr

quotes.quote: You cannot fail. You can only get results.
quotes.author: Ted Nicholas

quotes.quote: Excuses are useless. Results are priceless.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: The only thing that follows work is results.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: Infinite patience produces immediate results.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: When you see the results, you forget the pain.
quotes.author: Avi Arad

quotes.quote: Great results, can be achieved with small forces.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Resolutions require only words. Results take action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Good results when achieved make insults cease to exist.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: Attention with intention gets results worthy of mention.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: If you want different results, do not do the same things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Fall in love with the process, and the results will come.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Remember, what you focus on expands; results follow focus.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: The results of your life reflect the standards you've set.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: We get real results only in proportion to the real values we give.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: A successful person allows his results to speak for him, not his mouth.
quotes.author: Behdad Sami

quotes.quote: If you want extraordinary results you must put in extraordinary effort.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: Results are obtained by exploiting opportunities, not by solving problems.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Results take time to measure.
quotes.author: Hyrum W. Smith

quotes.quote: Positivity helps produce better results.
quotes.author: Lyoto Machida

quotes.quote: Positive thoughts lead to positive results.
quotes.author: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.quote: Success results when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Your results are an expression of your level of awareness.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: If we want better results, we have to make better choices.
quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

quotes.quote: The results of philanthropy are always beyond calculation.
quotes.author: Mary Ritter Beard

quotes.quote: Unexpected results are the rule rather than the exception.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Good order results spontaneously when things are let alone.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: All your behavior results from the thoughts that precede it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Remember that He who rose from the dead, rose to pour out His Holy Spirit into human lives, and, by that Spirit, to make available to any individual all the fullness of Himself, twenty-four hours a day.
quotes.author: Ray C. Stedman

quotes.quote: The greatest negative in the universe is the Cross, for with it God wiped out everything that was not of Himself: the greatest positive in the universe is the resurrection, for through it God brought into being all.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: While the resurrection promises us a new and perfect life in the future, God loves us too much to leave us alone to contend with the pain, guilt and loneliness of our present life.
quotes.author: Josh McDowell

quotes.quote: We live and die; Christ died and lived!
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: The symbolic language of the crucifixion is the death of the old paradigm; resurrection is a leap into a whole new way of thinking.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: If Christ was not raised, His death was in vain, your faith in Him would be pointless and your sins would still be counted against you with no hope of spiritual life.
quotes.author: John Macarthur

quotes.quote: The message of Easter is not that Jesus is alive, it is so much more. The message of Easter is that Jesus has risen!
quotes.author: Colin Smith

quotes.quote: Easter says you can put truth in a grave, but it won't stay there. You can nail it to a cross, wrap it in winding sheets and shut it up in a tomb, but it will rise!
quotes.author: Clarence W. Hall

quotes.quote: The resurrection of Jesus Christ was necessary to establish the truth of his mission and put the stamp of all-conquering power on his gospel.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmare to the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: The resurrection is not merely important to the historic Christian faith; without it, there would be no Christianity. It is the singular doctrine that elevates Christianity above all other world religions.
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: Few people seem to realize that the resurrection of Jesus is the cornerstone to a worldview that provides the perspective to all of life.
quotes.author: Josh McDowell

quotes.quote: The Gospel is the Gospel of the Risen Christ. There would be no Gospel for sinners if Christ had not been raised.
quotes.author: H.A. Ironside

quotes.quote: Our old history ends with the cross; our new history begins with the resurrection.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: The cross of Christ only triumphs in the breast of believers over the devil and the flesh, sin and sinners, when their eyes are directed to the power of His Resurrection.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: After death something new begins, over which all powers of the world of death have no more might.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The cross is the victory, the resurrection is the triumph. The resurrection is the public display of the victory, the triumph of the crucified one.
quotes.author: Leon Morris

quotes.quote: Jesus's resurrection is the beginning of God's new project not to snatch people away from earth to heaven but to colonize earth with the life of heaven. That, after all, is what the Lord's Prayer is about.
quotes.author: N.T. Wright

quotes.quote: There is no historic incident better or more variously supported than the resurrection of Christ.
quotes.author: Brooke Foss Wescott

quotes.quote: Live in the awareness that Christ lives and that He lives in His people.
quotes.author: Julien B. Well

quotes.quote: The devil, darkness, and death may swagger and boast, the pangs of life will sting for a while longer, but don't worry; the forces of evil are breathing their last. Not to worry. He's risen!
quotes.author: Charles R Swindoll

quotes.quote: If the Resurrection is resurrection from the dead, all hope and freedom are in spite of death.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: The resurrection gives my life meaning and direction and the opportunity to start over no matter what my circumstances.
quotes.author: Robert Flatt

quotes.quote: If I am to inherit Eternal Life, I must cultivate a correspondence with the Eternal.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: If you have the power to resurrect the dead man, firstly, be sure that he is a good man!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is more evidence that Jesus rose from the dead than there is that Julius Caesar ever lived or that Alexander the Great died at the age of thirty-three.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We are not preaching the Gospel of a dead Christ, but of a living Christ who sits exalted at the Father's right hand, and is living to save all who put their trust in Him. He saves to the uttermost all who come to God by Him.
quotes.author: H.A. Ironside

quotes.quote: The Church has its existance by virtue of the death and resurrection of Jesus. He was the first to emerge from death's dark dominions, as the One on Whom death had no claim, and over whom the grave had no power.
quotes.author: W.H. Rogers

quotes.quote: Let the resurrection joy lift us from loneliness and weakness and despair to strength and beauty and happiness.
quotes.author: Floyd W. Tomkins

quotes.quote: Revenge is the easiest of emotions to understand and to manipulate.
quotes.author: David Anthony Durham

quotes.quote: Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more man's nature runs to the more ought law to weed it out.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Revenge and retaliation always pertuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Retaliation is as just as night and down.
quotes.author: Lone Wolf

quotes.quote: Revenge is a sorrow for the person who has to take it on. And the person who is rash enough to think it's going to help a situation is always wrong.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: Retaliation by rebellion is hurtful to the intended target, but sadly it creates a heated desert that demands for the now rebel to reach out his arms of pride for help, a few succumb the courage to do it, many die because their arms are heavy.
quotes.author: Fort Free

quotes.quote: Revenge is the infliction of pain, in consequence of the neglect or violation of duty.
quotes.author: Elhanan Winchester

quotes.quote: Our capacity to retaliate must be, and is, massive in order to deter all forms of aggression.
quotes.author: John Foster Dulles

quotes.quote: Revenge is a particularly interesting concept, especially the notion of whether or not it exists outside of just an abstract idea.
quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

quotes.quote: Retaliation is related to nature and instinct, not to law. Law, by definition, cannot obey the same rules as nature.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: He who wrongs someone has to expect something in retaliation.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Revenge is like politics, one thing always leads to another until bad has become worse, and worse has become worst.
quotes.author: Jonas Jonasson

quotes.quote: Revenge can only be found on the road to self-destruction.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: Revenge has no more quenching effect on emotions than salt water has on thirst.
quotes.author: Walter Weckler

quotes.quote: The will to survive is not as important as the will to prevail the answer to criminal aggression is retaliation.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: Revenge is backward looking, whereas rationality is forward looking so the two fail to engage.
quotes.author: Alan Hamlin

quotes.quote: Without forgiveness life is governed by an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation.
quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

quotes.quote: Revenge is the act of passion, vengeance is an act of justice.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Revenge is an infection of the spirit.
quotes.author: Jonathan Maberry

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Revenge is a confession of pain.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Retirement is wonderful. It's doing nothing without worrying about getting caught at it.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Retirement, a time to do what you want to do, when you want to do it, where you want to do it, and, how you want to do it.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Retirement may be looked upon either as a prolonged holiday or as a rejection, a being thrown on to the scrap-heap.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The key to retirement is to find joy in the little things.
quotes.author: Susan Miller

quotes.quote: Retirement has been a discovery of beauty for me. I never had the time before to notice the beauty of my grandkids, my wife, the tree outside my very own front door. And, the beauty of time itself.
quotes.author: Hartman Jule

quotes.quote: Retirement without the love of letters is a living burial.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Retirement: That's when you return from work one day and say, 'Hi, Honey, I'm home, forever.'
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Retire from work, but not from life.
quotes.author: M.K. Soni

quotes.quote: To enjoy a long, comfortable retirement, save more today.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: The best time to start thinking about your retirement is before the boss does.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Retirement may be an ending, a closing, but it is also a new beginning.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The trouble with retirement is that you never get a day off.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: Retirement: Something arrived at in haste and lived at in leisure.
quotes.author: Dave Erhard

quotes.quote: If you start thinking about retirement in six months' time, you're already there.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: Retirement is when the living is easy and the payments are hard.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
quotes.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Life begins at retirement.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The goal of retirement is to live off your assets-not on them.
quotes.author: Frank Eberhart

quotes.quote: Retirement from Job does not mean retirement from life! It is the beginning not an end!
quotes.author: Ravi Samuel

quotes.quote: Retirement is having nothing to do and someone always keeping you from it.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In retirement, every day is Boss Day and every day is Employee Appreciation Day.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Retirement: It's nice to get out of the rat race, but you have to learn to get along with less cheese.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: I'm not just retiring from the company, I'm also retiring from my stress, my commute, my alarm clock, and my iron.
quotes.author: Hartman Jule

quotes.quote: I never stopped doing anything [when I retired], I stopped getting paid for it.
quotes.author: Bill Chavanne

quotes.quote: Retirement itself is the best gift. No gold watch could ever top it.
quotes.author: Abigail Charleson

quotes.quote: In retirement, only money and symptoms are consequential.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Retirement is a one-way trip to insignificance.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Retirement to me does not mean nothing to do but the realization of the decisions I made in the past. That I made in my life.
quotes.author: Jack Bowman

quotes.quote: Retirement . . . is when you stop living at work and begin working at living.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The world needs people who retreat from the world in order to see it more clearly.
quotes.author: Patrick Shen

quotes.quote: A lion will only retreat if you stare it in the eyes; likewise, so will fear.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: I am like a snake who has already bitten. I retreat from a direct battle while knowing the slow effect of the poison.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: It makes no difference if I burn my bridges behind me - I never retreat.
quotes.author: Fiorello LaGuardia

quotes.quote: There is no shame in strategic retreat if it lets you remain strong enough to go after the enemy later.
quotes.author: Jane Lindskold

quotes.quote: Braving obstacles and hardships is braver than retreat to tranquility.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Woman begins by resisting a man's advances and ends by blocking his retreat.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In politics, it seems, retreat is honorable if dictated by military considerations and shameful if even suggested for ethical reasons.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to burn his ships and cut all sources of retreat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A tactical retreat is not a bad response to a surprise assault, you know. First you survive. Then you choose your own ground. Then you counterattack.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: The temptations are great to simply retreat to the domain of private life and give up on our public problems.
quotes.author: Lee H. Hamilton

quotes.quote: In this revolution, no plans have been written for retreat.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: When over the enemy's lines, never forget your own line of retreat.
quotes.author: Oswald Boelke

quotes.quote: When the mind grasps the universe, the senses retreat.
quotes.author: Subhash Kak

quotes.quote: Certain battles were won by retreating.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: It is also a victory to know when to retreat.
quotes.author: Erno Paasilinna

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye, and the whole world would be blind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The noblest kind of retribution is not to become like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Retribution often means that we eventually do to ourselves what we hav
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Men may not get all they pay for in this world; but they must certainly pay for all they get.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglas

quotes.quote: There are some duties we owe even to those who have wronged us. There is, after all, a limit to retribution and punishment.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Never, never be afraid to do what's right, especially if the well-being of a person or animal is at stake. Society's punishments are small compared to the wounds we inflict on our soul when we look the other way.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Retribution is a dog chasing its tail.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: The Government is a servant and never should be anything but a servant. The moment the people become adjuncts to government, then the law of retribution begins to work, for such a relation is unnatural, immoral, and inhuman.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: On him that takes revenge, revenge shall be taken, and by a real evil he shall dearly pay for the goods that are but airy and fantastical; it is like a rolling stone, which, when a man hath forced up a hill, will return upon him with a greater violence, and break those bones whose sinews gave it motion.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: People pay for what they do, and still more for what they have allowed themselves to become. And they pay for it very simply; by the lives they lead.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Get what start the sinner may, Retribution, for all her lame leg, never quits his track.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Punishment is justice for the unjust.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Vengeance and retribution require a long time; it is the rule.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is such a thing as tempting the gods. Talking too much, too soon and with too much self-satisfaction has always seemed to me a sure way to court disaster. The forces of retribution are always listening. They never sleep.
quotes.author: Meg Greenfield

quotes.quote: Before a thunderstorm there is a build-up of tension which is only relieved by the explosive force of thunder and lightning. In human affairs there must be a clear distinction between the penalties for small and great crimes. Retribution for wrongdoing must be swiftly and surely applied if greater problems are to be prevented.
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.quote: That death is not to be judged an evil which is the end of a good life; for death becomes evil only by the retribution which follows it.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Though the mills of God grind slowly, yet they grind exceeding small; Though with patience He stands waiting, with exactness grinds He all.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longellow

quotes.quote: On many issues, empathy can pull us in the wrong direction. The outrage that comes from adopting the perspective of a victim can drive an appetite for retribution.
quotes.author: Paul Bloom

quotes.quote: Vengeance, retaliation, retribution, revenge are deceitful brothers; vile, beguiling demons promising justifiable compensation to a pained soul for his losses. Yet in truth they craftily fester away all else of worth remaining.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: God preordained, for his own glory and the display of His attributes of mercy and justice, a part of the human race, without any merit of their own, to eternal salvation, and another part, in just punishment of their sin, to eternal damnation.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Justice can span years. Retribution is not subject to a calendar.
quotes.author: Rod Serling

quotes.quote: Heaven never defaults. The wicked are sure of their wages, sooner or later.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Disease is the retribution of outraged Nature.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: There is a law of retribution in all things, direct or indirect, visible or invisible.
quotes.author: Miles Franklin

quotes.quote: The punishment which the wise suffer who refuse to take part in the government, is to live under the government of worse men.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The ways of the gods are long, but in the end they are not without strength.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: In every life, there comes a day of reckoning - a time when unsettled scores demand retribution, and our own lies and transgressions are finally laid bare.
quotes.author: Emily Thorne

quotes.quote: If you step on people in this life, you're going to come back as a cockroach.
quotes.author: Willie Davis

quotes.quote: Laws are sand, customs are rock. Laws can be evaded and punishment escaped but an openly transgressed custom brings sure punishment.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The first and greatest punishment of the sinner is the conscience of sin.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Remember always your end, and that lost time does not return.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Return good for good; return evil with justice.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Come back to yourself. Return to the voice of your body. Trust that much.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: It is most unusual to return to a place that has changed in ways you yourself have altered.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Something once lost will never return.
quotes.author: Yana Toboso

quotes.quote: The return makes one love the farewell.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: We must return to nature and nature's god.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.quote: When much is taken, something is returned.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: In the woods we return to reason and faith.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To return to nature is to embrace extinction.
quotes.author: Mark X.

quotes.quote: Return to the root and you will find the meaning.
quotes.author: Sengcan

quotes.quote: In the life of one man, never The same time returns.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Love others and as you do, that love will return to you.
quotes.author: Clay Aiken

quotes.quote: When man will return to nature, nature will return to him.
quotes.author: Grigoris Deoudis

quotes.quote: The development of man is a return to an original perfection.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: If you say hard things you must expect to hear them in return.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: The return we reap from generous actions is not always evident.
quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

quotes.quote: To love is to return to a home we never left, to remember who we are.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: The true return to nature is the definitive return to the elements-death.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: One may return to the place of his birth, He cannot go back to his youth.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: The truest indication of gratitude is to return what you are grateful for.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Once you hear something, you can never return to the time before you heard it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: The essence of love is to give continually, without expecting anything in return.
quotes.author: Ryuho Okawa

quotes.quote: The true test of faith is how we treat those who can do nothing for us in return.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: When the light returns to its source, it takes nothing of what it has illuminated.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: You may return here once you have fully come to understand that you are always here.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: You go away for a long time and return a different person - you never come all the way back.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: For whoever knows how to return a kindness he has received must be a friend above all price.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The words can not return.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The sweetness of reunion is the joy of heaven.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Reunion: enough reading stories, time to create new memories.
quotes.author: Amol Gade

quotes.quote: If you don't believe in ghosts, you've never been to a family reunion.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: It takes a certain amount of guts to go to your class reunions.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: Reunion together this time. Reunion forever be mine.
quotes.author: Erasure

quotes.quote: Hear you calling my name for a reunion thought I wandered too far away . But. now I've got a brand new start. Reunion, reunion of the heart.
quotes.author: The Hollies

quotes.quote: Make this the best of the rest of your days. Start your revolution and I'll see you at the reunion.
quotes.author: Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: It's been a while, but in our reunion, I can't remember why you went away
quotes.author: Betty Who

quotes.quote: Like some reunions do there won't be many people just me and him and you.
quotes.author: Wade Hayes

quotes.quote: Come on in, I've been expecting you sweet reunion, welcome home again.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: The best effect of fine persons is felt after we have left their presence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: That's the fun of going to a high school reunion: it's seeing the people who you were close to all those years ago, and re-exploring the relationships of the past.
quotes.author: Jon Hurwitz

quotes.quote: For my heart was softened by my return, and such a change had come to pass, that I felt like on who was toiling home barefoot from distant travel, and whose wanderings had lasted many years.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It'd been a long time since they'd been together, but as close as they were physically, they'd never been so far apart in every other way.
quotes.author: Jennifer Faye

quotes.quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: At the end of four years' time, at graduation, we were down to 12. At our reunion that we had several years ago, only 1 out of the 52 actually made it to ordination and priesthood. So there you go, there's your numbers.
quotes.author: Peter Jurasik

quotes.quote: When we recall the past, we usually find that it is the simplest things not the great occasions that in retrospect give off the greatest glow of happiness.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
quotes.author: Ricky Nelson

quotes.quote: Memories are the treasures that we keep locked deep within the storehouse of our souls, to keep our hearts warm when we are lonely.
quotes.author: Becky Aligada

quotes.quote: Never go to your high school reunion pregnant or they will think that is all you have done since you graduated.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Reunion reveals friendship potential that haven't yet been emerged in the past.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everywhere.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: Reunions are always fraught with awkward tensions the necessity to account for oneself; the attempt to find, through memories, an ember of the old emotions.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: Back on its golden hinges the gate of Memory swings, and my heart goes into the garden and walks with the olden things.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Family faces are magic mirrors. Looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present and future.
quotes.author: Gail Buckley

quotes.quote: Unfortunately these are not isolated incidents, and the people of Reunion are the first to be horrified by this despicable barbarity which mars the image of their island.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: Recall it as often as you wish a happy memory never wears out.
quotes.author: Libbie Fudim

quotes.quote: Reunion after long separation is even better than one's wedding night.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: The idea of an afterlife where you can be reunited with loved ones can be immensely consoling - though not to me.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: When you get together with childhood friends, for example, there's an intimacy that you instantly have because you share something really profound in your past. There's a shortcut to emotional intimacy if you share your past with somebody. It's really empowering when you're reunited with people who share that.
quotes.author: Jon Tenney

quotes.quote: Reunions are the first day of school all over again. Time casts away familiarity and replaces it with warm confusion. Seeing how the years have frayed the friends of our youth reminds us that we too have irrevocably changed and can never return to a state of innocence again.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Maybe we needed to break a little, so we could put ourselves back together more beautifully than before.
quotes.author: Leah Raeder

quotes.quote: Every long separation is a test: A test to see how powerful or how weak the will of reuniting is!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I like to see people reunited, I like to see people run to each other, I like the kissing and the crying, I like the impatience, the stories that the mouth can't tell fast enough, the ears that aren't big enough, the eyes that can't take in all of the change, I like the hugging, the bringing together, the end of missing someone.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: There were screams of joy as some were reunited with friends or family members that they had been separated from during the rush.
quotes.author: Helen Cardwell

quotes.quote: There is something beautiful about photography; it allows the self to be reunited with the world.
quotes.author: Luc Delahaye

quotes.quote: Just 'cause we're not broken up doesn't mean we can't reunite.
quotes.author: Tommy Blacha

quotes.quote: I want my family back. I guess what I'm trying to say is, I want to reunite the band.
quotes.author: Mitchell Hurwitz

quotes.quote: Someday we'll be reunited. In another world, a much better world.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Nothing warms the heart more than a family reunited.
quotes.author: Edward Kitsis

quotes.quote: And so the family was reunited again thanks to the power of a mother's love and the selflessness of a child's sacrifice.
quotes.author: Jacob Grimm

quotes.quote: At the very least, we should be reunited with what is rightfully ours.
quotes.author: Alexi Kaye Campbell

quotes.quote: Banding together in common weakness is what creates strength. It's the only way to deal with all the horrors in this world. It's why people get married and form friendships and reunite to relive the good old days.
quotes.author: David McCracken

quotes.quote: I believe there's a place where the restless souls wander. Burdened by the weight of their own sadness, they wait for a chance to set the wrong things right. Only then can they be reunited with the ones they love.
quotes.author: James O'Barr

quotes.quote: I want you back in my life / I wanna be with my wife again / Reunited, back to the business of love / Reunited, getting back together because / We're united
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: You're a warrior, fighting for your soul / Taken from a world above, and brought down to a world below / Re-united, re-united return the princess to the king, / Re-united, re-united, she's been taken for so long / Re-united, re-united and then she'll be filled with joy / Re-united, re-united like the days of her youth
quotes.author: Cornell Haynes

quotes.quote: Happy lovers, back together. / Uh, and I do feel proud. / Happy lovers, reunited. / Uh, and I do feel proud now. / I'm not the type to boost as you know, / Thou it was me who brought them back together.
quotes.author: Stephen Brian Street

quotes.quote: All the people living in, living in the world today / Reunited by our love, reunited by our pain (ooh) / All the things that I've done and I've seen / Still, I don't know, don't know what it means
quotes.author: Marina Lambrini Diamandis

quotes.quote: She was his reason for living / She was his rock and his best friend / They'll be reunited in heaven / 'Cause he's dying to see her again
quotes.author: Bill Anderson

quotes.quote: We'll play on till the end / It's not over not over my friends / We are together tonight / Reunited for all of our lives / And we thank you for it all / We will never forget
quotes.author: Glen Raymond Tipton

quotes.quote: I'd make it right if you want it / I want it back more than you know / I crossed the line do you want it / I want you back / And I'm waiting for you to get that feeling once again / Reunited in the end / And I've been waiting for you
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.quote: But I can't miss you 'til you go / We're better friends from a distance / Even more than I can say / And I hope we're reunited / After many, many days
quotes.author: When the Clock Strikes

quotes.quote: Cause life is what you make as we take it as reality / Now we're reunited and it feels so good / You know were reunited and it feels so good / Through the centuries of time heal the rhymes and unwind
quotes.author: Mick Hucknall

quotes.quote: Memory's flame is soon ignited / Lighting my lamp with amber glow / Quietly friends are reunited / Singing a song of long ago, la la la...
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: We only part to meet again.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: It takes one person to forgive, it takes two people to be reunited.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Despite the best of efforts, many foster children are neither reunited with their families, nor adopted.
quotes.author: Charles Bass

quotes.quote: Everybody simply wants to be reunited with their family members, their loved ones.
quotes.author: Gary Locke

quotes.quote: A man who desires revenge should dig two graves.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Can't get blood from a stone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dead men don't bite.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Dead men tell no tales.
quotes.author: J. Wilson

quotes.quote: Death is the great leveller.
quotes.author: Claudian

quotes.quote: Give the devil his due.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: He who plots to hurt others often hurts himself.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Neglect kills injuries, revenge increases them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The old law about an eye for an eye leaves everybody blind.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more a man's nature runs to, the more ought law to weed it out.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Revenge proves its own executioner.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Revenge is simply justice with teeth.
quotes.author: Simon R. Green

quotes.quote: For revenge is always the delight of a mean spirit, of a weak and petty mind! You may immediately draw proof of this-that no one rejoices more in revenge than a woman.
quotes.author: Gin Sander

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to improve yourself.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Revenge is sweet but not nourishing.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to live well.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Revenge is a dish best served cold.
quotes.author: Ricardo Montalban

quotes.quote: Revenge is an inhuman word.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Revenge, one for the lost and the lonely.
quotes.author: John Parr

quotes.quote: I breathe revenge tonight, it never tasted to sweet
quotes.author: Alan Clifford Day

quotes.quote: Revenge has always been looked upon as a sin and sometimes you feel like you had to sin to win.
quotes.author: Isaac Hayes

quotes.quote: Oh, my revenge is bitter sweet.
quotes.author: Cleveland Watkiss

quotes.quote: Like revenge is sweet on corrupted meat, the compulsion to feed the flames of greed.
quotes.author: R.W. Moerings

quotes.quote: And my act of revenge is just a part of the struggle.
quotes.author: Aniruddha Das

quotes.quote: Revenge must be the reason, why forgiveness was a thing I never knew.
quotes.author: Haggard

quotes.quote: Revenge is the method, whenever stepping keep a weapon close.
quotes.author: Willie James Clarke

quotes.quote: Stop this madness before it starts, revenge will only cause you regret.
quotes.author: Freddy Johnson

quotes.quote: And we both take our revenge but we still don't feel any better.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.quote: The noble soul reveres itself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Even the proud in all their boasting, must fall silent before the wise.
quotes.author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quotes.quote: The reverence for the deeds of our ancestors is a treacherous sentiment. Their merit was not to reverence the old, but to honor the present moment; and we falsely make them excuses of the very habit which they hated and defied.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The foundation of reverence is this perception, that the present holds within itself the complete sum of existence, backwards and forwards, that whole amplitude of time, which is eternity.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Proper respect to others is the most prudent rule of directing the measure of reverence due to ourselves.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: Worship means reverence and humility. It means revering your real self and humbling delusions.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: Reverence is one of the signs of strength, irreverence one of the surest indications of weakness. No man will rise high who jeers at sacred things. The fine loyalties of life must be reverenced or they will be fore sworn in the day of trial.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: Reverence to a woman in courtship is less to be dispensed with, as, generally, there is but little of it shown afterwards.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: The reverence for the Scriptures is an element of civilization, for thus has the history of the world been preserved, and is preserved.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Reverence is the sense that there is something larger than the self, larger even than the human, to which one accords respect and awe and assent.
quotes.author: Ursula Goodenough

quotes.quote: Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies, those transcendent moments of awe that change forever how we experience life and the world.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Reverence is the chief joy and power of life - reverence for that which is pure and bright in youth; for what is true and tried in age; for all that is gracious among the living, great among the dead, - and marvelous in the powers that cannot die.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Real devotion is an unbroken receptivity to the truth. Real devotion is rooted in an awed and reverent gratitude, but one that is lucid, grounded, and intelligent.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Reverence makes it possible to be whole, though ignorant. It is the wholeness of understanding.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: If a man loses his reverence for any part of life, he will lose his reverence for all of life.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Reverence for life is the highest court of appeal.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Reverence is profound respect mingled with love
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Reverence the highest, have patience with the lowest. Let this day's performance of the meanest duty be thy religion. Are the stars too distant, pick up the pebble that lies at thy feet, and from it learn the all.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Reverence for life is more than solicitude or sensitivity for life. It is a sense of the whole, a capacity for inspired response, a respect for the intricate universe of individual life. It is the supreme awareness of awareness itself.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Who is to decide what ought to command my reverence--my neighbor or I? . . You can't have reverence for a thing that doesn't command it. If you could do that, you could digest what you haven't eaten, and do other miracles and get a reputation.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches, but the spirit of reverence.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A reverence for life needs to be developed, in which all things are sacred.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: A holy reverence checks our speech, And praise sits silent on our tongues.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: Reverence: the spiritual attitude of a man to a god and a dog to a man.
quotes.author: Ambrose

quotes.quote: Cleanness of body was ever deemed to proceed from a due reverence to God.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Competition of praise inclineth to a reverence of antiquity. For men contend with the living, not with the dead.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light. Above all things reverence thyself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Where there is reverence there is fear, but there is not reverence everywhere that there is fear, because fear presumably has a wider extension than reverence.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Fullness of knowledge always means some understanding of the depths of our ignorance and that is always conducive to humility and reverence.
quotes.author: Robert Millikan

quotes.quote: No soul is desolate as long as there is a human being for whom it can feel trust and reverence.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: That’s the magic of revisions – every cut is necessary, and every cut hurts, but something new always grows.
quotes.author: Kelly Barnhill

quotes.quote: One great aim of revision is to cut out. In the exuberance of composition it is natural to throw in - as one does in speaking - a number of small words that add nothing to meaning but keep up the flow and rhythm of thought. In writing, not only does this surplusage not add to meaning, it subtracts from it. Read and revise, reread and revise, keeping reading and revising until your text seems adequate to your thought.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: God Himself has reserved no right of revision of His own laws nor is there any need for Him for any such revision.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: But revision is a creative act, not merely an analytical imposition of rules of style on a more creative first draft. That's a myth - that the first draft is more creative and everything after that is ruining creativity.
quotes.author: K. M. Soehnlein

quotes.quote: Revision is its own reward.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Revision is one of the exquisite pleasures of writing.
quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

quotes.quote: The moment clients realize that revisions are not an all-you-can-eat buffet, suddenly they realize they are not hungry.
quotes.author: Lester Beall

quotes.quote: The novel is never really in the first draft. The novel really happens in the revisions.
quotes.author: Tama Janowitz

quotes.quote: The writer’s life is a life of revisions.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: Revision is not the end of the creative process, but a new beginning. It's a chance not just to clean up and edit, but to open up and discover.
quotes.author: John Dufresne

quotes.quote: The great thing about revision is that it's your opportunity to fake being brilliant.
quotes.author: Will Shetterly

quotes.quote: Revision, once well done, becomes a sort of automatic itch which you scratch in the next work without thinking about it.
quotes.author: Romulus Linney

quotes.quote: In revision, your imagination becomes deeply engaged with your material. It's when you come to know your characters and begin to perceive their motivations and values.
quotes.author: John Dufresne

quotes.quote: Revision is a good impulse to have.
quotes.author: Rigoberto Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Every success story is a tale of constant adaption, revision and change.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Revision is not going back and fussing around, but going forward into the process of creation
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Writing is revision. All prose responds to work.
quotes.author: Tracy Kidder

quotes.quote: Revival is the eruption of God's heart on a life poured out.
quotes.author: Lou Engle

quotes.quote: Revival is an infusion of new spiritual life imparted by the Holy Spirit to existing parts of Christ's body.
quotes.author: Richard Lovelace

quotes.quote: Real revival does not begin with joyous singing. It begins with conviction and repentance on the part of Christians.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Revival is not just an emotional touch; it's a complete takeover!
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: Revival is the visitation of God which brings to life Christians who have been sleeping and restores a deep sense of God's near presence and holiness. Thence springs a vivid sense of sin and a profound exercise of heart in repentance, praise, and love, with an evangelistic outflow.
quotes.author: J.I. Packer

quotes.quote: Revival is a divinely initiated work in which God's people pray, repent of their sin, and return to a holy, Spirit-filled, obedient, love-relationship with God.
quotes.author: Henry Blackaby

quotes.quote: Revival is a renewed conviction of sin and repentance, followed by an intense desire to live in obedience to God. It is giving up one's will to God in deep humility.
quotes.author: Charles Finney

quotes.quote: Revival begins when you draw a circle around yourself and make sure everything in that circle is right with God.
quotes.author: Anne Graham Lotz

quotes.quote: Nothing teaches us about the preciousness of the Creator as much as when we learn the emptiness of everything else.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If revival is being withheld from us it is because some idol remains still enthroned; because we still insist in placing our reliance in human schemes; because we still refuse to face the unchangeable truth that, 'It is not by might, but by My Spirit.
quotes.author: Jonathan Goforth

quotes.quote: In revival, God is not concerned about filling empty churches, He is concerned about filling empty hearts.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: There can be no revival apart from the Holy Ghost; He is the author of every Heaven-sent movement.
quotes.author: James Alexander Stewart-Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Revival is falling in love with Jesus all over again.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Revival brings back a holy shock to apathy and carelessness.
quotes.author: Winkie Pratney

quotes.quote: Revival is when God's people return to God and God returns to them, and everyone sees the difference.
quotes.author: Henry Blackaby

quotes.quote: Present-day wickedness, apostasy and modern civilization cannot prevent revival.
quotes.author: John R. Rice

quotes.quote: Revivals begin with God's own people; the Holy Spirit touches their heart anew, and gives them new fervor and compassion, and zeal, new light and life, and when He has thus come to you, He next goes forth to the valley of dry bones... Oh, what responsibility this lays on the Church of God! If you grieve Him away from yourselves, or hinder His visit, then the poor perishing world suffers sorely!
quotes.author: Andrew Bonar

quotes.quote: Revival is not just a feeling of excitement of the Lord. We get excited about many things, but excitement is not a revival if God is not the thing that gets us excited.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: If we want revivals, we must revive our reverence for the Word of God.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Any true revival can be proven by the fact that it changed the moral climate of an area or nation.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Revival is when God gets so sick and tired of being misrepresented that He shows Himself.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Renewal and revival often begin when young people take a stand for God.
quotes.author: Jim Burns

quotes.quote: There are no magic formulas for revival. We cannot command it. We may await it with longing, and we are bound to express our longing in prayer.
quotes.author: Tom Wells

quotes.quote: All revival begins, and continues, in the prayer meeting. Some have also called prayer the "great fruit of revival." In times of revival, thousands may be found on their knees for hours, lifting up their heartfelt cries, with thanksgiving, to heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Blackaby

quotes.quote: A revival means days of heaven upon earth.
quotes.author: David Lloyd-Jones

quotes.quote: A true revival means nothing less than a revolution, casting out the spirit of worldliness and selfishness, and making God and His love triumph in the heart and life.
quotes.author: Andrew Murray

quotes.quote: Reformation is a return to the sound doctrine of the Bible. Revival is the practice of that sound doctrine under the power of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: As long as we are content to live without revival, we will.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Revival is not the discovery of some new truth. It's the rediscovery of the grand old truth of God's power in and through the Cross.
quotes.author: Sammy Tippit

quotes.quote: A revival may be expected when Christians have a spirit of prayer for a revival. That is, when they pray as if their hearts were set upon it. When Christians have the spirit of prayer for a revival. When they go about groaning out their hearts desire. When they have real travail of soul
quotes.author: Charles Grandison Finney

quotes.quote: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: A revolution is not a bed of roses. A revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: The Industrial Revolution was another of those extraordinary jumps forward in the story of civilization.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: The revolution has always been in the hands of the young. The young always inherit the revolution.
quotes.author: Huey Newton

quotes.quote: We're still in the first minutes of the first day of the Internet revolution.
quotes.author: Scott Cook

quotes.quote: A revolution is impossible without a revolutionary situation; furthermore, not every revolutionary situation leads to revolution.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: No real social change has ever been brought about without a revolution... revolution is but thought carried into action.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Personal transformation can and does have global effects. As we go, so goes the world, for the world is us. The revolution that will save the world is ultimately a personal one.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.quote: Every revolution was first a thought in one man's mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Revolution is not something fixed in ideology, nor is it something fashioned to a particular decade. It is a perpetual process embedded in the human spirit.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: The seed of revolution is repression.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The revolution that takes place in your head, nobody will ever see that.
quotes.author: Gil Scott-Heron

quotes.quote: Revolution is born as a social entity within the oppressor society.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Revolutions never go backwards.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Every revolution seems impossible at the beginning, and after it happens, it was inevitable.
quotes.author: Bill Ayers

quotes.quote: The most heroic word in all languages is revolution.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: A revolution does not last more than fifteen years, the period which coincides with the flourishing of a generation.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: The revolution is carried out by means of one's thought, not through one's family background.
quotes.author: Kim Jong Il

quotes.quote: The most important of all revolutions, a revolution in sentiments, manners and moral opinions.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The revolution will come from the people and the willingness to work towards something better, to fight for a better living.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: The greatest revolution in our generation is that of human beings, who by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: The only way to support a revolution is to make your own.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: The excessive increase of anything causes a reaction in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The worst of revolutions is a restoration.
quotes.author: Charles James Fox

quotes.quote: One revolution is like one cocktail, it just gets you organized for the next.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Revolution is something that actually starts in individual hearts.
quotes.author: Bill Viola

quotes.quote: Revolution begins with the self, in the self.
quotes.author: Toni Cade Bambara

quotes.quote: The revolution is really easy to do nowadays.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: The revolution doesn't always look perfect.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: Revolutionary war is an antitoxin which not only eliminates the enemy's poison but also purges us of our own filth.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: We borrowed money to fight the Revolutionary War, and so there was a debt owed. We paid it. If we have done that for 235 years, if we have done it ever since this country has existed, we can do it again.
quotes.author: Danny K. Davis

quotes.quote: The United States established itself as a trustworthy new nation in its first two decades after the Revolutionary War by paying its debts, even when many in the country believed it had no obligation to do so. Alexander Hamilton, the founder of this newspaper, insisted on it.
quotes.author: John Podhoretz

quotes.quote: I know not what course others may take; But as for me, Give me liberty, or give me death.
quotes.author: Patrick Henry

quotes.quote: War has generally had grave and fateful consequences for the American monetary and financial system. We have seen that the Revolutionary War occasioned a mass of depreciated fiat paper, worthless Continentals, a huge public debt, and the beginnings of central banking in the Bank of North America.
quotes.author: Murray Rothbard

quotes.quote: The soldier above all others prays for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest wounds and scars of war.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The revolutionary war is a war of the masses; it can be waged only by mobilizing the masses and relying on them.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: The means of defense against foreign danger historically have become the instruments of tyranny at home.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: The end of democracy and the defeat of the American Revolution will occur when government falls into the hands of lending institutions and moneyed incorporations.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: War is when the government tells you who the bad guy is. Revolution is when you decide that for yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Those who expect the blessings of freedom, must, like men undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: It is only in revolutionary struggle against the capitalists of every country, and only in union with the working women and men of the whole world, that we will achieve a new and brighter future-the socialist brotherhood of the workers.
quotes.author: Alexandra Kollontai

quotes.quote: Writing for a newspaper is like running a revolutionary war. You go to battle not when you are ready, but when action offers itself.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Our flag means all that our fathers meant in the Revolutionary War. It means all that the Declaration of Independence meant. It means justice. It means liberty. It means happiness.... Every color means liberty. Every thread means liberty. Every star and stripe means liberty.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If we do do not hang together then we will surely hang separately.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There Are Two Ways Of Resisting War: The Legal Way And The Revolutionary Way. The Legal Way Involves The Offer Of Alternatinve Service Not As A Privilege For A Few But As A Right For All. The Revolutionary View Involves An Uncompromising Resistance, With A View To Breaking The Power Of Militarism In Time Of Peace Or The Resources Of The State In Time Of War.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Weapons are an important factor in war, but not the decisive one; it is man and not materials that count.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Before the reward there must be labor. You plant before you harvest. You sow in tears before you reap joy.
quotes.author: Ralph Ransom

quotes.quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The highest reward for a person's toil is not what they get for it, but what they become by it.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: This is the great reward of service, to live, far out and on, in the life of others; this is the mystery of Christ, - to give life's best for such high sake that it shall be found again unto life eternal.
quotes.author: Joshua Chamberlain

quotes.quote: The reward of labour is life. Is that not enough?
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: The reward of great men is that, long after they have died, one is not quite sure that they are dead.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: The big rewards come to those who travel the second, undemanded mile.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: There are grand rewards for those who pick the high hard roads, but those rewards are hidden by years.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The reward for conformity is that everyone likes you but yourself.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: You don't reward reaction; you reward results.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: The reward of art is not fame or success but intoxication: that is why so many bad artists are unable to give it up.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: The reward of energy, enterprise and thrift is taxes.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: The reward of pain is experience.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: A reward once given becomes a right.
quotes.author: Frederick Herzberg

quotes.quote: There's no reward in life without risk.
quotes.author: Barry Farber

quotes.quote: The rewards of virtue alone abide secure.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The hope of reward is the solace of labor.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The final reward of the dead - to die no more.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Rewards and punishment is the lowest form of education.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: Every kind of reward constitutes a degradation of energy.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: No eternal reward will forgive us now for wasting the dawn.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: The greatest rewards come only from the greatest commitment.
quotes.author: Arlene Blum

quotes.quote: The reward of our work is not what we get, but what we become.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You can best reward a liar by believing nothing of what he says.
quotes.author: Aristippus

quotes.quote: There is sufficient reward in the mere consciousness of a good action.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The reward of one duty is the power to fulfill another.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The tougher the job, the greater the reward.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.quote: To me, there's no greater reward than being around people you care about and can be present with.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.quote: Rhetoric is the art of ruling the minds of men.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: RhetoricÂ is nothing but reason well dressed and argument put in order.
quotes.author: Jeremy Collier

quotes.quote: The two best rules for a system of rhetoric are: first, have something to say; and next, say it.
quotes.author: George Emmons

quotes.quote: RhetoricÂ never won a revolution yet.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: ProgressiveÂ rhetoricÂ has the effect of concealing social crisis and moral breakdown by presenting them as the birth pangs of a new order.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: Political rhetoric leads only to confusion.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Rhetoric is a poor substitute for action, and we have trusted only to rhetoric. If we are really to be a great nation, we must not merely talk; we must act big.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is the fault of ourÂ rhetoricÂ that we cannot strongly state one fact without seeming to belie some other.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The rhetoric is the key to the character. It's the verbal music of the piece.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.quote: RhetoricÂ is no substitute for reality.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: There is a truth and beauty in rhetoric; but it oftener serves ill turns than good ones.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Wherever there is persuasion, there is rhetoric, and wherever there is rhetoric, there is meaning.
quotes.author: Kenneth Burke

quotes.quote: RhetoricÂ in serious discourses is like the flowers in corn; pleasing to those who come only for amusement, but prejudicial to him who would reap profit from it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: One of the strongest forms of rhetoric in our society is the rhetoric of blame.
quotes.author: Kenneth Frazier

quotes.quote: RhetoricÂ paints with a broad brush.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The duty of rhetoric is to deal with such matters as we deliberate upon without arts or systems to guide us, in the hearing of persons who cannot take in at a glance a complicated argument, or follow a long chain of reasoning.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Rhetoric is the counterpart of Dialectic. Both alike are concerned with such things as come, more or less, within the general ken of all men and belong to no definite science.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Rhetoric may be defined as the faculty of observing in any given case the available means of persuasion.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Rhetoric falls into three divisions, determined by the three classes of listeners to speeches. For of the three elements in speech-making--speaker, subject, and person addressed it is the last one, the hearer, that determines the speech’s end and object.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The duty of rhetoric is to deal with such matters as we deliberate upon without arts or systems to guide us, in the hearing of persons who cannot take in at a glance a complicated argument or follow a long chain of reasoning.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Rhetoric is useful because truth and justice are in their nature stronger than their opposites; so that if decisions be made, not in conformity to the rule of propriety, it must have been that they have been got the better of through fault of the advocates themselves: and this is deserving reprehension.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Eloquence is the language of nature, and cannot be learned in the schools; but rhetoric is the creature of art, which he who feels least will most excel in.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Love's sweetest meanings are unspoken; the full heart knows no rhetoric of words
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: To devote yourself to the creation and enjoyment of beauty, then, can be a serious business-not always necessarily a means of escaping reality, but sometimes a means of holding on to the real when everything is flaking away into rhetoric and plot.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Action can give us the feeling of being useful, but only words can give us a sense of weight and purpose.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Power is the most persuasive rhetoric.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: We must continue to step in and stand up to resist reckless rhetoric and actions in a peaceful and forceful manner.
quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

quotes.quote: Rhetoric and dialectics can't change what I have learned from observation and experience.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: We had a sense of importance that would have led us to risk our lives for our rhetoric.
quotes.author: Jerry Rubin

quotes.quote: Rhetoric takes no real account of the art in literature and morality takes no account of the art in life.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Like a French poem is life; being only perfect in structure when with the masculine rhymes mingled the feminine are.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The monotony of a long heroic poem may often be pleasantly relieved by judicious interruptions in the perfect succession of rhymes, just as the metre may sometimes be adorned with occasional triplets and Alexandrines.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: A lot of my rhymes are just to get chuckles out of people. Anybody with half a brain is going to be able to tell when I'm joking and when I'm serious.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I think it's interesting that 'cologne' rhymes with 'alone.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: I love rhymes; I love to write a poem about New York and rhyme 'oysters' with 'The Cloisters.' And 'The lady from Knoxville who bought her brassieres by the box full.' I just feel a sort of small triumph.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: I'm not just making rhymes and making melodies. I'm expressing my true life force, energy.
quotes.author: India Arie

quotes.quote: Like many modern poets, I tend to conceal rhymes by placing them in the middle of lines, and to avoid immediate alliteration and assonance in favor of echoes placed later in the poems.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: When you're doing poetry like mine that rhymes, it's very easy to sound like a song that didn't work out!
quotes.author: John Cooper Clarke

quotes.quote: A rhyme that's witty and quite snappy makes everybody glad and happy.
quotes.author: Britt Allcroft

quotes.quote: You have only to believe if you wish to achieve. That rhymed. Unintentional.
quotes.author: Pam Brady

quotes.quote: Again, it's like poetry, so that they rhyme.
quotes.author: Mike Stoklasa

quotes.quote: Neither rhyme nor reason can express how much.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: When it rhymes, It Makes Sense! You made my life a wrecka so I'm dumping you Becca!
quotes.author: Rich Correll

quotes.quote: Exactly the attitude you must abandon! Most challenging of all, when in the mar-grave's presence, a lady must always, without exception, speak in a rhyming dactylic tetrameter.
quotes.author: Stephen Tolkin

quotes.quote: A poetic meter in which each line consists of four groups of three-syllable phrases with the accent on the first syllable. And the first syllable of the fourth phrase of each line must rhyme with the corresponding syllable on the line before it.
quotes.author: Stephen Tolkin

quotes.quote: Well, that shouldn't be too hard. Just think about all the things you love about her and make them rhyme. What have you got so far?
quotes.author: Fred Barron

quotes.quote: Well, I used a rhyming dictionary, but it only gives you options. The job of the poet is to say, 'this one, I guess.'
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: Learn it. Yep. A bit of rap rhyming. Free-styling.
quotes.author: Barbara Slade

quotes.quote: Your rhyme was fun but we're still good. We still can stunt, your from the hood.
quotes.author: Alyson Fouse

quotes.quote: Saying what I mean, meaning what I say / Hooray, you toot and chant when my rhymes are played / If I may, today, demonstrate my sway
quotes.author: Arnold E Hamilton

quotes.quote: My rhyme is devious, but believe me it's / One of a kind, you agree from the previous
quotes.author: Arnold E Hamilton

quotes.quote: Rhyme to ill, rhyme to romp / Rhyme to smack, rhyme to shock, rhyme to roll / Rhyme to destroy anything toy boy / On the microphone
quotes.author: Cedric Ulmont

quotes.quote: Rhymes are moved and you can't be stop with the / Beat as it goes to the rhyme that flows
quotes.author: Cedric Ulmont

quotes.quote: Rhymes - what are these things that I talk about? / Hear them in the walkman every time you want to walk about / Never lost a battle in which I fought / And if rhyme was a crime, I'd never get caught
quotes.author: John Robert King

quotes.quote: When I wake up people take up mostly all of my time / I'm not singing, phone keep ringing cause I make up a rhyme
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: It's tricky to rock a rhyme, to rock a rhyme that's right on time
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: Rhyme to the rhythm / Come on feel the rhythm / There's a rhythm that rhymes / That rock the whole time
quotes.author: Matthew James Aitken

quotes.quote: Rhymes faster than a speeding bullet / Has more rhymes than a train has tracks
quotes.author: James B Spicer

quotes.quote: From the day I came out my mother's womb / I found myself in the operating room / Then the doctor spanked me on my behind / I didn't cry, the kid started to rhyme
quotes.author: James B Spicer

quotes.quote: I be writing, writing, writing rhymes everyday / Don't you say no more you don't want to battle
quotes.author: Trevor Tahiem Smith

quotes.quote: TheÂ rhythmÂ of daily action aligned with your goals creates the momentum that separates dreamers from super-achievers .
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is something you either have or don't have, but when you have it, you have it all over.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Our biological rhythms are the symphony of the cosmos, music embedded deep within us to which we dance, even when we can't name the tune.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is one of the principal translators between dream and reality.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: The domain ofÂ rhythmÂ extends from the spiritual to the carnal.
quotes.author: Bruno Walter

quotes.quote: A certain ambiguity ofÂ rhythmÂ is one of the beauties of a poem.
quotes.author: Anne Ridler

quotes.quote: Rhythm is the life of space of time danced through.
quotes.author: Cecil Taylor

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is as necessary in a picture as pigment; it is as much a part of painting as of music.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: The mathematics ofÂ rhythmÂ are universal. They don't belong to any particular culture.
quotes.author: John McLaughlin

quotes.quote: CertainÂ rhythmsÂ just have certain moods.
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is a perception of time... when drawing, the tiredness of the hand is aÂ rhythm.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is one of the most powerful of pleasures, and when we feel a pleasurableÂ rhythmÂ we hope it will continue. When it does, it grows sweeter.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is our universal mother tongue. It's the language of the soul.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: The best way to express rhythm is music.
quotes.author: John Hartford

quotes.quote: Rhythm is sound in motion. It is related to the pulse, the heartbeat, the way we breathe. It rises and falls. It takes us into ourselves; it takes us out of ourselves.
quotes.author: Edward Hirsch

quotes.quote: RhythmÂ is the pulse of music.
quotes.author: Ignacy Jan Paderewski

quotes.quote: OnlyÂ rhythmÂ brings about a poetic short-circuit and transforms the copper into gold, the words into life.
quotes.author: Léopold Sédar Senghor

quotes.quote: The sonatas of Mozart are unique: they are too easy for children, and too difficult for artists.
quotes.author: Artur Schnabel

quotes.quote: The more you love music, the more music you love.
quotes.author: Abram Chasins

quotes.quote: Sweet popular music is claptrap in the main, and the main is where it belongs.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: Making music is like making love: the act is always the same, but each time it's different.
quotes.author: Artur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: The contemporary artist expresses his feelings through the music, instead of filtering the music through his feelings.
quotes.author: Isaac Stern

quotes.quote: During adolescence the music you enjoy is good music no matter how bad it is.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The difference between classical and popular music is the difference between antique and antic.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Good musicians execute their music but bad ones murder it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Marriage brings music into a man's life. He learns to play second fiddle at home.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some girls are music lovers, while others can love without it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: There is music in the air, music all around us, the world is full of it, and you simply take as much as you require.
quotes.author: Edward Elgar

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be an error.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A rich man and his money are not so easily parted. Me, I have seen a well-known millionaire turn out a tramful of people to seek for a dropped halfpenny.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Wealth often takes away chances from men as well as poverty. There is none to tell the rich to go on striving, for a rich man makes the law that hallows and hollows his own life.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

quotes.quote: I know that a man who shows me his wealth is like the beggar who shows me his poverty; they are both looking for alms from me, the rich man for the alms of my envy, the poor man for the alms of my guilt.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: In Brazil, a poor man goes to jail when he steals. When a rich man steals, he becomes a minister.
quotes.author: Luis Inacio Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: It tires me to talk to rich men. You expect a man of millions, the head of a great industry, to be a man worth hearing; but as a rule they don't know anything outside their own business.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
