quotes.quote: I ask the political economists and the moralists if they have ever calculated the number of individuals who must be condemned to misery, overwork, demoralisation, degradation, rank ignorance, overwhelming misfortune and utter penury in order to produce one rich man.
quotes.author: Almeida Garrett

quotes.quote: Wherever there is great property there is great inequality. For one very rich man there must be at least five hundred poor, and the affluence of the few supposes the indigence of the many. The affluence of the rich excites the indignation of the poor, who are often both driven by want, and prompted by envy, to invade his possessions.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: He who recognizes no higher logic than that of the shilling may become a very rich man, and yet remain all the while an exceedingly poor creature; for riches are no proof whatever of moral worth, and their glitter often serves only to draw attention to the worthlessness of their possessor, as the glow-worm's light reveals the grub.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Certain rich men, whose lives are evil and corrupt, are the representatives of predatory wealth accumulated by all forms of inequity, from the oppression of wage workers to unfair methods of crushing out competition.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the world of high finance the shilling of the idle rich man can buy more than that of the poor, industrious man.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.quote: Why are you not smarter? It's only the rich who can't afford to be smart. They're compromised. They got locked years ago into privilege. They have to protect their belongings. No one is meaner than the rich. Trust me. But they have to follow the rules of their sh— civilized world.
quotes.author: Michael Oondatje

quotes.quote: There’s class warfare, all right, but it’s my class, the rich class, that’s making war, and we’re winning.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: I do not see how it is possible for a man to die worth fifty million of dollars, or ten million of dollars, in a city full of want, when he meets almost every day the withered hand of beggary and the white lips of famine. How a man can withstand all that, and hold in the clutch of his greed twenty or thirty million of dollars, is past my comprehension. I do not see how he can do it. I should not think he could do it any more than he could keep a pile of lumber on the beach, where hundreds and thousands of men were drowning in the sea.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The rich and the poor truly are from different realms: one has adapted to become an expert in material forfeit; the other has forfeited all they are to material, and thus is enslaved, by it.
quotes.author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quotes.quote: If all the rich people in the world divided up their money among themselves there wouldn't be enough to go around.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: When the people shall have nothing more to eat, they will eat the rich.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: The greatest astonishment of my life was the discovery that the man who does the work is not the man who gets rich.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Experience demands that man is the only animal which devours his own kind, for I can apply no milder term to the general prey of the rich on the poor.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: You may be rich, but there is one thing you can't afford - that is, if you are a good sort - you can't afford to spend money on your own luxuries while there are people around you wanting the necessaries of life.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The rich man is always sold to the institution which makes him rich. Absolutely speaking, the more money, the less virtue.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If a rich man is proud of his wealth, he should not be praised until it is known how he employs it.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The rich would have to eat money, but luckily the poor provide food.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: To suppose as we all suppose, that we could be rich and not behave as the rich behave, is like supposing that we could drink all day and stay sober.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: The rich man's happiness is but from the teeth outwards, a counterfeit satisfaction, with a worm in his heart.
quotes.author: Wellins Calcott

quotes.quote: A rich man is an honest man—no thanks to him; for he would be a double knave, to cheat mankind when he had no need of it: he has no occasion to press upon his integrity, nor so much as to touch upon the borders of dishonesty.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: It is no exaggeration to say that the rich own most of what there is that is not nailed down.
quotes.author: Paul Robert Wolff

quotes.quote: The poor man wishes to conceal his poverty, and the rich man his wealth: the former fears lest he be despised, the latter lest he be plundered.
quotes.author: Marie von Ebner

quotes.quote: The rich man who gives, steals twice over. First he steals the money and then the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Short of genius a rich man cannot even imagine poverty.
quotes.author: Charles Peguy

quotes.quote: Some people have an unconquerable love of riddles. They may have the chance of listening to plain sense, or to such wisdom that explains life; but no, they must go and work their brains over a riddle, just because they do not understand what it means.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: A writer is someone who can make a riddle out of an answer.
quotes.author: Karl Kaus

quotes.quote: Every human life involves an unfathomable mystery, for man is the riddle of the universe, and the riddle of man in his endowment with personal capacities.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: How to teach people to do what hasn't been done is a great riddle.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood. All is riddle, and the key to a riddle is another riddle.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The Riddle Master himself lost the key to his own riddles one day,' he said in his deep, reed-pure voice, 'and he found it again at the bottom of his heart.
quotes.author: Patricia A. Mckillip

quotes.quote: The riddles of God are more satisfying than the solutions of man.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Woman will always continue to be a cute riddle or a beautiful puzzle, in the meantime man believes that he solves it.
quotes.author: Eyden I.

quotes.quote: Every riddle has one perfect answer. For life it is love.
quotes.author: Syed Arshad

quotes.quote: The greatest riddle of all.... the riddle of man! The complex mystery of the universal human being as he stands wihtin the threshold of universal laws. This is the most fascinating puzzle!
quotes.author: Adriana Koulias

quotes.quote: Much like life, you don't complete a puzzle by throwing away the pieces.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Truth has to be given in riddles. People can't take truth if it comes charging at them like a bull. The bull is always killed. You have to give people the truth in a riddle, hide it so they go looking for it and find it piece by piece; that way they learn to live with it.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.quote: There is a riddle about a man who is locked in a room with nothing but a bed and a calendar, and the question is: How does he survive? The answer is: He eats dates from the calendar and drinks from the springs of the bed.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Life's perhaps the only riddle That we shrink from giving up.
quotes.author: W.S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: It is man's destiny to ponder on the riddle of existence and, as a byproduct of his wonderment, to create a new life on this earth.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: The riddle of the age has for each a private solution.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Man's moral nature is a riddle which only eternity can solve.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: For an answer which cannot be expressed the question too cannot be expressed. The riddle does not exist.
quotes.author: Paul Watzlawick

quotes.quote: The scientist is not much given to talking of the riddle of the universe. 'Riddle' is not a scientific term. The conception of a riddle is 'something which can he solved.' And hence the scientist does not use that popular phrase. We don't know the why of anything. On that matter we are no further advanced than was the cavedweller. The scientist is contented if he can contribute something toward the knowledge of what is and how it is.
quotes.author: Charles Proteus Steinmetz

quotes.quote: The greatest puzzle in the world, young man, the greatest challenge a man can face, a solving the riddle of a women's heart.
quotes.author: Steve Hamilton

quotes.quote: Not every puzzle is intended to be solved. Some are in place to test your limits. Others are, in fact, not puzzles at all.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The world's a puzzle; no need to make sense out of it.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Life is essentially a series of events to be lived through rather than intellectual riddles to be played with and solved.
quotes.author: George Arthur Buttrick

quotes.quote: Out yonder there was this huge world...which stands before us like a great eternal riddle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The poet is the man made to solve the riddle of the universe who brings the whole soul of man into activity.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: What a haunting, inescapable riddle life was.
quotes.author: Walter de la Mare

quotes.quote: Here, there, and everywhere — an opinionated riddle.
quotes.author: Mary Downing Hahn

quotes.quote: To become rich is easy. Much harder is to solve the riddles of of the heart.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Riddle me this, riddle me that. Who's afraid of the big black bat?
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Understanding a metaphor is like deciphering a code or unraveling a riddle.
quotes.author: Max Black

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's great to ride with you while you're taking care of business.
quotes.author: Darryl Worley

quotes.quote: In the road ships must ride in 30, 40, or 50 fathom water, not above half a mile from the shore at farthest: and if there are many ships they must ride close one by another.
quotes.author: William Dampier

quotes.quote: You can either ride the wave or suck the surf.
quotes.author: Joe Caruso

quotes.quote: You ride out the downturn and you're usually rewarded in the end.
quotes.author: John Buckingham

quotes.quote: If you surrendered to the air, you could ride it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: You can't ride two horses with one behind.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The ride does not require an explanation, just participants.
quotes.author: Sonny Barger

quotes.quote: Life's a car ride. Sometimes it's cruise control down smooth highways. Other times it's potholes on rural roads.
quotes.author: Carolyn Mackler

quotes.quote: One may ride upon a tiger's back but it is fatal to dismount
quotes.author: Ernest Bramah

quotes.quote: If you ride like lightning, you're gonna crash like thunder.
quotes.author: Ben Mendelsohn

quotes.quote: You can never ride on the wave that came in and went out yesterday.
quotes.author: John Wanamaker

quotes.quote: It's the ride of life the journey from here to there living and loving every moment like we have none to spare.
quotes.author: Jess "Chief" Brynjulson

quotes.quote: You ride astride the imaginary in order to hunt down the real.
quotes.author: Breyten Breytenbach

quotes.quote: When you're turning the crankset, you're riding the bike. When you're coasting, you're just along for the ride.
quotes.author: Ned Overend

quotes.quote: Have fun, be active. Ride a bike instead of driving, for example.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.quote: A free ride and free food are two of the three things no pilot ever turns down.
quotes.author: Dick Rutan

quotes.quote: Every time you ride, your either teaching or un-teaching your horse.
quotes.author: Gordon Wright

quotes.quote: You ride it as hard as you can, as fast as you can, and see where we get at the end of things.
quotes.author: Justin Smith

quotes.quote: Ride higher in life unto the higher life.
quotes.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quotes.quote: Life is like a roller coaster. It has its ups and downs. But it's your choice to scream or enjoy the ride.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take care of your car in the garage, and the car will take care of you on the road.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Ride as much or as little, or as long or as short as you feel. But ride.
quotes.author: Eddy Merckx

quotes.quote: Ride the horse in the direction that it's going.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: You ride in a limousine the first time, it's a big thrill but after that it's just a stupid car.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: The more you ride the bike, the better it gets, and the more you know how to ride it
quotes.author: John DiMaggio

quotes.quote: Anyone can ride with us, you don't have to be a member. You don't have to ride a motorcycle; you can drive a car and help us carry our equipment.
quotes.author: Traci Dickson

quotes.quote: Anytime you ride against the best in the world, it becomes a learning process.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.quote: It's not the beginning or the destination that counts. It's the ride in between.
quotes.author: David Baldacci

quotes.quote: We do not ride on the railroad; it rides upon us.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning. Great works are often born on a street corner or in a restaurant's revolving door.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: There is always something ridiculous about the emotions of people whom one has ceased to love.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: All the passions make us commit faults; love makes us commit the most ridiculous ones.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: People don't mind being mean; but they never want to be ridiculous.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Of all ridiculous things the most ridiculous seems to me, to be busy -- to be a man who is brisk about his food and his work. Therefore, whenever I see a fly settling, in the decisive moment, on the nose of such a person of affairs; or if he is spattered with mud from a carriage which drives past him in still greater haste; or the drawbridge opens up before him; or a tile falls down and knocks him dead, then I laugh heartily.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Some people, right away, do know each other deeply. Love gives them insight into each other. Love makes them pledge themselves to each other. Love makes them inventive. Yes, it also makes them ridiculous. But that's just another of love's glories. It makes being ridiculous permissible.
quotes.author: James Kuzner

quotes.quote: Those who are actually in society, are not as ridiculous as those who are trying to get in.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: Oh Lord, make my enemies ridiculous. And God granted it.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Doubt is an uncomfortable condition, but certainty is a ridiculous one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: It’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: The problem is that the people with the most ridiculous ideas are always the people who are most certain of them.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: It will do you no harm to find yourself ridiculous. Resign yourself to be the fool you are…We must always take risks. That is our destiny...
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: My wife's jealousy is getting ridiculous. The other day she looked at my calendar and wanted to know who May was.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: It is not the criminal things that are hardest to confess, but the ridiculous and the shameful.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: A new idea is first condemned as ridiculous and then dismissed as trivial, until finally, it becomes what everybody knows.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Everything has two sides -- the outside that is ridiculous, and the inside that is solemn.
quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

quotes.quote: Behind many acts that are thought ridiculous there lie wise and weighty motives.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: We are made ridiculous less by our defects than by the affectation of qualities which are not ours.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
quotes.author: Carrie P. Snow

quotes.quote: Truth rides best In that which looks ridiculous.
quotes.author: Eugene J. Martin

quotes.quote: How ridiculous and unrealistic is the man who is astonished at anything that happens in life.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: To be curious about that which is not one's concern while still in ignorance of oneself is ridiculous.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The ridiculous is more easily retained than the admirable.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: You cannot learn to skate without making yourself ridiculous - the ice of life is slippery.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I told my psychiatrist that everyone hates me. He said I was being ridiculous - everyone hasn't met me yet.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Sometimes life gives us lessons sent in ridiculous packaging.
quotes.author: Dar Williams

quotes.quote: The trouble with life ... is its amorphousness, its ridiculous fluidity. Look at it: thinly plotted, largely themeless, sentimental and ineluctably trite. The dialogue is poor, or at least violently uneven. The twists are either predictable or sensationalist. And it's always the same beginning; and the same ending.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: A painting in a museum hears more ridiculous opinions than anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.quote: The intelligent man finds almost everything ridiculous, the sensible man hardly anything.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The righteous ones are always exhausting to have around.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.quote: The righteous man takes his life in his hand whenever he utters the truth.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Every righteous man or woman is entitled to revelation concerning his own affairs.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: When you're righteous, you don't have to tell people that you're righteous.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.quote: Most of us have to be self-righteous before we can be righteous.
quotes.author: Vera Brittain

quotes.quote: Those who are self-righteous are not prominent.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: To be individually righteous is the first of all duties, come what may to ones self, to one's country, to society, and to civilization itself.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Redemption is prior to righteousness. You cannot be righteous until you are first redeemed.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: Righteous people have no sense of humor.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: No fury more righteous than that of a sinner accused of the wrong sin.
quotes.author: Don Paterson

quotes.quote: Self-righteous people can talk themselves into forgetting they are part of a civilization. They can then feed on that culture, bringing it down. It's happened many times in the past. It could happen to us.
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.quote: Ye must leave righteous ways behind, not to speak of unrighteous ways.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Tell the righteous it will be well with them, for they will enjoy the fruit of their deeds.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.quote: There's no one so self-righteous as someone policing someone else's morality.
quotes.author: Laurell K Hamilton

quotes.quote: A righteous wife can make a poor man feel like a king.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: To the self-righteous, being judged according to deeds does not seem too alarming but to the man who knows himself the thought is terrifying.
quotes.author: Paul Washer

quotes.quote: One of the best ways to celebrate righteous history is to make more of it, make more righteous history!
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: The self-righteous have their fig leaves so tightly bound that they have forgotten the seeping wounds beneath the foliage.
quotes.author: Mark Lowry

quotes.quote: Even in a righteous cause force is a fearful thing; God only helps when men can help no more.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Righteous is the one who was able to demonstrate compassion in face of human suffering.
quotes.author: Aleksander Kwasniewski

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: It is a hard thing for a man to be righteous, if the unrighteous man is to have the greater right.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: It is the duty of righteous men to make war on all undeserved privilege, but one must not forget that this is a war without end.
quotes.author: Primo Levi

quotes.quote: A puritan is a person who pours righteous indignation into the wrong things.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It's more important to be righteous than to be right.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: We do not become righteous by doing righteous deed but, having been made righteous, we do righteous deeds.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A righteous man hates lying, But a wicked man is loathsome and comes to shame.
quotes.author: Solomon

quotes.quote: If a man aspires towards a righteous life, his first act of abstinence is from injury to animals.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Young people like to feel self-righteous, like they're on the right side of things.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: I shall never relinquish my sword for a ring. The right man wouldn't ask me to.
quotes.author: Seth Grahame-Smith

quotes.quote: The longer a wedding ring is worn, the harder it is to remove.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When a young man gives his girl a ring, he gives it with all his heart and most of his savings.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Opportunity knocks for every man, but a woman gets a ring.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: During courtship a girl is unpredictable until she gets an engagement ring - then she shows her hand.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The bright sparkle of a diamond ring often renders a woman stone-blind to the defects of the man who gives it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A wedding ring may not be as tight as a tourniquet, but it stops the wearer's circulation.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some girls get rings with large diamonds, others get rings that look as if they were all paid for.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A ring on the finger is worth two on the phone.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: An engagement ring is a piece of jewelry that usually turns a right-handed girl into a left handed one.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To the bachelor, a wedding ring symbolizes a vicious cycle.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A girl uses soft soap to get a ring off her finger - and also to get one on.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Marriage rings are not of this stuff.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Wait for the ring; it is strong, It has a magic of might.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: Ring out your bells, let mourning shows be spread;
quotes.author: Sir Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: A ring upon her finger, walks the bride, with the bridegroom tall and handsome at her side.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Ring out, wild bells, to the wild sky.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: But he brake a golden ring with me, the pledge of his faith to be.
quotes.author: John Bannister Tabb

quotes.quote: This ring for me is far most dear of all this isle within it knows
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: I've found great lord thy ring of gold, thy fortune truly knows no bounds.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The ring so worn as you behold , so thin so pale is yet of gold.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: For careless joys, yet it's I who wear the ring.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: I bring to thee this ring, made for thy finger fit.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: I depose your finger of that ring, and crowne mine with that a while.
quotes.author: Richard Lovelace

quotes.quote: And here is the ring she gave me with love's sweet promise then.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: The sexiest thing in the world is to be totally naked with your wedding band on.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.quote: Rings and jewels are not gifts, but apologies for gifts. The only true gift is a portion of thyself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Love may be a ring that has no end, but the logic is far from circular.
quotes.author: Amanda Mosher

quotes.quote: A ring is a halo on your finger.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: No couple buying wedding rings wants to be reminded that someday one of them will have to accept the other one's ring from a nurse or an undertaker.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: To create a big ripple effect, stop keeping yourself a secret.
quotes.author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quotes.quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Everything we do, even the slightest thing we do, can have a ripple effect and repercussions that emanate. If you throw a pebble into the water on one side of the ocean, it can create a tidal wave on the other side.
quotes.author: Victor Webster

quotes.quote: Gaiety is often the reckless ripple over depths of despair.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: We are ripples of consciousness of the vast ocean of consciousness. If we get agitated and become part of the reactionary and vitriolic behavior sometimes around us, we will only add to the disturbance.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the ripple effect of what you do. These kinds of actions have toppled empires.
quotes.author: Leila Janah

quotes.quote: How long after you are gone will ripples remain as evidence that you were cast into the pool of life?
quotes.author: Grant M. Bright

quotes.quote: Our power lies in our small daily choices, one after another, to create eternal ripples of a life well lived.
quotes.author: Mollie Marti

quotes.quote: Rumors are like ripples in a cornfield. They are ephemeral, but they do indicate which way the wind is blowing.
quotes.author: Susan J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Own your joy so that you can be happier and bring more energy to the world. That ripple effect works on a quantum level. It brings about changes in the world.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Just as ripples spread out when a single pebble is dropped into water, the actions of individuals can have far-reaching effects.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Consciousness is a vast ocean and thinking is the waves & ripples on the surface of the ocean.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: While it may seem small, the ripple effects of small things is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Matt Bevin

quotes.quote: Invention, my dear friends, is 93% perspiration, 6% electricity, 4% evaporation, and 2% butterscotch ripple.
quotes.author: Gene Wilder

quotes.quote: No one is actually dead until the ripples they cause in the world die away.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: When we focus our energy towards constructing a passionate, meaningful life, we are tossing a pebble into the world, creating a beautiful ripple effect of inspiration. When one person follows a dream, tries something new or takes a daring leap, everyone nearby feels that energy, and before too long they are making their own daring leaps and inspiring yet another circle.
quotes.author: Christine Mason Miller

quotes.quote: The foolish are like ripples on water, For whatsoever they do is quickly effaced; But the righteous are like carvings upon stone, For their smallest act is durable.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Sometimes big things happen, and they echo. Those echoes crash across worlds. They are the ripples in the fabric of things. Often they manifest as storms. Reality is a fragile thing, after all.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: We come and go just like ripples in a stream.
quotes.author: John V. Politis

quotes.quote: Throw a stone into the stream and the ripples that propagate themselves are the beautiful type of all influence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Remember there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Drop a word in the ocean of meaning and concentric ripples form. To define a single word means to try to catch those ripples. No one's hands are fast enough.
quotes.author: Robert Bringhurst

quotes.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Our wings are small but the ripples of the heart are infinite.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Everybody talks about wanting to change things and help and fix, but ultimately all you can do is fix yourself. And that's a lot. Because if you can fix yourself, it has a ripple effect.
quotes.author: Rob Reiner

quotes.quote: Acts of sacrifice and decency without regard to what's in it for you create a ripple effect. Ones that lift up families and communities, that spread opportunity.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: We live as ripples of energy in the vast ocean of energy.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope... and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring those ripples build a current that can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: In a fully functional organism, an emotion has a very short life span. It is like a momentary ripple or wave on the surface of your being.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: It takes but one person, one moment, one conviction, to start a ripple of change.
quotes.author: Donna Brazile

quotes.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Men think highly of those who rise rapidly in the world; whereas nothing rises quicker than dust, straw, and feathers.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: You'll never rise any higher than the way you see yourself.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The way for a young man to rise is to improve himself in every way he can, never suspecting that anybody wishes to hinder him.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: To rise from error to truth is rare and beautiful.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We rise in glory as we sink in pride.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: We have to rise above bad fortune. We have to be in the good and enjoy the good, study and work and adventure and friendship and community and love.
quotes.author: Joshua Prager

quotes.quote: 'Rise' has a lot of different meanings. It's a call to action to rise from the dead and actually live.
quotes.author: Trip Lee

quotes.quote: No one rises to low expectations
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Rise above oneself and grasp the world.
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.quote: Rise with the hour for which you were made.
quotes.author: Georgia Douglas Johnson

quotes.quote: Rise up and be you. Your rise is your growth.
quotes.author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

quotes.quote: Rise up nimbly and go on your strange journey!
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: We rise with the lark and go to bed with the lamb.
quotes.author: Nicholas Breton

quotes.quote: Rise up and become the person you were meant to be.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
quotes.author: Mario Fernandez

quotes.quote: We cannot rise higher than our thought of ourselves.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Rise free from care before the dawn, and seek adventures.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Rise in great might to fulfill your special specific mission.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: No one rises so high as he who knows not whither he is going.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: In order to rise from its own ashes, a Phoenix first must burn.
quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

quotes.quote: We rise to great heights by a winding staircase of small steps.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: You learn to rise above a lot of bad things that happen in your life. And you have to keep going.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It's a fine thing to rise above pride, but you must have pride in order to do so.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: The rise or fall of Shanghai means the birth or death of the whole nation.
quotes.author: Chiang Kai-shek

quotes.quote: The rise of man from the animal to the human level was prolonged by the necessity of rising from a state of barbarism and violence to one of order and peace.
quotes.author: Leon Bourgeois

quotes.quote: Always rise from the table with an appetite, and you will never sit down without one.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: To succeed it is necessary to accept the world as it is and rise above it.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: You will never rise above the image you have of yourself in your own mind.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If you will not rise above the things of this world, they will rise above you.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: The greatest victory in life is to rise above the material things that we once valued most.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: We are defined by our dignity to rise above debasement. We are certainly better people for doing so.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: You ought to know how to rise above the trivialities of life, in which most people are found drowning themselves.
quotes.author: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: You've got to learn to live with what you can't rise above.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Rise above sectional interests and private ambitions... Pass from matter to spirit. Matter is diversity; spirit is light, life and unity.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who can rise above the confines of the earth.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Everyone can rise above their circumstances and achieve success if they are dedicated to and passionate about what they do.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

quotes.quote: Rise above the limited conditions of pleasure and pain, success and failure, happiness and sorrow, that all the countless unenlightened beings in creation are slaves to.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It's when ordinary people rise above the expectations and seize the opportunity that milestones truly are reached.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.quote: Man must rise above the Earth - to the top of the atmosphere and beyond - for only thus will he fully understand the world in which he lives.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It is always legitimate to wish to rise above one's self, never above others.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Rise above the deceptions and temptations of the mind. This is your duty. You are born for this only; all other duties are self-created and self-imposed owing to ignorance.
quotes.author: Sivananda Saraswati

quotes.quote: You will rise above all limitations once you begin to live life with the right attitude. People who fail and fall are the people who see difficulties in every opportunity and call it "impossibility". Rise up!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Rise above oneself and grasp the world.
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.quote: Rise above principle and do what's right.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Occasionally, a man must rise above principles.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
quotes.author: Mario Fernandez

quotes.quote: We must dare to rise above the obstacles on our path.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You yourself are your own obstacle, rise above yourself.
quotes.author: Hafez

quotes.quote: We can rise above our limitations, only once we recognize them.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: It is important to rise above rationalizations and make the best choices.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: You learn to rise above a lot of bad things that happen in your life. And you have to keep going.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: The time has come for all good men to rise above principle.
quotes.author: Huey Long

quotes.quote: No man can ever rise above that that which he aims.
quotes.author: Archibald Alexander Hodge

quotes.quote: There ain't no troubles that we can't rise above, with a handful of faith and a heartful of love.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: It's a fine thing to rise above pride, but you must have pride in order to do so.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: No man is worth his salt who is not ready at all times to risk his well-being, to risk his body, to risk his life in a great cause.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You don't concentrate on risks. You concentrate on results. No risk is too great to prevent the necessary job from getting done.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: To win without risk is to triumph without glory.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Creative risk-taking is essential to success in any goal where the stakes are high. Thoughtless risks are destructive, of course, but perhaps even more wasteful is thoughtless caution which prompts inaction and promotes failure to seize opportunity.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Risk! Risk anything! Care no more for the opinions of others, for those voices. Do the hardest thing on earth for you. Act for yourself. Face the truth.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Everyone has a 'risk muscle.' You keep it in shape by trying new things. If you don't, it atrophies. Make a point of using it at least once a day.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: The person who risks nothing does nothing, has nothing, is nothing, and becomes nothing. He may avoid suffering and sorrow, but he simply cannot learn and feel and change and grow and love and live.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: He who risks and fails can be forgiven. He who never risks and never fails is a failure in his whole being.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Yes, risk taking is inherently failure-prone. Otherwise, it would be called sure-thing-taking.
quotes.author: Jim Mcmahon

quotes.quote: People who don't take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year. People who do take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash.
quotes.author: General George Patton

quotes.quote: If you risk nothing, then you risk everything.
quotes.author: Geena Davis

quotes.quote: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: During the first period of a man's life, the danger is not to take the risk.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: I believe that one of life's greatest risks is never daring to risk.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Risk is essential. There is not growth of inspiration in staying within what is safe and comfortable. Once you find out what you do best, why not try something else.
quotes.author: Alex Noble

quotes.quote: If you don't risk anything you risk even more.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The one who does not risk anything does not gain nor lose.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: Everything is sweetened by risk.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Risk -- If one has to jump a stream and knows how wide it is, he will not jump. If he doesn't know how wide it is, he'll jump and six times out of ten he'll make it.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.quote: If we allow risk to be a fear, then we are sure not to succeed. But, if we approach risk with proper planning, and a good attitude, then most times we can minimize the risk and use it to our advantage.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: As we risk ourselves, we grow. Each new experience is a risk.
quotes.author: Fran Watson

quotes.quote: Risk is, for some people, the fear of failure. If they take no risks, they have no failure.But failure, as like risks, can be a great teacher. Don't let fear stop you from taking a risk to achieve your dreams.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: He who doesn't risk never gets to drink champagne.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: To achieve your goals you may have to take a risk. However, it is better to risk than to do nothing.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Risks are a measure of people. People who won't take them are trying to preserve what they have. People who do take them often end up having more.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You live in a grim universe. That’s risk management for you.
quotes.author: Max Gladstone

quotes.quote: Some risks that are thought to be unknown, are not unknown. With some foresight and critical thought, some risks that at first glance may seem unforeseen, can in fact be foreseen. Armed with the right set of tools, procedures, knowledge and insight, light can be shed on variables that lead to risk, allowing us to manage them.
quotes.author: Daniel Wagner

quotes.quote: Never take both hands off the pump. As an entrepreneur, you need to be on constant lookout for opportunity, and that will involve risk. But you minimize those risks by keeping one hand on the pump that is producing for you.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Behring

quotes.quote: A major lesson in risk management is that a 'receding sea' is not a lucky offer of an extra piece of free beach, but the warning sign of an upcoming tsunami.
quotes.author: Jos Berkemeijer

quotes.quote: Risk comes with the territory when you are breaking new ground. Learn how to evaluate and mitigate these risks rather than take away people’s power and autonomy.
quotes.author: Leena Patel

quotes.quote: Opportunity and risk come in pairs
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: If you don't invest in risk management, it doesn't matter what business you're in, it's a risky business.
quotes.author: Gary Cohn

quotes.quote: Keeping the risk management plan up to date can transform it from a door stop into a vital project management tool. Remember: what you don't know can kill your project.
quotes.author: Bruce Pittman

quotes.quote: Risk management is a more realistic term than safety. It implies that hazards are ever-present, that they must be identified, analyzed, evaluated and controlled or rationally accepted.
quotes.author: Jerome F. Lederer

quotes.quote: If you treat risk management as a part-time job, you might soon find yourself looking for one.
quotes.author: Deloitte white paper

quotes.quote: Risk management is a culture, not a cult. It only works if everyone lives it, not if it's practiced by a few high priests.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Here's the essence of risk management: Risk no more than you can afford to lose, and also risk enough so that a win is meaningful. If there is no such amount, don't play.
quotes.author: Ed Seykota

quotes.quote: The first step in the risk management process is to acknowledge the reality of risk. Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.author: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.quote: Not taking risks one doesn't understand is often the best form of risk management.
quotes.author: Raghuram G. Rajan

quotes.quote: Being able to be repeated controllably is one key element in risk management.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The risk management needs to lift up from risk control to risk intelligence which can identify the potential business growth opportunities
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Alignment of business strategy and risk appetite should minimize the firm's exposure to large and unexpected losses. In addition, the firm's risk management capabilities need to be commensurate with the risks it expects to take.
quotes.author: Jerome Powell

quotes.quote: The essence of risk management lies in maximizing the areas where we have some control over the outcome while minimizing the areas where we have absolutely no control over the outcome.
quotes.author: Peter L. Bernstein

quotes.quote: Managing risk is very different from managing strategy. Risk management focuses on the negative-threats and failures rather than opportunities and successes.
quotes.author: Robert S. Kaplan

quotes.quote: Risk management is about people and processes and not about models and technology.
quotes.author: Trevor Levine

quotes.quote: If everything is a matter of luck, risk management is a meaningless exercise. Invoking luck obscures truth, because it separates an event from its cause.
quotes.author: Peter Bernstein

quotes.quote: Risk management should be an enterprisewide exercise and engrained in the business culture of the organization.
quotes.author: OSFI Superintendent Julie Dickson

quotes.quote: Thoughtfully assessing and addressing enterprise risk and placing a high value on corporate transparency can protect the one thing we cannot afford to lose: trust.
quotes.author: Dale E. Jones

quotes.quote: The key to risk management is never putting yourself in a position where you cannot live to fight another day.
quotes.author: Richard S Fuld Jr

quotes.quote: Total enterprise risk management is critical, but implementing it is both expensive and easier said than done. Even the most sophisticated financial institutions are still basically silo risk managers.
quotes.author: Danny Klinefelter

quotes.quote: Risk managers and investment bankers and actually, all kinds of investors took on more risk than they expected. So there was a failure of risk management. There was a failure to recognize how much risk there was in some of these securities that people bought.
quotes.author: Robert F. Engle

quotes.quote: Anything that government and industry learn from hackers must be seen through the lens of their own risk management needs.
quotes.author: Paul Proctor

quotes.quote: Let's be honest: starting, owning and running a business is inherently risky. Creating the right systems is what helps you manage the risk. And risk management is incredibly important.
quotes.author: Tom Corson-Knowles

quotes.quote: All of life is the management of risk, not its elimination.
quotes.author: Walter Wriston

quotes.quote: Good risk management fosters vigilance in times of calm and instills disciplie in times of crisis.
quotes.author: Dr Michael Ong

quotes.quote: Exercise, prayer, and meditation are examples of calming rituals. They have been shown to induce a happier mood and provide a positive pathway through life's daily frustrations.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: In every ancient culture, there are rituals to mortify the body as a way of understanding that the energy of the soul is indestructible.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: The key to forming good habits is to make them part of your 'rituals.' I have a morning ritual, afternoon ritual, and Sunday ritual. It's one way to bundle good habits into regular times that you set aside to prepare yourself for the life you want. Rituals help you form habits.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: I learned a few years ago that balance is the key to a happy and successful life, and a huge part of achieving that balance is to instill rituals into your everyday life - a nutritious balanced diet, daily exercise, time for yourself through meditation, reading, journaling, yoga, daily reflection, and setting goals.
quotes.author: Gretchen Bleiler

quotes.quote: Ritual is able to hold the long-discarded shards of our stories and make them whole again. It has the strength and elasticity to contain what we cannot contain on our own, what we cannot face in solitude.
quotes.author: Francis Weller

quotes.quote: Ritual is the passage way of the soul into the Infinite.
quotes.author: Algernon Blackwood

quotes.quote: Ritual and ceremony in their due times kept the world under the sky and the stars in their courses. It was astonishing what ritual and ceremony could do.
quotes.author: Terry Prachett

quotes.quote: We not only nurture our sacred relationships through ritual, but we are nurtured by them as well. In ritual, we move, and we are moved.
quotes.author: Alison Leigh Lilly

quotes.quote: Ritual affirms the common patterns, the values, the shared joys, risks, sorrows, and changes that bind a community together. Ritual links together our ancestors and descendants, those who went before with those will come after us.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Any ritual is an opportunity for transformation. To do a ritual, you must be willing to be transformed in some way.The inner willingness is what makes the ritual come alive and have power.If you aren't willing to be changed by the ritual, don't do it.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: I'm in awe of the universe, but I don't necessarily believe there's an intelligence or agent behind it. I do have a passion for the visual in religious rituals, though, even though they may be completely empty and bereft of substance. The incense is powerful and provocative, whether Buddhist or Catholic.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: God doesn't want us to have rigid rituals with Him. In the new covenant, He is more interested in having a relationship with us.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.quote: The only way we'll know where we're going is to look at the past and to remember who we were through ceremonies and rituals.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: There is a comfort in rituals, and rituals provide a framework for stability when you are trying to find answers.
quotes.author: Deborah Norville

quotes.quote: Rituals, anthropologists will tell us, are about transformation. The rituals we use for marriage, baptism or inaugurating a president are as elaborate as they are because we associate the ritual with a major life passage, the crossing of a critical threshold, or in other words, with transformation. words, with transformation.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: The purpose of ritual is to wake up the old mind in us, to put it to work. The old ones inside us, the collective unconscious, the many lives, the different eternal parts, the senses and parts of the brain that have been ignored. Those parts do not speak English. They do not care about television. But they do understand candlelight and colours. They do understand nature.
quotes.author: Z. Budapest

quotes.quote: Dance is one of the most powerful forms of magical ritual... It is an outer expression of the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: Ritual may be vital to reaction, but it is also the life blood of revolution.
quotes.author: David I. Kertzer

quotes.quote: This is the prevalence of ritual. To remember something that cannot be forgotten.
quotes.author: Chris Abani

quotes.quote: There's nothing more interesting than the rituals that are cobbled together over centuries to create justification for authority, rank, all the other things that we do.
quotes.author: Bob Berky

quotes.quote: Rituals are not fixed--they are constructed and reconstructed over time, to fit people's needs.
quotes.author: Gleb Tsipurshy

quotes.quote: When we light a candle in our ritual space, we ignite a flame within ourselves. When we pour water or burn incense as offerings, we offer ourselves as well, to soak into the earth or rise in gentle wisps of smoke towards the sky.
quotes.author: Alison Leigh Lilly

quotes.quote: Stories and rituals are used in different cultures to help individuals and communities heal from trauma. I am fascinated with how our personal, familial, and community stories shape who we are. The awareness of these stories allows us to be shapers of our own lives and identities.
quotes.author: Oscar Perez

quotes.quote: Ritual is about building connections between community members, between individuals and spirits, between humans and deity.
quotes.author: Melissa Hill

quotes.quote: Ritual is to spiritual greatness what practice is to a tennis player, daily writing disciplines are to a novelist, and reading company accounts are to Warren Buffett. They are the precondition of high achievement.
quotes.author: Jonathan Saacks

quotes.quote: Ritual is, therefore, a primary site of contact between self and society, a place where our individual selves are transformed into collective selves.
quotes.author: Mark Pedelty

quotes.quote: The function of ritual, as I understand it, is to give form to human life, not in the way of a mere surface arrangement, but in depth.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Ritual consists of the external practices of spirituality that help us become more receptive and aware of the closeness of our lives to the sacred. Ritual is the act of sanctifying action - even ordinary action - so that it has meaning. I can light a candle because I need the light or because the candle represents the light I need.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: A ritual is the enactment of a myth. And, by participating in the ritual, you are participating in the myth. And since myth is a projection of the depth wisdom of the psyche, by participating in a ritual, participating in the myth, you are being, as it were, put in accord with that wisdom, which is the wisdom that is inherent within you anyhow. Your consciousness is being re-minded of the wisdom of your own life.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: 'Rituals' don't make you righteous, it's uprightness: living up to moral principles and ethical principles, and submitting to universal law established by God.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: Anybody can win unless there happens to be a second entry.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: There are two powers in the world; one is the sword and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the women.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.quote: Rivalry of scholars advances wisdom.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is a competition not with others, but with ourselves. We should seek each day to live stronger, better, truer lives; each day to master some weakness of yesterday; each day to repair a mistake; each day to surpass ourselves.
quotes.author: David B. Haight

quotes.quote: There is no overt rivalry among our children.
quotes.author: Martin Milner

quotes.quote: People will ignore their misfortunes and their interests when they are in competition with their pleasures.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: It is safer and wiser to cure unhealthy rivalry than to suppress it.
quotes.author: Obafemi Awolowo

quotes.quote: Rivalry adds so much to the charms of one's conquests.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Mothers and daughters have that rivalry thing.
quotes.author: Gretchen Wilson

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of posterity to set matters right between those antagonists who, by their rivalry for greatness, divided a whole age.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Rivalry discovers that courtesy overlooks.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The only competition you will ever face is with your own ignorance.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: The only competition worthy a wise man is with himself.
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: Sisters define their rivalry in terms of competition for the gold cup of parental love. It is never perceived as a cup which runneth over, rather a finite vessel from which the more one sister drinks, the less is left over for the others.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: Set higher standards for your own performance than anyone else around you, and your only competition will be with yourself.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: With competition everyone has to try harder.
quotes.author: Harold H Greene

quotes.quote: You're not in competition with other women. You're in competition with everyone.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: All close friendships are marked with competition. Our earliest tests are against our siblings and playmates, and some of that rivalry endures amongst friends into adulthood. Like dogs play fighting, you learn not to bite hard.
quotes.author: Christopher Bollen

quotes.quote: Rivalry causes us to overemphasize old opportunities and slavishly copy what has worked in the past.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Rivalry is the life of trade, and the death of the trader.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Rivalry doesn't help anybody.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.quote: Life is not a competition with others. In its truest sense it is a rivalry with ourselves. We should each day seek to break the record of our yesterday. We should seek each day to live stronger, better, truer lives; each day to master some weakness of yesterday; each day to repair past follies; each day to surpass...ourselves. And this is but progress.
quotes.author: William George Jordan

quotes.quote: There is a very specific, unique brand of rivalry that exists between twins. You're always wondering who the Alpha twin is.
quotes.author: Alex Hirsch

quotes.quote: Competition is the keen cutting edge of business, always shaving away at costs.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Our competition in life is solely with our old self.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: Rivalry and envy are Siamese twins.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Compete with yourself, not with others.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Insecurity is at the heart of every rivalry.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: Every one of us possesses a gene predisposing us toward rivalry, competition, and fits of envy with any past, present, or future siblings.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: It is impossible for authors to discover beauties in one another's works; they have eyes only for spots and blemishes.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The river is one of my favorite metaphors, the symbol of the great flow of Life Itself. The river begins at Source, and returns to Source, unerringly. This happens every single time, without exception. We are no different.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Anderson

quotes.quote: Just as a drop of water in the ocean cannot avail much; but if a great river runneth into it, that maketh a great commotion.
quotes.author: Jakob Bohme

quotes.quote: The river was beautiful and wise. There were the two of them being happy in a new way. For here, there was no man, no woman, no master, no yellow, no black, no white. We, we who were, we are the same no longer.
quotes.author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: The care of rivers is not a question of rivers but of the human heart.
quotes.author: Shozo Tanaka

quotes.quote: As the river surrenders itself to the ocean, what is inside me moves inside you.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: A river is more than an amenity, it is a treasure.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Rivers run through our history and folklore, and link us as a people. They nourish and refresh us and provide a home for dazzling varieties of fish and wildlife and trees and plants of every sort. We are a nation rich in rivers
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: The River... It's my world, and I don't want any other. What it hasn't got is not worth having, and what it doesn't know is not worth knowing. Lord! the times we've had together!
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: Like a river down the gutter roars the rain, the welcome rain!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A dream is like a river ever changing as it flows and a dreamer's just a vessel that must follow where it goes.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: I choose to listen to the river for a while, thinking river thoughts, before joining the night and the stars.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The river of truth is always splitting up into arms that reunite. Islanded between them, the inhabitants argue for a lifetime as to which is the mainstream.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: The river moves, but it follows a path. When it tires of one journey, it rubs through some rock to forge a new way. Hard work, but that's its nature.
quotes.author: Kekla Magoon

quotes.quote: The river of time may fork into rivers, in which case you have a parallel reality and so then you can become a time traveler and not have to worry about causing a time paradox.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: May what I do flow from me like a river, no forcing and no holding back, the way it is with children.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The flowing river nonchalantly reminds us of life: flowing relentlessly; flowing purposelessly. Life without purpose.
quotes.author: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.quote: A river or stream is a cycle of energy from sun to plants to insects to fish. It is a continuum broken only by humans.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: The old river in its broad reach rested unruffled at the decline of day, after ages of good service done to the race that peopled its banks, spread out in the tranquil dignity of a waterway leading to the uttermost ends of the earth.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Eventually, all things merge into one, and a river runs through it. The river was cut by the world's great flood and runs over rocks from the basement of time. On some of the rocks are timeless raindrops. Under the rocks are the words, and some of the words are theirs. I am haunted by waters.
quotes.author: Norman Maclean

quotes.quote: The river moves from land to water to land, in and out of organisms, reminding us what native peoples have never forgotten: that you cannot separate the land from the water, or the people from the land.
quotes.author: Lynn Culbreath Noel

quotes.quote: Rivers don't drink their own waters; trees don't eat their own fruits. The salt seasons the soup in order to have its purpose fulfilled. Live for others!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: When the river meets the sea, he dies! Because the character of the river is to flow and when the character dies, everything dies!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Time is a river sweeping away all that is born towards the darkest shore.
quotes.author: Félix J. Palma

quotes.quote: Indeed the river is a perpetual gala, and boasts each month a new ornament.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A river is water is its loveliest form; rivers have life and sound and movement and infinity of variation, rivers are veins of the earth through which the lifeblood returns to the heart.
quotes.author: Roderick Haig-Brown

quotes.quote: The only river i would like to be drown is the river filled with the blood of Jesus.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The river flows at its own sweet will, but the flood is bound in the two banks. If it were not thus bound, its freedom would be wasted.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.quote: There is a river whose streams make glad the city of Love. Along that river is the tree of heaven.
quotes.author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: Rivers flow not past, but through us; tingling, vibrating, exciting every cell and fiber in our bodies, making them sing and glide.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: A good river is nature's life work in song.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.quote: The road leading to a goal does not separate you from the destination; it is essentially a part of it.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: When you live on the road, going home is a place to escape and just be with your family to unwind.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.quote: If there is a nice road to your destination, you are lucky; if there isn't any, then you are even luckier because you will have the chance to be a road-creator!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Roads are essential to any type of agricultural development.
quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

quotes.quote: The longer the road to love, the keener is the pleasure to be experienced by the sensitive lover.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: An old road always looks richer and more beautiful than a new road because old roads have memories!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect. Men do not quarrel about the meaning of sunsets; they never dispute that the hawthorn says the best and wittiest thing about the spring.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: The road may be beautiful or ugly; it may be easy or hard, smooth or rough, it doesn't matter; what matters most is where the road will take you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I believe that all roads lead to the same place - and that is wherever all roads lead to.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: The road to success is not a path you find but a trail you blaze.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The road reaches every place, the short cut only one.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: When within yourself you find the road, the right road will open.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: If the road is beautiful, walk the road slowly; be a turtle, be a snail and even better than this: Stop walking; live the road fully!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The road before us is shorter than the road behind.
quotes.author: Lucy Stone

quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The road was new to me, as roads always are, going back.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: The road is a word, conceived elsewhere and laid across the country in the wound prepared for it: a word made concrete and thrust among us.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Hope is like a road in the country; there was never a road, but when many people walk on it, the road comes into existence.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Whatever road you've been given, enjoy that road.
quotes.author: Wayne Knight

quotes.quote: The road recedes as the traveler advances, leaving a continuous present.
quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to learning; no short cut to the acquirement of any art.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: The road is long, we carry on, try to have fun in the meantime.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: There are no wrong roads to anywhere.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: On the roads, it is one of those 'might is right' situations. If I see cars coming, I duck out of the way.
quotes.author: Dane Bird-Smith

quotes.quote: The road to success just might be your driveway.
quotes.author: Joey Reiman

quotes.quote: The middle of the road is all of the usable surface. The extremes, right and left, are in the.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: A lost road will remember your footsteps because someday you may want to return, tracing the way.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: There is no royal road; you've got to work a good deal harder than most people want to work.
quotes.author: Charles E. Wilson

quotes.quote: There are so many roads you can take that will lead you the wrong way, that nobody will hear your name.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: It is in the nature of cats to do a certain amount of unescorted roaming.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson II

quotes.quote: Without purpose, we're zombies aimlessly roaming the earth.
quotes.author: Ahmed Mostafa

quotes.quote: For always roaming with a hungry heart.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The lion does not need the whole world to fear him, only those nearest where he roams.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: It's not about roaming around the established facts, it's about exploring new logics and giving meaning to this transient life.
quotes.author: Amol Gade

quotes.quote: The judge is not the knight-errant, roaming at will in pursuit of his own ideal of beauty or of goodness.
quotes.author: Benjamin N. Cardozo

quotes.quote: Sometimes I have visions of myself driving through hell, selling sulphur and brimstone, or through heaven peddling refreshments to the roaming souls. If me and the children I've got left could find a place where there's no shooting, I wouldn't mind a few years of peace and quiet.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I felt only as a man can feel who is roaming over the prairies of the far West, well armed, and mounted on a fleet and gallant steed.
quotes.author: Buffalo Bill

quotes.quote: My restless, roaming spirit would not allow me to remain at home very long.
quotes.author: Buffalo Bill

quotes.quote: I abhor, too, the roaming lover, nor do I drink from every well; I loathe all things in common
quotes.author: Callimachus

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: I may be stupid, as you say, to believe in honour and friendship and loyalty without price. But these are virtues to be cherished, for without them we are no more than beasts roaming the land.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: Roaming through the jungle of "Ohs" and "Ahs", searching for a more agreeable noise, I live a life of primitivity with the mind of a child and an unquenchable thirst for sharps and flats.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: When love is roaming in our mind, looping in the deepest fringes of our heart, undreamt spaciousness emerges, repealing the constraints of triviality and letting stifling narrowness fade away. While our mindset is besieged by a revolving burst of emotion, our world is ultimately opening up.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: If you cannot find a good companion to walk with, walk alone, like an elephant roaming the jungle. It is better to be alone than to be with those who will hinder your progress.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: For me, country music symbolized freedom and the joys of life... roaming the country, experiencing the joys as well as the heartbreaks. It was a transporting kind of song, and I'd just kind of sing along with them.
quotes.author: George Takei

quotes.quote: Don't time travel into the past, roaming through the nuances as if they can change. Don't bookmark pages you've already read.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: I spent a good part of the nineties roaming the Earth writing about conflict. It was very grueling. I was beginning to find this way of life was, wow, addictive and deeply meaningful.
quotes.author: Janine di Giovanni

quotes.quote: Rocking on a lazy billow With roaming eyes, Cushioned on a dreamy pillow, Thou art now wise. Wake the power within thee slumbering, Trim the plot that's in thy keeping, Thou wilt bless the task when reaping Sweet labour's prize.
quotes.author: John Stuart Blackie

quotes.quote: The stars are far brighter Than gems without measure, The moon is far whiter Than silver in treasure; The fire is more shining On hearth in the gloaming Than gold won by mining, So why go a-roaming? O! Tra-la-la-lally Come back to the Valley.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: I'm not waiting for times to change I want to live like a free-roaming soul on the highway of our love.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: When I close my eyes, my imagination roams free. In the same way I want to create spaces for video art that rethink the very nature of the medium itself. I want to discover new ways of configuring the world, both the world outside and the world within.
quotes.author: Pipilotti Rist

quotes.quote: For me, childhood roaming was what developed self-reliance, a sense of direction and adventure, imagination, a will to explore, to be able to get a little lost and then figure out the way back.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: But fear - panic - knows no reason. It brings into being overnight the things that it fears. It is the greatest torment of humanity. Fear is, in short, the devil. It causes most of the sin, disaster, disease and misery of the world. It is the ravening lion roaming the earth seeking whom it may...devour. The only refuge is in the knowledge that it has no power other than the power you give it.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If all of her was not enough for him, then let him have none of her and seek what he needed elsewhere.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Roaming is the easiest part, just wandering around, looking the places, imagining how people lived there at that time, breathing deeply the open air around there and feeling the best.
quotes.author: Shaikh Ashraf

quotes.quote: Desire should be allowed to roam freely. The range is endless.
quotes.author: Sameh Elsayed

quotes.quote: Feelings of longing seemed to burst from her heart; they ran in all directions, like streams of blood, seeking out paths to all the places in the wide landscape where she had lived, to all her sons roaming through the world, to all her dead lying under the earth.
quotes.author: Sigrid Undset

quotes.quote: We're fascinated with robots because they are reflections of ourselves.
quotes.author: Ken Goldberg

quotes.quote: If robots are to clean our homes, they'll have to do it better than a person.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: Robots will someday, or maybe, wake up. They may be really smart. They may be as creative, smart and capable as human beings, and fully conscious, and self discerning with free will.
quotes.author: David Hanson

quotes.quote: Robots are interesting because they exist as a real technology that you can really study - you can get a degree in robotics - and they also have all this pop-culture real estate that they take up in people's minds.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Wilson

quotes.quote: Robots will harvest, cook, and serve our food. They will work in our factories, drive our cars, and walk our dogs. Like it or not, the age of work is coming to an end.
quotes.author: Gray Scott

quotes.quote: If the computer-guided robots turn out to be our superiors in every respect, then will they not find that they can run the world better without the need of us at all? Humanity itself will then have become obsolete.
quotes.author: Roger Penrose

quotes.quote: Unfortunately robots capable of manufacturing robots do not exist. That would be the philosopher's stone, the squaring of the circle.
quotes.author: Ernst Jünger

quotes.quote: We can make robots that learn from mistakes, yet man still makes the same ones over, and over.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: To make robots practical, flaws must be removed. To make robots endearing, flaws must be added.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Sometimes a technology is so awe-inspiring that the imagination runs away with it - often far, far away from reality. Robots are like that. A lot of big and ultimately unfulfilled promises were made in robotics early on, based on preliminary successes.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Wilson

quotes.quote: Robots are the new middle class. And everyone else will either be an entrepreneur or a temp staffer.
quotes.author: James Altucher
