quotes.quote: Robots touch something deeply human within us. For me, robots are all about people.
quotes.author: Cynthia Breazeal

quotes.quote: Anything humans can do in space, robots can do better.
quotes.author: Trevor Paglen

quotes.quote: We're seeing the arrival of conversational robots that can walk in our world. It's a golden age of invention.
quotes.author: David Hanson

quotes.quote: No one asks a robot what he wants.
quotes.author: Tanith Lee

quotes.quote: Old robots are becoming more human and young humans are becoming more like robots.
quotes.author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quotes.quote: If you look at the field of robotics today, you can say robots have been in the deepest oceans, they've been to Mars, you know? They've been all these places, but they're just now starting to come into your living room. Your living room is the final frontier for robots.
quotes.author: Cynthia Breazeal

quotes.quote: Character robotics could plant the seed for robots that actually have empathy. So, if they achieve human level intelligence or, quite possibly, greater than human levels of intelligence, this could be the seeds of hope for our future.
quotes.author: David Hanson

quotes.quote: When the robot mind is mastered, undisciplined thinking ceases and is replaced by awareness. Awareness can know love.
quotes.author: Barry Long

quotes.quote: ... you just can't differentiate between a robot and the very best of humans.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Knowing how to keep someone motivated and how to keep a connection are skills humans have learned and evolved over hundreds of thousands of years. A robot can't figure out whether you can do one more push-up, or how to motivate you to actually do it.
quotes.author: Erik Brynjolfsson

quotes.quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Civilization began the first time an angry person cast a word instead of a rock.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Man is harder than rock and more fragile than an egg.
quotes.author: Yugoslav Proverb

quotes.quote: Laws are sand, customs are rock. Laws can be evaded and punishment escaped, but an openly transgressed custom brings sure punishment.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A rock pile ceases to be a rock pile the moment a single man contemplates it, bearing within him the image of a cathedral.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: A man of great memory without learning hath a rock and a spindle and no staff to spin.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The ship that will not obey the helm will have to obey the rocks.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Resolve will melt no rocks. But it can scale them.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A great rock is not disturbed by the wind; the mind of a wise man is not disturbed by either honor or abuse.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: All history shows that the hand that cradles the rock has ruled the world, not the hand that rocks the cradle!
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: Don't look for an unshakable rock to stand on; there ain't any! Rather, learn how to stand still on a shaking rock!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Very little grows on jagged rock. Be ground. Be crumbled, so wildflowers will come up where you are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Our way is not soft grass, it's a mountain path with lots of rocks. But it goes upwards, forward, toward the sun.
quotes.author: Ruth Westheimer

quotes.quote: No rock so hard but that a little wave may beat admission in a thousand years.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Be like a headland of rock on which the waves break incessantly; but it stands fast and around it the seething of the waters sink to rest.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There will always be rocks in the road ahead of us. They will be stumbling blocks or stepping stones; it all depends on how you use them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Stand through life firm as a rock in the sea, undisturbed and unmoved by its ever-rising waves.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Love is not enough. But, it is the rock on which all else stands.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Shooting stars are not stars at all. They re just rocks that enter the atmosphere and catch fire under friction. What we wish on when we see one is only a trail of debris.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: If we have the courage and tenacity of our forebears, who stood firmly like a rock against the lash of slavery, we shall find a way to do for our day what they did for theirs.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: How difficult it is to save the bark of reputation from the rocks of ignorance.
quotes.author: Francesco Petrarch

quotes.quote: The cradle rocks above an abyss, and common sense tells us that our existence is but a brief crack of light between two eternities of darkness.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Rhyme is the rock on which thou art to wreck.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Just because the boat rocks doesn't mean it's time to jump overboard.
quotes.author: Suzanne Woods Fisher

quotes.quote: Look! Don't be deceived by appearances - men and things are not what they seem. All who are not on the rock are in the sea!
quotes.author: William Booth

quotes.quote: Not to have control over the senses is like sailing in a rudderless ship, bound to break to pieces on coming in contact with the very first rock.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Rock is a great master of life. It teaches us this simple philosophy: Stay firm!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll is inclusive. It welcomes rockers of all races, religions, ages, ethnic backgrounds, alternative lifestyles.
quotes.author: Maury Dean

quotes.quote: Rock and roll music, if you like it, if you feel it, you can't help but move to it. That's what happens to me. I can't help it.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a style in which, at least ostensibly, the best artists are rule breakers.
quotes.author: Steve Waksman

quotes.quote: Some people come to our shows and think they're gonna spend the night just listening to love songs, and they're pretty much surprised cause we do a lot of rock and roll.
quotes.author: Bobby Hatfield

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll is simply an attitude. You don't have to play the greatest guitar.
quotes.author: Johnny Thunders

quotes.quote: Most of modern rock and roll is a product of guilt.
quotes.author: Captain Beefheart

quotes.quote: Rock and roll ain't nothing but jazz with a hard backbeat.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: Energy is so important. If you don't have it, don't bother with rock and roll.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: You can't have rock and roll without drugs, you can't have rock and roll without sex.
quotes.author: Rick James

quotes.quote: Rock n Roll might not solve your problems, but it does let you dance all over them.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is the hamburger that ate the world.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is here to stay.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: If it's illegal to rock and roll, throw my ass in jail!
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: For me rock and roll is about the freedom to express yourself very loudly.
quotes.author: Bob Gruen

quotes.quote: Rock and roll doesn't necessarily mean a band. It doesn't mean a singer, and it doesn't mean a lyric, really. It's that question of trying to be immortal.
quotes.author: Malcolm McLaren

quotes.quote: Rock music should be gross: that's the fun of it. It gets up and drops its trousers.
quotes.author: Bruce Dickinson

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll has no beginning and no end for it is the very pulse of life itself.
quotes.author: Larry Williams

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no one is allowed to be magnificent.
quotes.author: Kim Fowley

quotes.quote: If I hadn't heard rock and roll on the radio, I would have had no idea there was life on this planet.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Rock and roll keeps you in a constant state of juvenile delinquency.
quotes.author: Eddie Spaghetti

quotes.quote: If you tried to give rock and roll another name, you might call it Chuck Berry.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Hail, hail, rock n' roll / Deliver me from the days of the old.
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: He never learned to read or write so well / But he could play the guitar just like ringing a bell.
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: But what can a poor boy do / Except to sing for a rock and roll band? / Cause in sleepy London town / There's just no place for Street fighting man
quotes.author: Keith Richards and Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: I hate people asking me what I mean in my songs, cause it's none of their business. I also hate being asked, 'How do I feel being a woman in rock?'
quotes.author: Sinead O'Connor

quotes.quote: Thank God I didn't invent anything as banal as punk rock. It was basically something between high-school prom and pub-rock.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.quote: Rock music is at the stage where it has become part of the establishment. How can you be a rebel, when rebellion is the norm? Therefore rock n' roll has lost its power as a revolutionary force. I think bands who call themselves revolutionary are playing at it. They're having no effect whatsoever.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: I'm not just a tortured, frustrated person who has to pour all of these things out of his soul. None of that is a prerequisite to being good at rock n' roll.
quotes.author: Dave Gilmour

quotes.quote: Rock n' roll is instant coffee.
quotes.author: Bob Geldof

quotes.quote: Rock n' roll is the music that inspired me to play music. There is nothing conceptually better than rock and roll. No group, be it The Beatles, Dylan, or the Stones have ever improved on Whole Lotta Shakin' for my money.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: I find that rock climbing is the finest, most healthiest sport in the whole world. It is much healthier than most. Look at baseball, where 10 000 sit on their ass to watch a handful of player.
quotes.author: John Salathe

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.
quotes.author: Greg Child

quotes.quote: Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory.
quotes.author: Ed Viesturs

quotes.quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: In climbing you are always faced with new problems in which you must perform using intuitive movements, and then later analyze them to figure out why they work, and then learn from them.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Gullich

quotes.quote: Nobody climbs mountains for scientific reasons. Science is used to raise money for the expeditions, but you really climb for the hell of it.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Climbing is one of the few sports in which the arena. The cliffs, the mountains and their specific routes acquires a notoriety that out populates, outshines and outlives the actual athletes.
quotes.author: Jonathan Waterman

quotes.quote: Sometimes, that mountain you've been climbing, is just a grain of sand.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Climbing is not a battle with the elements, nor against the law of gravity. It's a battle against oneself.
quotes.author: Walter Bonatti

quotes.quote: Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air and behold the view. Climb it so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
quotes.author: David McCullough Jr.

quotes.quote: Climbing is unadulterated hard labor. The only real pleasure is the satisfaction of going where no man has been before and where few can follow.
quotes.author: Annie Smith Peck

quotes.quote: When you go to the mountains, you see them and you admire them. In a sense, they give you a challenge, and you try to express that challenge by climbing them.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Climbing is an artistic, creative thing; it's about being spontaneous, traveling, seeing the world, hanging out. It's a balance of setting goals while enjoying the process, being ambitious without being too competitive.
quotes.author: Chris Sharma

quotes.quote: Climbing is, above all, a matter of integrity.
quotes.author: Gaston Rebuffat

quotes.quote: In rock climbing, people get strong enough, and then they pick goals they can do with their strengths at that moment.
quotes.author: Tommy Caldwell

quotes.quote: The rope connecting two men on a mountain is more than nylon protection; it is an organic thing that transmits subtle messages of intent and disposition from man to man; it is an extension of the tactile senses, a psychological bond, a wire along which currents of communication flow.
quotes.author: Trevanian

quotes.quote: Climb if you will, but remember that courage and strength are nought without prudence, and that a momentary negligence may destroy the happiness of a lifetime. Do nothing in haste; look well to each step; and from the beginning think what may be the end.
quotes.author: Edward Whymper

quotes.quote: Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.
quotes.author: Barry Finlay

quotes.quote: With climbing you can go to the most beautiful places on the planet and practice. Anywhere there is rock, you can climb.
quotes.author: Chris Sharma

quotes.quote: Jumping from boulder to boulder and never falling, with a heavy pack, is easier than it sounds; you just can't fall when you get into the rhythm of the dance.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.author: Chris Sharma

quotes.quote: Mountains are not fair or unfair, they are just dangerous.
quotes.author: Reinhold Messner

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no-one is allowed to be magnificent.
quotes.author: Kim Fowley

quotes.quote: Rock'n'roll will never go away completely because it's so fundamentally attractive.
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is here to stay.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Rock n' roll is poison put to sound.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: The great thing about rock-n-roll is you realize the top of the mountain is big enough for more than one band.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.quote: Rock & roll is like a painting. Can great paintings still be done? It depends on who holds the brush.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: I have Rock 'n' Roll pumping through my veins.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: If you think you are too old to rock 'n roll, then you are.
quotes.author: Lemmy Kilmister

quotes.quote: Rock and roll doesn't necessarily mean a band. It doesn't mean a singer, and it doesn't mean a lyric, really. It's that question of trying to be immortal.
quotes.author: Malcolm McLaren

quotes.quote: Rock'n'roll starts between the legs and goes through the heart, then to the head. As long as it does those three things, it's a great rock song.
quotes.author: John Mellencamp

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll has no beginning and no end for it is the very pulse of life itself.
quotes.author: Larry Williams

quotes.quote: Rock and roll has probably given more than it's taken.
quotes.author: Charlie Watts

quotes.quote: Rock 'n' Roll might not solve your problems, but it does let you dance all over them.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: Rock n roll stops the traffic.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Life is a disease. The only cure is rock 'n' roll.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's always gonna be rock n' roll bands, there's always gonna be kids that love rock n' roll records, and there will always be rock n' roll.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is the music of America, of youth, of rebellion, and of the common spirit that ties all that together.
quotes.author: Tom Larson

quotes.quote: You can't kill Rock 'n' Roll. It's here to stay
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: God gives us the ability, but rock 'n' roll was created by men.
quotes.author: Little Richard

quotes.quote: What would rock and roll be without ambition, craziness, danger, and fun?
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.quote: You're not a rock 'n' roll person four hours a day or even when you're on stage. It's become the rhythm of your whole life.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is the hamburger that ate the world.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.quote: Rock 'n' roll is like a circus today.
quotes.author: Ray Manzarek

quotes.quote: The reason kids like rock 'n roll is their parents don't.
quotes.author: Mitch Miller

quotes.quote: Rock 'n' roll never sleeps it just passes out.
quotes.author: George Thorogood

quotes.quote: Rock is rock, and, rock and roll, rock is just short for rock and roll.
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: Rock 'n' roll will never die. There'll always be some arrogant little brat who wants to make music with a guitar.
quotes.author: Dave Edmunds

quotes.quote: You know, your clothes may say disco, but your eyes say rock n roll.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Andrews

quotes.quote: If Music is a Place -- then Jazz is the City, Folk is the Wilderness, Rock is the Road, Classical is a Temple.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Girls have got balls. They're just a little higher up, that's all.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: Okay baby, let's take this rocket to Uranus. This hoor is perfect, and she can act as well.
quotes.author: Irvine Welsh

quotes.quote: If there’s a zeppelin, it’s alternate history. If there’s a rocketship, it’s science fiction. If there are swords and/or horses, it’s fantasy. A book with swords and horses in it can be turned into science fiction by adding a rocketship to the mix. If a book has a rocketship in it, the only thing that can turn it back into fantasy is the Holy Grail.
quotes.author: Debra Doyle

quotes.quote: The rocket was beautiful. In conception it had been shaped by an artist to break a chain that had bound the human race ever since we first gained consciousness of earth's gravity and all it's analogs in suffering, failure and pain. It was at once a prayer sent heavenward and the answer to that prayer: Bear me away from this awful place.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: It [the rocket] will free man from his remaining chains, the chains of gravity which still tie him to this planet. It will open to him the gates of heaven.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: You were gone up as a rocket, bending your passages from right to left and from left to right. In the flat projection of a spiral.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: A lustrous rocket, rising out of space. Behold the signal of the foe,' cried one.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: While the silver streamed aircraft swished like a rocket through space, but resonated like a dying man nose-dived towards the earth; as streaks of turbulent lightning struck it unexpectedly.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Then soared the sudden rocket, broke in blanching showers.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Watching on tiptoe and with stifled roar to see a rocket fired or a bull slain.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: By day the dipping house-flag and by night the rocket's trail. As the sheep that graze behind us so we know them where they hail.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Oh no no no I'm a rocket man. Rocketman burning out his fuse up here alone.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: I'm gonna be high I'm a rocket man.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Take me in your arms and rocket me. Come with me. All across the universe, we will sail for the skies. Meet behind Mars.
quotes.author: Cheryl Lynn

quotes.quote: Rocket, rocket, the skins like the sun like the red colored one that they call my. Rocket, rocket, that some ancient tune that invented the moon and the stars.
quotes.author: Primitive Radio Gods

quotes.quote: You took me riding in your rocket gave me a star.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: Coming through. Levels shifting get swift on analog sounds pounds of rocket tars.
quotes.author: Kool Keith

quotes.quote: Team Rocket blast off at the speed of light. Surrender now or prepare to fight.
quotes.author: Pokemon

quotes.quote: Rocket boy when are you gonna land? I said go, don't stop it, go, don't stop it.
quotes.author: Liz Phair

quotes.quote: Take a rocket ride. From the start you wanted to fly. I got the rocket and you want the ride.
quotes.author: Kiss

quotes.quote: A rocket is an experiment; a star is an observation.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: A rocket is a reed that thinks brilliantly.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: We will never be an advanced civilization as long as rain showers can delay the launching of a space rocket.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: If the rocket will free man from his remaining chains, the chains of gravity which still tie him to this planet. It will open to him the gates of heaven.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: When you launch in a rocket, you're not really flying that rocket. You're just sort of hanging on.
quotes.author: Michael P. Anderson

quotes.quote: A rocket won't fly unless somebody lights the fuse!
quotes.author: Homer Hickam

quotes.quote: The rocket worked perfectly except for landing on the wrong planet.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Rocket science is tough, and rockets have a way of failing.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: From the moment of using rocket devices; a great new era will begin in astronomy: the epoch of the more intensive study of the firmament
quotes.author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

quotes.quote: Rocket science has been mythologized all out of proportion to its true difficulty.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Being a 'rockstar' is about celebrity, not about music , which is why you're supposed to be doing this in the first place. Being a rockstar shouldn't be considered a career option...if you don't love to play music- and you're not doing it purely for that reason- then quit.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.quote: We're not arrogant, we just believe we're the best band in the world.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: To suddenly become known by a lot of people because I waggled my arse at somebody isn't brilliant , is it? I'd rather be known for something better than that. Although my arse-wiggling is second-to-none, I'd rather people remembered me for what I create.
quotes.author: Jarvis Coc

quotes.quote: Oh sure. I dug the fame, the power, the money, and playing to big crowds. Conquering America was the best thing.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: I don't think people mind if I'm conceited. Every rock 'n roll star in the world is conceited.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: I've got fifty-six gold singles, and fourteen gold albums and if anyone out there doubts it, if you ever come through Memphis you can come argue about it, 'cause I've got every one of them hanging on the wall.'
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: The traditional rock star role is that you don't say anything. The best way to maintain your conceit is to keep your mouth shut and I'm certainly not prepared to do that. I couldn't.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: I believe that every band had their ten minutes of glory. But I like to think that we've left enough options open to give us twenty minutes.
quotes.author: Suggs

quotes.quote: I'm just the same as ever-loud, electrifying and full of personal magnetism.
quotes.author: Little Richard

quotes.quote: A rockstar is someone with a hole in his heart almost the size of his ego.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: I'm a rocker— I don't want to work. I want to goof off.
quotes.author: Chrissie Hynde

quotes.quote: Mild barbarians is how we were once described. And I can't really deny it.
quotes.author: Jimmy Paige

quotes.quote: Hey, you're a rockstar baby / Up in the buildin' makin' the club go crazy / Hey, you're a rockstar baby / Thowin' ass like that you must be a rock star baby.
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: She's got a body like a rock star / Look at her put on a show (show me girl) / She's got a body like a rock star / You can put her on a stage and let it go (oh, yeah).
quotes.author: Eddie Galan

quotes.quote: Sleep with rockstars...Support the arts.
quotes.author: Bill Kaulitz

quotes.quote: Being a rock star is like being a cult leader you really have to be in your own religion.
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.quote: A rock star does not age!
quotes.author: Anthony Kiedis

quotes.quote: Being a rockstar is the intersection of who you are and who you want to be.
quotes.author: Slash

quotes.quote: If you act like a rock star, you will be treated like one.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: You can't buy being a rock star.
quotes.author: Travis Scott

quotes.quote: There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva.
quotes.author: Josh Groban

quotes.quote: If you're listening to a rock star in order to get your information on who to vote for, you're a bigger moron than they are.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: The rock star is dying. And it's a small tragedy. Rock stars have blogs now. I have no use for that kind of rock star.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: If I were a rock star, I'd design my own clothes. I'd do it because that's the mark of a true rock star.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.quote: Rock stars did not invent burning out. They just do it louder.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: When I am at rodeo I find it difficult not to root for the animals.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Look at me move I'm the king of the rodeo. Everybody, welcome to the rodeo, everybody, welcome to the rodeo.
quotes.author: Rick Springfield

quotes.quote: Rodeo is about life lessons, and not just about belt buckles and winning. There is so much you can learn from a horse and a cow that you can't learn from football.
quotes.author: Jim Wakefield

quotes.quote: Rodeo be like up and down. 'Bout to show you how I throw down.
quotes.author: The Isley Brothers

quotes.quote: Riding the rodeo. He's a rodeo rider, sole survivor. Got to prove that he's the best.
quotes.author: Gene Clark

quotes.quote: Like a rodeo round and round and up and down we go. Some days it's a battle just to stay up in the saddle.
quotes.author: Paul Overstreet

quotes.quote: Rodeo ain't no ordinary life but a cowboy ain't no ordinary man.
quotes.author: Tracy Byrd

quotes.quote: Life's a rodeo and all you have to do is stay in the saddle.
quotes.author: George Jung

quotes.quote: With horses, familiarity breeds comfort. If you haven't been around horses for a while (or ever), the best thing to do is to go to the racetrack, a horse show, a rodeo, or some other horsey activity, and watch the horses. Familiarize yourself with the way they move and behave themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think life is just a rodeo, the trick is to ride and make it to the bell.
quotes.author: John Fogerty

quotes.quote: It's the ropes and the reins, and the joy and the pain. And they call the thing rodeo.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Rodeo careers can end without warning, as quick as the next try at an eight-second ride.
quotes.author: John Branch

quotes.quote: A good old rodeo never hurt anyone.
quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

quotes.quote: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: Everyone in society should be a role model, not only for their own self-respect, but for respect from others.
quotes.author: Barry Bonds

quotes.quote: I think a role model is a mentor - someone you see on a daily basis, and you learn from them.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: I know that being seen as a role model means taking responsibility for all my actions. I am human, and of course, sometimes I make mistakes. But I promise that when I fall, I get back up.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: I'm not paid to be a role model, parents should be role models.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: Children have never been very good at listening to their elders, but they have never failed to imitate them.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: A father has to be a provider, a teacher, a role model, but most importantly, a distant authority figure who can never be pleased. Otherwise, how will children ever understand the concept of God?
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Find someone who has a life that you want and figure out how they got it. Read books, pick your role models wisely. Find out what they did and do it.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Being a role model is the most powerful form of educating...too often fathers neglect it because they get so caught up in making a living they forget to make a life.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Role models are only of limited use. For no-one is as important, potentially powerful and as key in your life and world as you.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Role modeling is the most basic responsibility of parents. Parents are handing life's scripts to their children, scripts that in all likelihood will be acted out for the rest of the children's lives.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Setting an example is not the main means of influencing others; it is the only means.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Leaders are more powerful role models when they learn than when they teach.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kantor

quotes.quote: Example is leadership.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Whether or not you have children yourself, you are a parent tothe next generation. If we can only stop thinking of children asindividual property and think of them as the next generation,then we can realize we all have a role to play.
quotes.author: Charlotte Davis-Kasl

quotes.quote: You are in charge of your feelings, beliefs, and actions. And you teach others how to behave toward you. While you cannot change other people, you can influence them through your own behaviors and actions. By being a living role model of what you want to receive from others, you create more of what you want in your life.
quotes.author: Eric Allenbaugh

quotes.quote: The best way to teach children restraint and generosity is to be a model of those qualities yourself.
quotes.author: Lawrence Balter

quotes.quote: You've got to be careful whom you pattern yourself after because you're likely to become just like them.
quotes.author: Rich Mayo

quotes.quote: Imagine for yourself a character, a model personality, whose example you determine to follow, in private as well as in public.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Being is the great explainer.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Act that your principle of action might safely be made a law for the whole world.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: We do not imitate, but are a model to others.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: As a parent, you will often serve as an inadvertent example to your child. A child will model himself after you in many areas: how you deal with frustration, settle disagreements and cope with not being able to have the things that you want, to name just three.
quotes.author: Lawrence Balter

quotes.quote: When things turn out pretty much as expected, parents give little thought to how much they have influenced the outcome. When thing s don't turn out as expected, parents give a great deal of thought to the role they play.
quotes.author: Arlene Harder

quotes.quote: One of the most important things we adults can do for young children is to model the kind of person we would like them to be.
quotes.author: Carol B. Hillman

quotes.quote: Family is the first school for young children, and parents are powerful models.
quotes.author: Alice Sterling Honig

quotes.quote: There must be a profound recognition that parents are the first teachers and that education begins before formal schooling and is deeply rooted in the values, traditions, and norms of family and culture.
quotes.author: Sara Lawrence Lightfoot

quotes.quote: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: I’m on a roller coaster that only goes up, my friend.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Starting anything is a roller coaster with the highest highs and lowest lows.
quotes.author: Jack Dorsey

quotes.quote: Once you know where the roller coaster is going, are you in for the ride?
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: God put us here, on this carnival ride. We close our eyes never knowing where it'll take us next.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Stay in your seat come times of trouble. Its only people who jump off the roller coaster who get hurt.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: It's kinda like being on a roller coaster. If you don't get on the ride, you won't experience the adventure.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: There cannot be ups in a roller coaster ride unless there are downs.
quotes.author: Siddharth Katragadda

quotes.quote: Life is like a roller coaster. You can either scream every time there is a bump or you can throw your hands up and enjoy the ride
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With peaks of joy and valleys of heartache, life is a roller coaster ride that's both scary and exciting at the same time the rise and fall of which defines our journey.
quotes.author: SebastiAn

quotes.quote: My life has been a roller coaster ride, but somehow I've always been able to land on my feet and still play the guitar.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.quote: Many traders ride an emotional roller coaster and miss the essential element of winning the management of their emotions.
quotes.author: Alexander Elder

quotes.quote: Just close your eyes and enjoy the roller coaster that is life.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: Roller coasters are like math you can ride.
quotes.author: Seanan McGuire

quotes.quote: You know the Romans were fond of bloodshed. North Africa was one of many places where the Roman Empire had its arenas. It was their amphitheatre which, with the passage of time, had enlarged with the vanishing of many rocks. But, thank God, man has changed and, after six hundred years, that bloody sport has ended.
quotes.author: Waheed Ibne Musa

quotes.quote: Such was the unhappy condition of the Roman emperors, that, whatever might be their conduct, their fate was commonly the same. A life of pleasure or virtue, of severity or mildness, of indolence or glory, alike lead to an untimely grave; and almost every reign is closed by the same disgusting repetition of treason and murder.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The Roman Empire was very, very much like us. They lost their moral core, their sense of values in terms of who they were. And after all of those things converged together, they just went right down the tubes very quickly.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: This agglomeration which was called and which still calls itself the Holy Roman Empire was neither holy, nor Roman, nor an empire.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: We like to imagine Roman civilization falling to sweaty barbarians storming the gates of the city and slaughtering the citizens while they took refuge in the temples of the gods, but it didn't happen like that. The Roman people, in the end, simply decided that they would rather have food than freedom.
quotes.author: Philip Freeman

quotes.quote: We find that the Romans owed the conquest of the world to no other cause than continual military training, exact observance of discipline in their camps, and unwearied cultivation of the other arts of war.
quotes.author: Vegetius or Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus

quotes.quote: It was luxuries like air conditioning that brought down the Roman Empire. With air conditioning their windows were shut, they couldn't hear the barbarians coming.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: In Italy, on the breaking up of the Roman Empire, society might be said to be resolved into its original elements, - into hostile atoms, whose only movement was that of mutual repulsion.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: The world survived the fall of the Roman empire and will no doubt outlast our own so much more splendid civilisation.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: It is no coincidence that, on all four sides, in all four corners, the borders of the Roman Empire stopped where wine could no longer be made.
quotes.author: Neel Burton

quotes.quote: Rome – the city of visible history, where the past of a whole hemisphere seems moving in funeral procession with strange ancestral images and trophies gathered from afar.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The descendants of Holy Roman Empire monarchies became feeble-minded in the twentieth century, and after World War I had been done in by the democracies; some were kept on to entertain the tourists, like the one they have in England.
quotes.author: Ishmael Reed

quotes.quote: The true key to the declension of the Roman empire which is not to be found in all Gibbon's immense work may be stated in two words: the imperial character overlaying, and finally destroying, the national character. Rome under Trajan was an empire without a nation.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Like other systems in decay, the Roman Empire continued to function for several generations after its vitality was sapped. For nearly a hundred years our Island was one of the scenes of conflict between a dying civilisation and lusty, famishing barbarism.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The union of the Roman empire was dissolved; its genius was humbled in the dust; and armies of unknown barbarians, issuing from the frozen regions of the North, had established their victorious reign over the fairest provinces of Europe and Africa.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The two Antonines (for it is of them that we are now speaking) governed the Roman world forty-two years, with the same invariable spirit of wisdom and virtue. ... Their united reigns are possibly the only period of history in which the happiness of a great people was the sole object of government.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The Romans, who so coolly and so concisely mention the acts of justice which were exercised by the legions, reserve their compassion and their eloquence for their own sufferings, when the provinces were invaded and desolated by the arms of the successful Barbarians.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: An economy built on slave labor is vulnerable in two ways. One, availability of forced labor discourages technical innovation. The very wealthy [Roman]empire experienced no industrial revolutions. Two -- even more crucial -- slaves do not reproduce their own numbers. As Rome's wars of conquest ended, the slave population began to shrink, leading to a shortage of agricultural laborers by 200 A.D.
quotes.author: Norman F. Cantor

quotes.quote: [Roman] society became steadily more cosmopolitan. By 212 A.D., all inhabitants of the empire, except for slaves, were deemed to be citizens. The old Roman aristocracy was not fixated upon race and color. Wealth and literacy were what opened the doors of their urban mansions and country villas.
quotes.author: Norman F. Cantor

quotes.quote: The Roman Empire was fairly tolerant of religious choice as long as you made a point not of thumbing your nose in public at the Roman Gods.
quotes.author: Susan Jacoby

quotes.quote: The various modes of worship which prevailed in the Roman world were all considered by the people as equally true; by the philosopher as equally false; and by the magistrate as equally useful.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: A citizen of the Roman Empire, for example, would have placed less value on individual liberty in the modern Western sense than on collective responsibility.
quotes.author: Stephen Baxter

quotes.quote: If you look at great human civilizations, from the Roman Empire to the Soviet Union, you will see that most do not fail simply due to external threats but because of internal weakness, corruption, or a failure to manifest the values and ideals they espouse.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: As we all know from the Roman empire, big empires go down if the borders are not well-protected.
quotes.author: Mark Rutte

quotes.quote: The Church was spread throughout the entire Roman Empire before a single book of the New Testament was written.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Such is life in the Roman Empire, which has begun its slow decline into ruin. There is little justice or nobility among.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: If you look at any institution in history - look at the Roman Empire - anything in history, and what it looks like when it's peaking. Look at Apple, and how can you say it's not peaking? ... The thing is, it may take another year or two before it starts to decline, but it has to - everything does.
quotes.author: Trip Hawkins

quotes.quote: Beginning under the Roman Empire, intellectual leadership in the West had been provided by Christianity. In the middle ages, who invented the first universities - in Paris, Oxford, Cambridge? The church.
quotes.author: Nancy Pearcey

quotes.quote: The old Romans all wished to have a king over them because they had not yet tasted the sweetness of freedom.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: We were all Romans once, I guess.
quotes.author: Omar Epps

quotes.quote: When in Rome, live as the Romans do; when elsewhere, live as they live elsewhere.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: I think with the Romans, that the general of today should be a soldier tomorrow if necessary.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The Romans had power, the Greeks had imagination.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Latin is a dead tongue And Romans made songs! Then no one disagree: It delighted them in theory Now it's "the Latin" in me.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: The pardoned soul is out of the gunshot of hell.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: I knew it was bad, but I didn't care.
quotes.author: Abbi Glines

quotes.quote: Never mind what Julius Caesar said... not going and not seeing is the best way not to get conquered!
quotes.author: René Goscinny

quotes.quote: It’s not wheel science… just aim and fire.
quotes.author: Evelyn Winters

quotes.quote: If you have overcome your inclination and not been overcome by it, you have reason to rejoice.
quotes.author: Titus Maccius Plautus

quotes.quote: I’m never less at leisure than when at leisure, or less alone than when alone.
quotes.author: Scipio Africanus

quotes.quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
quotes.author: Marcus Tulius Cicero

quotes.quote: Advice in old age is foolish; for what can be more absurd than to increase our provisions for the road the nearer we approach to our journey’s end.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Those most moved to tears by every word of a preacher are generally weak and a rascal when the feelings evaporate.
quotes.author: Gaius

quotes.quote: An angry man is again angry with himself when he returns to reason.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Fear is proof of a degenerate mind.
quotes.author: Publius

quotes.quote: A shoe that is too large is apt to trip one, and when too small, to pinch the feet. So it is with those whose fortune does not suit them.
quotes.author: Quintus

quotes.quote: The lofty pine is oftenest shaken by the winds; High towers fall with a heavier crash; And the lightning strikes the highest mountain.
quotes.author: Quintus

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning’s end.
quotes.author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as pure pleasure; some anxiety always goes with it.
quotes.author: Publius Ovidius Naso

quotes.quote: Say not always what you know, but always know what you say.
quotes.author: Tiberius

quotes.quote: The first and greatest punishment of the sinner is the conscience of sin.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Hope is the pillar that holds up the world. Hope is the dream of a waking man.
quotes.author: Gaius Plinius Secundus

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happy is he who can trace effects to their causes.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: A word once uttered can never be recalled.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: She’s my desire, oh, my desire!/ More glorious than the bright sun’s fire; / Who were than wild-blown ice more cold / Were I so bold as to sit by her.
quotes.author: Douglas Hyde

quotes.quote: Romantic love is a factor in the determination of selfhood, particularly in the young individuals. It is in romantic love that adolescents and young adult first feel themselves to be liberated and strong.
quotes.author: Renata Grossi

quotes.quote: Proving us wrong all along / Shouldn't we be holding on / It's a silly thing really / That you shouldn't believe in / Nothing too complicated / Endlessly formulated / Foolish romantic ideals of love.
quotes.author: Matthew Herbert

quotes.quote: I made my song a coat/ Covered with embroideries/ Out of old mythologies/ From heel to throat.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without and find that breath is of little consequence.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: The very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Your hand touching mine. This is how galaxies collide.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: I crossed a thousand leagues to come to you, and lost the best part of me along the way. Don't tell me to leave.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: And he took her in his arms and kissed her under the sunlit sky, and he cared not that they stood high upon the walls in the sight of many.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Pulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you love a flower, don’t pick it up. Because if you pick it up, it dies and it ceases to be what you love. So if you love a flower, let it be. Love is not about possession. It is about appreciation.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Oh, the days dwindle down, to a precious few. And these two precious days, I'll spend with you.
quotes.author: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.quote: Breathless, we flung us on the windy hill. Laughed in the sun and kissed the lovely grass.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: Sure there is music even in the beauty, and the silent note which Cupid strikes, far sweeter than the sound of an instrument. For there is a music wherever there is harmony, order, or proportion; and thus far we may maintain the music of the spheres.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: When you're in love / You don't know much about it / Not in your mind / Romantic love / Rots the brain / No doubt about it / You're out of your mind / You're out of your mind.
quotes.author: Charles Stobo Reid

quotes.quote: Romantic love emerges only when women begin to have more of a choice about their lives--and about their lovers and husbands in particular.
quotes.author: Renata Grossi

quotes.quote: I feel wonderful because I see / The love light in your eyes./And the wonder of it all / Is that you just don’t realize how much I love you.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: Once upo a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The word 'romance,' according to the dictionary, means excitement, adventure, and something extremely real. Romance should last a lifetime.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one. It's a drug. It distorts reality, and that's the point of it. It would be impossible to fall in love with someone that you really saw.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: The more I see you, the more I want you. Somehow this feeling just grows and grows. With every sigh, I become more mad about you.
quotes.author: Michael Buble

quotes.quote: You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I can be the one you've always dreamed of / Our helpless hearts beating in time / We'll be romantics in love / Cuz I can give you a love that songs are made of / We could create the perfect rhyme / We'll be romantics in love / We'll be romantics in love.
quotes.author: Sam Sheryll

quotes.quote: All of our days we long for a chance / To be lost in a trance of a love we share / A romantic love like no other before / All of our days we live on the run / But we try to believe that it's just begun / That we'll have the time to enjoy every day.
quotes.author: Harry Langheld

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The more we are filled with thoughts of lust the less we find true romantic love.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: I never loved you any more than I do, right this second. And I'll never love you any less than I do, right this second.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: Romanticism is not just a mode; it literally eats into every life. Women will never get rid of just waiting for the right man.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: The essence of romantic love is that wonderful beginning, after which sadness and impossibility may become the rule.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: If there is moonlight outside, don't stay inside! If there is candle inside, don't stay outside! Moments of romanticism are too valuable to be missed!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Classicism is health, romanticism is disease.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Romanticism is beauty without bounds-the beautiful infinite.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Nothing spoils romance so much as a sense of humor in the woman.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Worrisome. It's romanticism, and it's dangerous to have children and students on the street.
quotes.author: Viktor Yanukovych

quotes.quote: It's all romanticism, nonsense, rottenness, art.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.quote: Romanticism has never been properly judged. Who was there to judge it? The critics!
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.quote: Romanticism implies nostalgia for damaged goods.
quotes.author: Brad Mehldau

quotes.quote: Boredom is simply romanticism with a morning-after thirst.
quotes.author: Samuel Hopkins Adams

quotes.quote: Romanticism was more than merely an alternative to a sterile classicism; romanticism made possible, especially in art, a great expansion of the human consciousness.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Romanticism is precisely situated neither in choice of subject, nor exact truth, but in the way of feeling.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: In Romanticism, the main determinant is the mood, the atmosphere. And in that regard, you could also describe Schubert as a Romantic.
quotes.author: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau

quotes.quote: At the heart of all romanticism is suffering.
quotes.author: Brin-Jonathan Butler

quotes.quote: Romanticism is a cultural tool of male power to keep women from knowing their conditions.
quotes.author: Shulamith Firestone

quotes.quote: Only the really young are fearless, have the optimism, the romanticism to take unimaginable risks.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: To say the word Romanticism is to say modern art - that is, intimacy, spirituality, color, aspiration towards the infinite, expressed by every means available to the arts.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Romanticism is the abuse of adjectives.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: Romanticism is the mother of kitsch and that there are moments when the child becomes so like its mother that one cannot differentiate between them.
quotes.author: Hermann Broch

quotes.quote: He must have a truly romantic nature, for he weeps when there is nothing at all to weep about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: For me, Romanticism is the most recent and the most current expression of beauty.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: Romanticism is precisely situated neither in choice of subject, nor exact truth, but in the way of feeling.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: You begin saving the world by saving one man at a time all else is grandiose romanticism or politics.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: I am no bird and no net ensnares me I am a free human being with an independent will.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: Love is the emblem of eternity it confounds all notion of time effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end.
quotes.author: CORINNE Anne Louise Germaine de Staël

quotes.quote: Satire is people as they are romanticism, people as they would like to be realism, people as they seem with their insides left out.
quotes.author: Dawn Powell

quotes.quote: Whatever souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: It's not much. You begin by thinking there is something extraordinary about it. But you'll find out, when you've been out in the world a while longer, unhappiness is the commonest thing there is.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: Rome is not like any other city. It’s a big museum, a living room that shall be crossed on one’s toes.
quotes.author: Alberto Sordi

quotes.quote: Rome was a poem pressed into service as a city.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: She had always been fond of history, and in Rome was history in the stones of the street and the atoms of the sunshine.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: A fool is one who admires other cities without visiting Rome.
quotes.author: Francesco Petrarca

quotes.quote: How is it possible to say an unkind or irreverential word of Rome? The city of all time, and of all the world.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Rome - the city of visible history, where the past of a whole hemisphere seems moving in funeral procession with strange ancestral images and trophies gathered from afar.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A great city, whose image dwells in the memory of man, is the type of some great idea. Rome represents conquest; Faith hovers over the towers of Jerusalem; and Athens embodies the pre-eminent quality of the antique world, Art.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Rome will exist as long as the Coliseum does; when the Coliseum falls, so will Rome; when Rome falls, so will the world.
quotes.author: Venerable Bede

quotes.quote: Rome is one enormous mausoleum. There, the Past lies visibly stretched upon his bier. There is no today or tomorrow in Rome; it is perpetual yesterday.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: Rome seems a comfort to those with the ambitious soul of an Artist or a Conqueror.
quotes.author: Pietros Maneos

quotes.quote: In Rome one had simply to sit still and feel.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Find Cupid everywhere in Rome because we'd clipped one of his wings and he was forced to fly in circles.
quotes.author: André Aciman

quotes.quote: Italy has changed. But Rome is Rome.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning.
quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

quotes.quote: When in Rome, live as the Romans do; when elsewhere, live as they live elsewhere.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: Rome has not seen a modern building in more than half a century. It is a city frozen in time.
quotes.author: Richard Meier

quotes.quote: Rome has grown since its humble beginnings that it is now overwhelmed by its own greatness.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: Every one soon or late comes round by Rome.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: When thou art at Rome, do as they do at Rome.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: In Rome it seems as if there were so many things which are more wanted in the world than pictures.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: New Rome will be destroyed. By the attacks of new vandals. God always remains silent.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Tiny drops of experiences collated from the roof of our journeys in life becomes the ocean upon which we sail to greatness .
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: Roof of your house is not your real roof; the walls of your house are not your real walls, your fists are not your real fists! Your real roof, your real wall, your real fist, your real shield is your right thinking! It is your right thinking that protects you from every danger!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A tin roof is one of the greatest indicators of prosperity in the developing world.
quotes.author: Chelsea Clinton

quotes.quote: The roof might fall in; anything could happen.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.quote: Don't complain about the snow on your neighbor's roof when your own doorstep is unclean.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You can forget about placing another tile on the roof of your country house.
quotes.author: Monique Gadaud

quotes.quote: A house without a roof would scarcely be a more different home, than a family unsheltered by God's friendship, and the sense of being always rested in His providential care and guidance.
quotes.author: Horace Bushnell

quotes.quote: The best time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
quotes.author: Brad D. Smith

quotes.quote: There is no sound more peaceful than rain on the roof, if you're safe asleep in someone else's house.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: God can be realized through all paths. All religions are true. The important thing is to reach the roof. You can reach it by stone stairs or by wooden stairs or by bamboo steps or by a rope. You can also climb up by a bamboo pole.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Haughtiness lives under the same roof with solitude.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The shelter of excuses has a leaky roof.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Nothing's more determined than a cat on a hot tin roof.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Under every roof, a story, just as behind every brow, a history.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: No known roof is as beautiful as the skies above.
quotes.author: Micheal O Muircheartaigh

quotes.quote: May you always have walls for the winds, a roof for the rain, tea beside the fire, laughter to cheer you, those you love near you and all your heart might desire.
quotes.author: Irish Blessings

quotes.quote: He measured then the gate from the roof of one little chamber to the roof of another: the breadth was five and twenty cubits, door against door.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Learn to love the sunrise and sunset, the beating of rain on the roof and windows, and the gentle fall of snow on a winter day.
quotes.author: Lowell L. Bennion

quotes.quote: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof; it is temporary expedient, often wise in party politics, almost sure to be unwise in statesmanship.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: When you are caught in the heavy rains of anger, open the umbrella of mind, take refuge under the roof of reason!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Rain does not fall on one roof alone
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Thatch your roof before rainy weather; dig your well before you become parched with thirst.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: It's really kind of cool to have solar panels on your roof.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The sky's the limit if you have a roof over your head.
quotes.author: Sol Hurok

quotes.quote: Whether we have a leak or roof that needs to be replaced, we can always count on Premier Roofing Services to get the job done the right way.
quotes.author: Matt Keough

quotes.quote: Spring rain leaking through the roof dripping from the wasps' nest.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Going to the roof of the Empire State Building is pretty amazing for kids.
quotes.author: Adam Scott

quotes.quote: It is the sea that whitens the roof. The sea drifts through the winter air. It is the sea that the north wind makes. The sea is in the falling snow.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: In the same way that rain breaks into a house with a bad roof, desire breaks into the mind that has not been practising meditation.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It's in the apartment somewhere.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: In case you’re not familiar with the roommate honeymoon, it’s the initial time period of unconditional love when roommates can do no wrong. A roommate could talk on the phone all night, have sex on another roommate’s bed, borrow clothing, fart, burp, download porn, drink, smoke, and party in the room with random people, and most new roommates will say nothing — at least to their roommate. Instead, they will complain to friends, family, and even strangers. They will send texts, write email, and launch a 'Why My Roommate Sucks' Facebook group. But tell the roommate? Forget it.
quotes.author: Harlan Cohen

quotes.quote: Don’t judge your roommate until you live together for a couple months. Then judge your roommate and invite your roommate to judge you. When judging, it’s sometimes more fun to actually dress up like a judge. Then your roommate knows that it’s judgment time.
quotes.author: Harlan Cohen

quotes.quote: When finding yourself living with a naked roommate, ALWAYS take the top bunk, put towels on the furniture, and request that there is no eating in the nude (for your health and his or her safety — cheese pizza can be hot and dangerous). If you are the naked roommate, then be kind and courteous while naked.
quotes.author: Harlan Cohen

quotes.quote: Noisy, nasty, and naughty roommates make for great stories. First you have to live through it. The funny part starts about three to five years later (depending on the level of the nasty factor).
quotes.author: Harlan Cohen

quotes.quote: Chances are that your roommate’s partying will only be a temporary problem — that is, until he or she fails out, passes out, or forgets where he or she lives.
quotes.author: Harlan Cohen

quotes.quote: If you are having a problem with a roommate who takes a nap at 10 p.m. and then studies until dawn, and you did not indicate on your preference form that you are an early riser, even though there was a check box for that, well, Houston, we have a problem.
quotes.author: Linda Fiore

quotes.quote: For most of us. roommate life begins at eighteen. We head off to college bright-eyed and bushy-tailed. Dorm living situations are almost always out of our control. Throughout the rest college and early adult life, roommates are a hodgepodge strangers, best buds, and friends of friends of cousins’ friends.
quotes.author: Becky Murphy Simpson

quotes.quote: Just like snowflakes, no two roommates are alike.
quotes.author: Becky Murphy Simpson

quotes.quote: Sometimes you get flatmates that are super nice and friendly as a person, but as flatmates they suck. Or you have a ghost as a flatmate, you don't see him, or hear her, but you know they exist, because there are dirty dishes in the sink in the mornings.
quotes.author: J.A. Suuriniemi

quotes.quote: In essence, a roommate is someone who will become part of your new family. The last thing you want is to come home to drama all the time or to a chaotic, messy kitchen when you just want to put up your feel and chill.
quotes.author: Michele Hall; Kathrin Lake

quotes.quote: As they say, all good things must come to an end. Dare I say, once I started living with a roommate in a college dorm, the good things crashed and burned.
quotes.author: Melanie Falconer

quotes.quote: Over the course of my twenty-seven-year-old life, I’ve had about twenty roommates. Some — including my current one — have become my closest friends, who know more about me than anyone else; others have faded into the deep recesses of my memory, only to be dug up while browsing yearbooks and Facebook. And then there are the select few who are remembered by their eccentric habits as opposed to their names, like my camp roommate who stepped inside a wardrobe and closed the doors behind her every time she wanted to change.
quotes.author: Stephanie Wu

quotes.quote: If your roommate never leaves the room, buy him a ticket to an all-day concert, a movie, or a sporting event. Do not ask your roommate if he wants to go; just purchase the ticket — the farther away the event, the better.
quotes.author: David Borgenicht; Jennifer Woricht

quotes.quote: Granted, you may end up with a roommate who brags about their action figure collection 24/7 or someone who shouldn’t have been allowed to leave their parents’ house without a shock collar. We've had both. But even when we’ve had bad roommates, we’ve managed to live together without hurting each other, and in the end, our credit ratings weren’t damaged too badly.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: You might not know whether your future roommate likes to clean, prefers to drink milk straight from the jug, or has personal hygiene issues, but if you or someone you know can vouch for their character, then the odds of your living with a raving lunatic drop dramatically.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: Depending on your income level and the size of the place you live in, you may calculate that you need another roommate or two. The upside is that the amount of rent you pay goes down. The downside is that so does your quality of life.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: Basic Rule: Roommates who make more money than you will eat better than you. Roommates who make less money than you will eat worse than you.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: Not only does your dorm room come with a bed and a desk, but also in all likelihood with a real live person. Unfortunately, much to your chagrin, this real live person won't be as willing to serve you as your coffee table or towel rack.
quotes.author: Traci Maynigo

quotes.quote: I am fine with roommates plopping down on my bed. They could camp out there for weeks, like an eco-terrorist hippie, for all I care. I do not. however, want them all up in my desk. That is where my deep, dark secrets are hidden, and it is off limits.
quotes.author: Kathryn Williams

quotes.quote: Since moving to New York City more than seven years ago, I have spent a considerable amount of time venting about living with roommates — the everyday problems, the precarious circumstances, and the seemingly endless crazy behavior. I found that my girlfriends and 1 could sit around for hours talking about our living situations, mainly because these conversations were cathartic for us — spontaneous therapy sessions that taught us we weren't the only ones dealing with a roommate who shamelessly stole our socks on a weekly basis or flirted just a little too much with our boyfriends.
quotes.author: Amy Zalneraitis

quotes.quote: Two things should almost always be kept out of close relationships: sleeping with a roommate’s ex and sleeping with a roommate’s current boyfriend. There are a few reasons for this, chief among them being that even if your roommate discarded her last boyfriend like a sack of garbage, you have no idea how she really feels about him, or what’s going on between them still. Maybe he’s just using you to get back at her . . . This kind of stuff can get ugly quickly, and the best way to solve the problem is to avoid it entirely.
quotes.author: Amy Zalneraitis

quotes.quote: To get my roomie to clean up his side every once in a while, I’d tell him my mother, professor, or someone else of importance would be stopping by while he was in class.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Podlasiak

quotes.quote:
Marriage advice fit for roommates:
-Ask questions before offering advice.
-Strive to give more than you receive.
-Don't try to change them.
-Let go of the small stuff.
-Disagreement is not always bad.
-Do not attempt house projects without Willie Nelson and a bowl of guac (says my friend Jenny and she's right).
-Stay chill.
quotes.author: Becky Murphy Simpson

quotes.quote: Satan was my roommate, so junior year was hell / He lacked social skills and had a pungent smell / When your roommate is the devil it can be extremely whacked / Putting posters on the wall of Trapt and Nickelback
quotes.author: Andrew R. Nielsen; Christopher E. Rojas; MC Chris

quotes.quote: I live like a freshman / I still have a roommate / I even moved to Brooklyn / I still need a roommate
quotes.author: Eaton Sobule

quotes.quote: I think my roommate / Didn't clean his hair / Oh man, oh man hot damn / It's everywhere
quotes.author: Wigs

quotes.quote: All my roommates have their boyfriends over & I'm just laying here . . . cuddling with my teddy bear . . . it's fine though.
quotes.author: Bree Olson via Twitter

quotes.quote: Roommate has date coming by later and asked me to clean [because] he's not home. So I made a Princess D shrine in his room.
quotes.author: Deno DeMartino via Twitter

quotes.quote: I still think there should be a Grammy category for 'Best to Play 438 Times in a Row as a Declaration of War on a Roommate'
quotes.author: Aparna Nancherla via Twitter

quotes.quote: We learn the rope of life by untying its knots.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: Whatever happens, do not lose hold of the two main ropes of life - hope and faith.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Weave me a rope that will pull me through these impossible times.
quotes.author: Tim Finn

quotes.quote: The rope that pulls you from the flood can become a noose around your neck.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: There are two sides of the Velvet Rope. Those who want to be on the other side and those who are on the other side.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: The end of the rope stops in the palm of God.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: As a piece of rope, when burnt, retains its form, but cannot serve to bind, so is the ego which is burnt by the fire of supreme Knowledge.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: ROPE, n. An obsolescent appliance for reminding assassins that they too are mortal. It is put about the neck and remains in place one's whole life long.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If you're at the end of your rope . . . untie the knot in your heart.
quotes.author: Cooper Edens

quotes.quote: What a rope of sand we are without a leader ...
quotes.author: Marjorie Bowen

quotes.quote: The cord breaketh at last by the weakest pull.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: No cord or cable can draw so forcibly, or bind so fast, as love can do with a single thread.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: The higher the rope, the more thrilling it is to climb.
quotes.author: Michelle Gibson

quotes.quote: You cannot put a rope around the neck of an idea: you can not put an idea up against a barracks-square wall and riddle it with bullets: you cannot confine it in the strongest prison cell that your slaves could ever build.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

quotes.quote: If you don't break your ropes while you're alive, do you think ghosts will do it after?
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: We cannot swing up a rope which is attached only to our own belt.
quotes.author: William Ernest Hocking

quotes.quote: Without a rope there is no fear beacuse to fall is unthinkable.
quotes.author: Catherine Destivelle

quotes.quote: The rope by which the great blocks of taxes are attached to any citizenry is simple loyalty.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: When you're at the end of your rope, all you have to do is make one foot move out in front of the other. Just take the next step. That's all there is to it
quotes.author: Samuel Fuller

quotes.quote: Spinnin' a rope is fun if your neck ain't in it
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Sometimes the rope seems the only option when at the bottom of the pit. Climb it to safety.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: If you are in a deep dark well with no rope to climb, hold on to the hope, because it is also a strong rope!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you wish to convert anyone to the fullness of the knowledge of Our Lord and of His Mystical Body, then teach him the Rosary. One of two things will happen. Either he will stop saying the Rosary — or he will get the gift of faith.
quotes.author: Venerable Archbishop Fulton Sheen

quotes.quote: Never will anyone who says his Rosary every day be led astray. This is a statement that I would gladly sign with my blood.
quotes.author: St. Louis De Montfort

quotes.quote: No one can live continually in sin and continue to say the Rosary: either they will give up sin or they will give up the Rosary
quotes.author: Bishop Hugh Doyle

quotes.quote: Give me an army saying the Rosary and I will conquer the world.
quotes.author: Pope Bl.Pius IX

quotes.quote: To recite the Rosary is nothing other than to contemplate the face of Christ with Mary.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: I thought that I had no time for faith nor time to pray, then I saw an armless man saying his Rosary with his feet.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The Rosary is the book of the blind, where souls see and there enact the greatest drama of love the world has ever known; it is the book of the simple, which initiates them into mysteries and knowledge more satisfying than the education of other men.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: In times of darkness, holding the Rosary is like holding your Blessed Mother’s hand. Pray the Rosary every day. Abandon yourself in the hands of Mary. She will take care of you.
quotes.author: Padre Pio

quotes.quote: The rosary should be said with faith–for our Blessed Lord said, 'Believe that you shall receive; and they shall come unto you'.
quotes.author: St. Louis De Montfort

quotes.quote: If there were one million families praying the Rosary every day, the entire world would be saved.
quotes.author: Pope St. Pius X

quotes.quote: When the Holy Rosary is said well, it gives Jesus and Mary more glory and is more meritorious than any other prayer.
quotes.author: Louis de Montfort

quotes.quote: Among all the devotions approved by the Church none has been so favored by so many miracles as the devotion of the Most Holy Rosary
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: If you say the Holy Rosary every day, with a spirit of faith and love, our Lady will make sure she leads you very far along her Son's path.
quotes.author: Josemaria Escriva

quotes.quote: How guilt refined the methods of self-torture, threading the beads of detail into an eternal loop, a rosary to be fingered for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: This is a prayer, inchoate and unfinished, for you, my love, my loss, my lesion, a rosary of words to count out time's illusions, all the minutes, hours, days the calendar compounds as if the past existed somewhere like an inheritance still waiting to be claimed.
quotes.author: Dana Gioia

quotes.quote: One night I looked down and my rosary beads were glowing. And I realized that I did not want to see the blessed Virgin - I was terrified.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: Never will anyone who says his Rosary every day become a formal heretic or be led astray by the devil.
quotes.author: Saint Louis de Montfort

quotes.quote: The Rosary is a school for learning true Christian perfection.
quotes.author: Pope Saint John XXIII

quotes.quote: It has always been remarked that those who wear the outward look of reprobation, like impious heretics and proud worldlings, hate or despise the Hail Mary or the Rosary.
