Heretics still learn and say the Our Father, but not the Hail Mary, nor the Rosary. That is their horror. They would rather wear a serpent than a rosary.
quotes.author: St. Louis De Montfort

quotes.quote: If you persevere in reciting the Rosary, this will be a most probable sign of your eternal salvation.
quotes.author: Blessed Alan de la Roche

quotes.quote: The past is always with us, in the form of our photographs, which we feel as we might a rosary, wearing them smooth with the fingering of our eyes.
quotes.author: A.D.Coleman

quotes.quote: Religion is only in the service of the people; it is not in the rosary and the prayer-carpet.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: A rose's rarest essence lives in the thorn.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A thorn defends the rose, harming only those who would steal the blossom.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The red rose whispers of passion,And the white rose breathes of love;O, the red rose is a falcon,And the white rose is a dove.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.quote: It is the time you have spent on your rose that makes her so important.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: But he that dares not grasp the thorn. Should never crave the rose.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: If I had a rose for every time I thought of you, I'd be picking roses for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: The rose is a rose from the time it is a seed to the time it dies. Within it, at all times, it contains its whole potential. It seems to be constantly in the process of change: Yet at each state, at each moment, it is perfectly all right as it is.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A rose to the living is more than sumptuous wreaths to the dead.
quotes.author: Nixon Waterman

quotes.quote: O Rose thou art sick / The invisible worm, That flies in the night / In the howling storm: Has found out thy bed / Of crimson joy: And his dark secret love / Does thy life destroy
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: We are like roses that have never bothered to bloom when we should have bloomed and it is as if the sun has become disgusted with waiting.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: But the rose leaves herself upon the brier,For winds to kiss and grateful bees to feed.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: None of this matters to the rose keepers of Elizabeth. / From the backyards of row houses / they bring forth pink roses, yellow roses/and around a house on its own green plot, a hedge of roses, in red and white.
quotes.author: Kathleen Noris

quotes.quote: A single flow’r he sent me, since we met./ All tenderly his messenger he chose; / Deep-hearted, pure, with scented dew still wet — One perfect rose.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: If the rose puzzled its mind over the question how it grew, it would not have been the miracle that it is.
quotes.author: J. B. Yeats

quotes.quote: Here’s a blush rose, with raspberry scent. / Here’s a pink, come taste the edge. / And here, my dear, upon the stair, / is simply the hip of a white-blue rose / I’ve carried up to bed.
quotes.author: L.L. Barkat

quotes.quote: I should own up that for me, growing roses is all about creating a cheap supply of fabulous, favorite blooms. I’m no Martha Stewart; I just love cutting flowers and bringing them into the house where I can focus on their beauty.
quotes.author: Jane Eastoe

quotes.quote: Have you heard the story of the rose / That blooms in the night? / Without the sun’s presence / She grew from her own light / She did not yearn for / His warmth on her petals / For she knew she held the power / To radiate light from within / Though she had strong thorns / Her heart was always open / For those with an open heart / Can never be broken.
quotes.author: Allie Michelle

quotes.quote: She drips herself with water, and her shoulders / Glisten as silver, they crumple up / Like wet and falling roses, and I listen / For the sluicing of their rain-dishevelled petals. / In the window full of sunlight / Concentrates her golden shadow / Fold on fold, until it glows as/ Mellow as the glory roses.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Take time to smell the roses.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Roses fall, but the thorns remain.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not watch the petals fall from the rose with sadness, know that, like life, things sometimes must fade, before they can bloom again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The rose is a flower of love. The world has acclaimed it for centuries. Pink roses are for love hopeful and expectant. White roses are for love dead or forsaken, but the red roses, ah the red roses are for love triumphant.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A rose must remain with the sun and the rain or its lovely promise won't come true.
quotes.author: Ray Evans

quotes.quote: One rose is enough for the dawn.
quotes.author: Edmond Jabes

quotes.quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Gather the rose of love whilst yet is time.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses we must plant more trees.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Truths and roses have thorns about them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You can complain because roses have thorns, or you can rejoice because thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Ziggy

quotes.quote: The Rose is without an explanation; She blooms, because She blooms.
quotes.author: Angelus Silesius

quotes.quote: There's a divinity which shapes our ends, rough hew them how we will.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Truth has rough flavours if we bite it through.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The rough must always accompany the smooth. Without one or the other one learns nothing about oneself.
quotes.author: Solange nicole

quotes.quote: If love be rough with you, be rough with love. Prick love for pricking and you beat love down.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We sleep safe in our beds because rough men stand ready in the night to visit violence on those who would do us harm.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A test of what is real is that it is hard and rough. Joys are found in it, not pleasure. What is pleasant belongs to dreams.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Life is rough. If it were smooth, we'd slide right through it without noticing. A bumpy ride teaches us gratitude and perspective.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: As no roads are so rough as those that have just been mended, so no sinners are so intolerant as those that have just turned saints.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Ever notice the word 'rough' in through? There is truth to that, though the way may be rough, we are still able to get through it.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Rough work, iconoclasm, but the only way to get at truth.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond; and must be polished, or the lustre of it will never appear.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: There is nothing so agonizing to the fine skin of vanity as the application of a rough truth.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Invest in the human soul. Who knows, it might be a diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: Rough spots sharpen our performance. And more often than not, obstacles can be turned into advantages. You just can't let your disappointment get in the way.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Virtue rejects facility to be her companion. She requires a craggy, rough and thorny way.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Life is a rough biography. Memories smooth out the edges.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: God has pitted you against a rough antagonist that you may be a conqueror, and this cannot be without toil.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The scenes of our life are like pictures done in rough mosaic. Looked at close, they produce no effect. There is nothing beautiful to be found in them, unless you stand some distance off.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Get used to a rough life, for luxury does not last forever.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: Rough diamonds may sometimes be mistaken for worthless pebbles.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Anyone can be confident with a full head of hair. But a confident bald man - there's your diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: Sure God created man before woman. But then you always make a rough draft before the final masterpiece.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's rough to go through life with your contents looking as if they settled during shipping.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Many a man gets weary of clamping down on his rough impulses, which if given occasional release would encourage the living of life with salt in it, in place of dust.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Human nature is pretty well balanced; for every lacking virtue there is a rough substitute that will serve at a pinch--as cunning is the wisdom of the unwise, and ferocity the courage of the coward.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Singing is a rough business. Every vocal performance involves hundreds of thousands of micro-collisions in the throat.
quotes.author: Usama Rasheed

quotes.quote: Before I got out of the rough-in-one tournament it had turned into a shopping center.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Every time I look down, I think I'm in the rough.
quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

quotes.quote: You know you're in for a challenge when the rough comes up over your shoes.
quotes.author: Ernie Els

quotes.quote: Celebrate life in all its glory - challenge yourself to let the routine sing, and the new dance.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: As long as habit and routine dictate the pattern of living, new dimensions of the soul will not emerge.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.quote: The less routine the more life.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine; it is lethal.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Habit and routine have an unbelievable power to waste and destroy.
quotes.author: Henri de Lubac

quotes.quote: A man practices the art of adventure when he breaks the chain of routine.
quotes.author: John W. Peterson

quotes.quote: Your future is found in your daily routine. Successful people do daily what others do occasionally!
quotes.author: Paula White

quotes.quote: The big things that come our way are the fruit of seeds planted in the daily routine of our work.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: There is a distinction between a relationship which has a routine and a relationship which becomes routine
quotes.author: Johnny Rich

quotes.quote: Don't mistake routine for commitment, just showing up is not enough.
quotes.author: Tommy Amaker

quotes.quote: The final result of too much routine is death in life.
quotes.author: Gertrude Atherton

quotes.quote: Running through things because you are familiar with them, breeds routine and this is the seed of boredom.
quotes.author: James Galway

quotes.quote: Men fall into a routine when they are tired and slack: it has all the appearance of activity with few of its burdens.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: With every adversity comes a blessing because a shock acts as a reminder to oneself that we must not get stale in routine.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Great cultural changes begin in affectation and end in routine.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Routine is not organization, any more than paralysis is order.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Habit is the beneficent harness of routine which enables silly men to live respectfully and unhappy men to live calmly
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: All of us, from time to time, need a plunge into freedom and novelty, after which routine and discipline will seem delightful by contrast
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Men of routine or men who can do what they are told are not hard to find; but men who can think and plan and tell the routine men what to do are very rare.
quotes.author: William Graham Sumner

quotes.quote: So much of our time is spent in preparation, so much in routine, and so much in retrospect, that the amount of each person's genius is confined to a very few hours.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Routine is a ground to stand on, a wall to retreat to; we cannot draw on our boots without bracing ourselves against it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Long term success is a direct result of what you achieve everyday. Goals provide your daily routine
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: A child reminds us that playtime is an essential part of our daily routine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is the leisured, I have noticed, who rebel the most at an interruption of routine.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: Out of routine comes inspiration. That's the idea, anyway. To grasp what's exceptional, you first have to know what's routine.
quotes.author: Michael Kimmelman

quotes.quote: How easily the routine of sin establishes itself.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.quote: Most people are so constituted that they can only be virtuous in a certain routine; an irregular course of life demoralizes them.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Yesterday's adaptations are today's routines.
quotes.author: Ronald A. Heifetz

quotes.quote: In the past, people were born royal. Nowadays, royalty comes from what you do.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: There's nothing so kingly as kindness, and nothing so royal as truth.
quotes.author: Alice Cary

quotes.quote: Being born into the Royal Family is like being born into a mental asylum. Marrying into it is not something to be taken lightly.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: There are no galley-slaves in the royal vessel of divine love - every man works his oar voluntarily!
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: Be Royal in your on own fashion. Act like a King to be treated.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Poems, like dreams, are a sort of royal road to the unconcious. They tell you what your secret self cannot express.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The institution of royalty in any form is an insult to the human race.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To the royal guards of this realm, we are all victims in-waiting.
quotes.author: Cheshire Cat

quotes.quote: Royal blood isn't blue, it is a jaundiced shade of red and riddled with broken chromosomes.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: All kings and queens are not born of royal bloodlines. Some become royal because of what they do once they realize who they are.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: What we need is a royal army of returned missionaries reenlisted into service.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The royal road to a man's heart is to talk to him about the things he treasures most.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to a successful life, as there is no royal road to learning. It has got to be hard knocks, morning, noon, and night, and fixity of purpose.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to geometry.
quotes.author: Euclid

quotes.quote: Historically, royal families have represented an institution. The institution is built on heritage, and is timeless in that sense.
quotes.author: Frederik, Crown Prince of Denmark

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to learning; no short cut to the acquirement of any art.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: There is no royal road; you've got to work a good deal harder than most people want to work.
quotes.author: Charles E. Wilson

quotes.quote: For a sailor used to travelling light and looking after himself, many aspects of life as a royal came as an unpleasant shock to Prince Philip.
quotes.author: Ingrid Seward

quotes.quote: There is only one royal road for the spiritual journey ... Love.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Dreams are the royal road to the unconcious.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Winning the Royal Rumble is as big an accomplishment as anything.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: The Royal Crown cures not the headache.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: And now run the race which is set before thee, in the royal way of universal love.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Rugby is a good occasion for keeping thirty bullies far from the center of the city.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The advantage law is the best law in rugby, because it lets you ignore all the others for the good of the game.
quotes.author: Derek Robinson

quotes.quote: If the game is run properly as a professional game, you do not need 57 old farts running rugby.
quotes.author: Will Carling

quotes.quote: Rugby players are either piano shifters or piano movers. Fortunately, I am one of those who can play a tune.
quotes.author: Pierre Danos

quotes.quote: The pub is as much a part of rugby as is the playing field.
quotes.author: John Dickenson

quotes.quote: Rugby is not like tea, which is good only in England, with English water and English milk. On the contrary, rugby would be better, frankly, if it were made in a Twickenham pot and warmed up in a Pyrenean cauldron.
quotes.author: Dennis LaLanne

quotes.quote: The whole point of rugby is that it is, first and foremost, a state of mind, a spirit.
quotes.author: Jean-Pierre Rives

quotes.quote: Rugby League is a war without the frills.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Rugby is a game for big buggers. if you're not a big bugger, you get hurt. I wasn't a big bugger but i was a fast bugger and therefore I avoided the big buggers.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Rugby is great. The players don't wear helmets or padding; they just beat the living daylights out of each other and then go for a beer. I love that.
quotes.author: Joe Theismann

quotes.quote: If there is no blood on the line, it is not rugby league.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: Good big blokes are better than good little blokes. Then again, good little blokes are better than dud big blokes. And dud big blokes should play something other than Rugby.
quotes.author: Bob Dwyer

quotes.quote: Anyone who does not watch rugby league is not a real person.
quotes.author: John Singleton

quotes.quote: There's ego in all of us rugby players.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: Ballroom dancing is a contact sport. Rugby is a collision sport.
quotes.author: Heyneke Meyer

quotes.quote: The scrum and the tackle are the two really contentious areas of the game. If you get those two aspects right, most rugby matches will work in your favour.
quotes.author: Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: Rugby is a wonderful show: dance, opera and, suddenly, the blood of a killing.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: Rugby is a beastly game played by gentlemen; soccer is a gentleman's game played by beasts; football is a beastly game played by beasts.
quotes.author: Henry Blaha

quotes.quote: Rugby is a hooligans game played by gentlemen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Beer and Rugby are more or less synonymous.
quotes.author: Chris Laidlaw

quotes.quote: Rugby may have many problems, but the gravest is undoubtedly that of the persistence of summer.
quotes.author: Chris Laidlaw

quotes.quote: Rugby is a game for barbarians played by gentlemen. Football is a game for gentlemen played by barbarians.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Nobody in Rugby should be called a genius. A genius is a guy like Norman Einstein.
quotes.author: Jono Gibbs

quotes.quote: The French are predictably unpredictable.
quotes.author: Andrew Mehrtens

quotes.quote: After an All Blacks surprise loss to the French in the 1999 Rugby World Cup. The French are predictably unpredictable.
quotes.author: Andrew Mehrtens.

quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don’t play together, the club won’t be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: I've seen a lot people like him, but they weren't playing on the wing.
quotes.author: Colin Meads

quotes.quote: I told him, Son, what is it with you? Is it ignorance or apathy?' He said, Coach, I don't know and I don't care.
quotes.author: Frank Layden

quotes.quote: Rugby is a hooligans game played by gentlemen.
quotes.author: FWinston Churchill

quotes.quote: I thought I would have a quiet pint and about 17 noisy ones.
quotes.author: Gareth Chilcott

quotes.quote: No man was ever ruined from without; the final ruin comes from within, when you turn hopeless and lose courage!
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: Ruin, eldest daughter of Zeus, she blinds us all, that fatal madness—she with those delicate feet of hers, never touching the earth, gliding over the heads of men to trap us all. She entangles one man, now another.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Falling into ruin was a bit like falling in love: Both descents stripped you bare and left you as you were at your core. And both endings are equally painful.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: You can ruin anything if you focus at it.
quotes.author: Aimee Bender

quotes.quote: We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: If a man has directed his course to great ends there is compensation even in ruin.
quotes.author: Arthur Alfred Lynch

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Sentiment without action is the ruin of the soul.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Don’t ruin your own happiness by letting someone’s wickedness hurt you.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: You can't change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Protect your good image from the eyes of negative viewers, who may look at your good appearance with an ugly fiendish eye, and ruin your positive qualities with their chemical infested tongues.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Worry is a progressive disease that ruins one’s life
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: How many different kinds of ruin do you have to see, before you resign yourself to calling it all 'ruin'?
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Ruins, for me, are the beginning. With the debris, you can construct new ideas. They are symbols of a beginning.
quotes.author: Anselm Kiefer

quotes.quote: To be silent when we are impelled to utter words injurious to God or to our neighbour, is an act of virtue; but, to be silent in confessing our sins, is the ruin of the soul.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: Routine ruins the life, variety vitalise the life.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Someday was the thing he had, because it was a lot harder to ruin than today.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: A thousand years may scare form a state. An hour may lay it in ruins.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Just because you're unhappy doesn't mean you have to ruin someone else's happiness too ...
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: How marriage ruins a man! It is as demoralizing as cigarettes, and far more expensive.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You can reconstruct the picture from chaos and memory's ruins.
quotes.author: Kay Boyle

quotes.quote: There are no rules for good photographs, there are only good photographs.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Rules are made for people who aren't willing to make up their own.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: Rules are, like an ashtray-in-progress, meant to be thrown, poked and reshaped to suit yourself.
quotes.author: Sara Genn

quotes.quote: Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: There are no rules, just really good advice.
quotes.author: Sandra Taylor Hedges

quotes.quote: There are no rules; we each have our own mind and way of working. Do exactly what you feel at the time.
quotes.author: Suzanne Partridge

quotes.quote: It is a good idea to obey all the rules when you're young just so you'll have the strength to break them when you're old.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Some rules are nothing but old habits that people are afraid to change.
quotes.author: Therese Anne Fowler

quotes.quote: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: If you follow the rules, it's your own fault.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The rules of wildlife are simple and clear, which is not the case for men.
quotes.author: Laurent Baheux

quotes.quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: In every society some men are born to rule, and some to advise.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A true ruler does not rule others, he rules himself.
quotes.author: Andrija Jonić

quotes.quote: If the rules make such a difference, then it becomes very important who gets to make them.
quotes.author: Abhijit V. Banerjee

quotes.quote: Rules are for the obedience of fools and the guidance of wise men.
quotes.author: Douglas Bader

quotes.quote: It's not wise to violate rules until you know how to observe them.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Rules are not necessarily sacred, principles are.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A man's life is about keeping rules, breaking them, and making new ones.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: A ruler isn't always straight.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Rules are a great way to get ideas. All you have to do is break them.
quotes.author: Jack Foster

quotes.quote: Sometimes breaking the rules is extending the rules.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Don't break the rules when you haven't fully figured them out yet.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: There is no rule on how to write. Sometimes it comes easily and perfectly; sometimes it's like drilling rock and then blasting it out with charges.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: He who reigns within himself and rules passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a misunderstood vitamin.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Liquor is not a necessity. It is a means of momentarily sidestepping necessity.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Drinking after work is fine, but if you really want to enjoy working then drink before work.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Candy is dandy, but liquor is quicker.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Because alcohol is encouraged by our culture, we get the idea that it isn't dangerous. However, alcohol is the most potent and most toxic of the legal psychoactive drugs.
quotes.author: Beverly A. Potter

quotes.quote: Rum is tonic that clarifies the vision, and sets things in true perspective.
quotes.author: Brian D'Ambrosio

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Liquor is the kiss of the angels as well as the curse of the devil. It can conceal but also can reveal.
quotes.author: Thrity Umrigar

quotes.quote: Drinking Rum before 10am makes you a Pirate, not an Alcoholic.
quotes.author: Earl Dibbles Jr.

quotes.quote: There's naught, no doubt, so much the spirit calms as rum and true religion.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a well documented pathological reaction to unresolved grief.
quotes.author: David Cook

quotes.quote: There are only two real ways to get ahead today - sell liquor or drink it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Liquor is one way out an' death's the other.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Rum, n. Generically, fiery liquors that produce madness in total abstainers.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Rum is a flatterer, making fools and lunatics.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Here's to alcohol, the cause of, and solution to, all life's problems.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: As an alcoholic, you will violate your standards quicker than you can lower them.
quotes.author: Robin Williamns

quotes.quote: Alcohol, taken in sufficient quantities, may produce all the effects of drunkenness.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It was a maddening image and the only way to whip it was to hang on until dusk and banish the ghosts with rum.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Liquor - you can make it illegal but you can't make it unpopular.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: A glass of beer shortens your life by one minute, a glass of wine by two minutes, and a day of work by seven to ten hours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Prohibition is better than no liquor at all.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Best ideas come while sipping rum.
quotes.author: Pavol Kazimir

quotes.quote: Its liquor is like the sweetest dew from Heaven.
quotes.author: Lu Yu

quotes.quote: Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Trying to squash a rumor is like trying to unring a bell.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: A rumor without a leg to stand on will get around some other way.
quotes.author: John Tudor

quotes.quote: Rumors generally grow deformed as they travel.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Rumors are like ripples in a cornfield. They are ephemeral, but they do indicate which way the wind is blowing.
quotes.author: Susan J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Those who feed on rumors are small, suspicious souls.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Rumors are mostly a projection of the individual who started them.
quotes.author: Roya R. Rad

quotes.quote: Rumors are like songbirds; they sound filling but make a poor feast.
quotes.author: W. Michael Gear

quotes.quote: Rumor grows as it goes.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Nothing is swifter than rumor.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Rumors are like a flame blown by the wind.
quotes.author: Nellie Nae Batson

quotes.quote: Rumors are the oldest form of mass media.
quotes.author: Jean-Noel Kapferer

quotes.quote: Rumors are like wildfire; you are burned up before you know it.
quotes.author: Kenneth D. Mcllroy

quotes.quote: Rumor travels faster, but it don't stay put as long as truth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: What you don't see with your eyes, don't witness with your mouth.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Foolishly play with the fires of rumor, only to risk being burned by its treacherous flames.
quotes.author: Josh Homme

quotes.quote: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Never make negative comments or spread rumors about anyone. It depreciates their reputation and yours.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You know what rumors are like like a jar full of moths. Once they escape, they're all over the place.
quotes.author: Rhys Bowen

quotes.quote: Always remember... Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Rumors are as dumb as the people who started them and as fake as the people who help spread them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Three may keep a secret, if two of them are dead.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Gossip is when you hear something you like about someone you don't.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Gossip is called gossip because it's not always the truth.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: Old rumors never die; nor do they fade away. They simply lay dormant for a while until the next appropriate time appears.
quotes.author: Terry Ann Knopf

quotes.quote: Buy the rumor, sell the fact.
quotes.author: Bob Wisner

quotes.quote: Rumors are not news; but they sometimes foreshadow news.
quotes.author: Ernest Hamlin Abbott

quotes.quote: Rumors, at times, can be more severe than the truth.
quotes.author: Fuwa Aika

quotes.quote: There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You have to wonder at times what you're doing out there. Over the years, I've given myself a thousand reasons to keep running, but it always comes back to where it started. It comes down to self-satisfaction and a sense of achievement.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: I always loved running...it was something you could do by yourself, and under your own power. You could go in any direction, fast or slow as you wanted, fighting the wind if you felt like it, seeking out new sights just on the strength of your feet and the courage of your lungs.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: In running, it doesn't matter whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, 'I have finished.' There is a lot of satisfaction in that.
quotes.author: Fred Lebow

quotes.quote: Running is the greatest metaphor for life, because you get out of it what you put into it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: If you run, you are a runner. It doesn't matter how fast or how far. It doesn't matter if today is your first day or if you've been running for twenty years. There is no test to pass, no license to earn, no membership card to get. You just run.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: Running should be a lifelong activity. Approach it patiently and intelligently, and it will reward you for a long, long time.
quotes.author: Michael Sargent

quotes.quote: Remember the feeling you get from a good run is far better than the feeling you get from sitting around wishing you were running.
quotes.author: Sarah Condor

quotes.quote: Running long and hard is an ideal antidepressant, since it's hard to run and feel sorry for yourself at the same time. Also, there are those hours of clearheadedness that follow along run.
quotes.author: Monte Davis

quotes.quote: Running! If there's any activity happier, more exhilarating, more nourishing to the imagination, I can't think of what it might be.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: We are designed to run and we increase our chance of daily happiness when we do so.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: In running, every step you make and every push forward changes you, it transforms you into a different person. Every single run adds something to you and then it also takes something away. You are not the same person you were at the starting line and by the time you cross the finish line, your inner self has been reinvented and reimagined.
quotes.author: Zen of Running

quotes.quote: Running is a road to self-awareness reliance-you can push yourself to extremes and learn the harsh reality of your physical and mental limitations or coast quietly down a solitary path watching the earth spin beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Doris Brown Heritage

quotes.quote: People sometimes sneer at those who run every day, claiming they'll go to any length to live longer. But don't think that's the reason most people run. Most runners run not because they want to live longer, but because they want to live life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: You would run much slower if you were dragging something behind you, like a knapsack or a sheriff.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Running is all about having the desire to train and persevere until every fiber in your legs, mind, and heart is turned to steel. And when you've finally forged hard enough, you will have become the best runner you can be. And that's all that you can ask for.
quotes.author: Paul Maurer

quotes.quote: I run because if I didn't, I'd be sluggish and glum and spend too much time on the couch. I run to breathe the fresh air. I run to explore. I run to escape the ordinary. I run'to savor the trip along the way. Life becomes a little more vibrant, a little more intense.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.quote: It was being a runner that mattered, not how fast or how far I could run. The joy was in the act of running and in the journey, not in the destination. We have a better chance of seeing where we are when we stop trying to get somewhere else.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: In long-distance running the only opponent you have to beat is yourself, the way you used to be.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I run because long after my footprints fade away, maybe I will have inspired a few to reject the easy path, hit the trails, put one foot in front of the other, and come to the same conclusion I did: I run because it always takes me where I want to go.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.quote: What I've learned from running is that the time to push hard is when you're hurting like crazy and you want to give up. Success is often just around the corner.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: There is something magical about running; after a certain distance, it transcends the body. Then a bit further, it transcends the mind. A bit further yet, and what you have before you, laid bare, is the soul.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: Running is not, as it so often seems, only about what you did in your last race or about how many miles you ran last week. It is, in a much more important way, about community, about appreciating all the miles run by other runners, too.
quotes.author: Richard O'Brien

quotes.quote: It's very hard in the beginning to understand that the whole idea is not to beat the other runners. Eventually you learn that the competition is against the little voice inside you that wants you to quit.
quotes.author: Dr George Sheehan

quotes.quote: Running is about more than just putting one foot in front of the other; it is about our lifestyle and who we are.
quotes.author: Joan Benoit Samuelson

quotes.quote: My feet have several thousand meetings scheduled with the dirt on a trail not far from here. Who am I to keep them waiting? Time to run.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: The difference between a jogger and a runner is an entry blank.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: Runners just do it - they run for the finish line even if someone else has reached it first.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Running isn't a sport for pretty boys. It's about the sweat in your hair and the blisters on your feet. Its the frozen spit on your chin and the nausea in your gut. It's about throbbing calves and cramps at midnight that are strong enough to wake the dead. It's about getting out the door and running when the rest of the world is only dreaming about having the passion that you need to live each and every day with.
quotes.author: Paul Maurer

quotes.quote: Running strips life back to the bare essentials. When we challenge ourselves, it breaks down barriers. It brings us back to our essence and peels away the layers of ego we surround ourselves with.
quotes.author: Grahak Cunningham

quotes.quote: The pride in finishing a marathon is much greater than all the pain endured during the marathon.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: Danger - if you meet it promptly and without flinching - you will reduce the danger by half. Never run away from anything. Never!
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can't run away from trouble. There ain't no place that far.
quotes.author: James Baskett

quotes.quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Running away from things you find unpleasant causes suffering. But facing and challenging such situations will enrich your life.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: Running away from the problem only increases the distance from the solution.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: If you define cowardice as running away at the first sign of danger, screaming and tripping and begging for mercy, then yes, Mr. Brave man, I guess I'm a coward.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Some have been thought brave because they didn't have the courage to run away.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Running away from your problems is a race you will never win, so just face them head on, and overcome them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Running away was easy; not knowing what to do next was the hard part.
quotes.author: Glenda Millard

quotes.quote: I do know this. It's the things we run from that hurt us the most. Brad Sturdevant
quotes.author: Kimberly McCreight

quotes.quote: What is needed, rather than running away or controlling or suppressing or any other resistance, is understanding fear; that means, watch it, learn about it, come directly into contact with it. We are to learn about fear, not how to escape from it.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Running away will never make you free.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You can't run away from trouble. There ain't no place that far.
quotes.author: Uncle Remus

quotes.quote: A good snapshot stops a moment from running away.
quotes.author: Eudora Weity

quotes.quote: I think I survived by running away some. Running away to work.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: I never got to the point when I felt like running away from it all.
quotes.author: Jamie Redknapp

quotes.quote: In a presidential campaign, you can't lie. You can't hide what you are and what you want. You can't hide what kind of President you'll be. You can't keep on talking about nothing indefinitely and committing to nothing, you can't keep running away from debate, masking the challenges.
quotes.author: Nicolas Sarkozy

quotes.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Running away from everything, can also be running toward something.
quotes.author: Julia Stamps

quotes.quote: The hardest part about walking away from you is knowing that you won't run after me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We run away all the time to avoid coming face to face with ourselves.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I don't run away from a challenge because I am afraid. Instead, I run towards it because the only way to escape fear is to trample it beneath your foot.
quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

quotes.quote: Running away from problems or troubles will make you fall into another problem or trouble.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great leadership does not mean running away from reality. Sometimes the hard truths might just demoralize the company, but at other times sharing difficulties can inspire people to take action that will make the situation better.
quotes.author: John Kotter

quotes.quote: Acceptance of one's life has nothing to do with resignation; it does not mean running away from the struggle. On the contrary, it means accepting it as it comes, with all the handicaps of heredity, of suffering, of psychological complexes and injustices.
quotes.author: Dr. Paul Tournier

quotes.quote: You're just running away. I'm moving forward. In a confrontation, a person who wants to help their comrades is stronger than the person who escapes.
quotes.author: Mirajane Strauss

quotes.quote: Running away will never make you free.
quotes.author: Kenny Logins

quotes.quote: Everyday is a fashion show and the world is the runway.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: When I walk down the runway, my main goal is to not think about the people watching. The idea of all eyes on me would make me too uncomfortable. As I step on the runway, I take a deep breath, focus on a point in the distance, and go!
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: Some of us have great runways already built for us. If you have one, take off. But if you don't have one, realize it is your responsibility to grab a shovel and build one for yourself and for those who will follow after you.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: A runway is spectacle. It’s only fashion when a woman puts it on.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: Downtown hanging around / Over and under in and out / Stanger now in a different town / We got the in and out / Take off the runway / Take off and go / Take off the runway / Take off and go
quotes.author: Roni Size

quotes.quote: Coming home when I see the runway lights / In the misty dawn the night is fading fast / Coming home, far away as their vapor trails align
quotes.author: Stephen Percy

quotes.quote: Glide down the runway / In style In style / Glass but she won't break / Steals what she won't take / All eyes All eyes / Are watching
quotes.author: Jackson Jackson

quotes.quote: Used to make hard, make it look easy / Take the top back and make it look Jeezy / Two double cups make it look Weezy / Too much shrimp got me lookin' queasy / That's how I'm feelin' on the runway (the runway)
quotes.author: Tauheed Epps

quotes.quote: Lord knows I got a job to do / I just can't wait until it's through / I keep dreaming bout that home bound flight / Looking for those runway lights.
quotes.author: Josh Kear

quotes.quote: Flight of love-thought / Lands only on the heart-runway / Such thought also flies / In my mind / But unfortunately, / I cannot locate that runway / For stable and secure landing.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Life is a runway. You get to choose how you walk that runway from beginning to end.
quotes.author: Charleston Pierce

quotes.quote: Through their body language, they have look and act like they own the runway. With practice, they have confidence to do just that.
quotes.author: Charleston Pierce

quotes.quote: During the runway show there is a huge deliberation, far more than most people realize.
quotes.author: Tim Gunn

quotes.quote: Take off in the runway of life--you would realize every time you pursue and achieve dreams, happiness is not by-product; instead it is an accompanying process, making the cruise worthy!
quotes.author: Udayakumar Gopalakrishnan

quotes.quote: Is the wind blowing so hard that you can't get on the runway of life because it's too scary, cloudy, or windy? Sometimes life's problems can get out of control and overbearing, but they don't have to prevent you from moving toward a more productive life.
quotes.author: Robert Jones

quotes.quote: Keep going' and I did. It was smooth as I looked up and saw one line of runway lights.
quotes.author: David William Sinclair

quotes.quote: Are you ready for the runway? Brace yourself, because you may be taking off sooner than you think.
quotes.author: Robert Jones

quotes.quote: Never,ever confuse what happens on a runway with fashion. A runway is spectacle. It's only fashion when a woman puts it on. Being well dressed hasn't much to do with having good clothes. It's a question of good balance and good common sense.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: The runway isn't just about showing fashion, it's about gaining confidence.
quotes.author: Ashley Graham

quotes.quote: Shorten the runway and you have fewer takeoffs and landings, shorten the runway and you enhance safety and reduce the noise.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: The runway symbolizes something in society that's very intimidating to women.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: A runway is spectacle. It's only fashion when a woman puts it on.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: If the whole world is in a rush and people are out of step with themselves, they fail to catch that quirky aura and that special quality of life that feeds our soul-searching frame of mind and that builds a coveted haven, giving recognition and self-reliance.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: It is more important to go slow and gain the lessons you need along the journey then to rush the process and arrive at your destination empty.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Life could always be in a hurry, you run for it or you run from it.
quotes.author: Jinnul Jr

quotes.quote: Too much hurry will bury your goals. Too much haste will make you waste. Too quick race will cripple your pace. Be patient.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Are you aware that rushing toward a goal is a sublimated death wish? It's no coincidence we call them 'deadlines.'
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Nature never rushes, yet everything gets done.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Why do we hurry? For they who hurry through life are hastening the tomb. It doesn't pay. Take time sufficient for everything you do. Take time to eat properly. Take time to rest and play. Take time for politeness. Take time to pass over the road of life — and if you fail and fall among the rocks, arise again and struggle on; let not hurry nor worry divert you from your path. Study your nature. You will be healthy, happy and successful.
quotes.author: Lilla D. Windsor

quotes.quote: Once you stop rushing through life, you will be amazed how much more life you have time for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One of the great illusions of our time is that hurrying will buy us more time.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Life hurrying past us and running away, too strong to stop, too sweet to lose.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: The feeling of being hurried is not usually the result of living a full life and having no time. It is, rather, born of a vague fear that we are wasting our life.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: No reason for a feverish rush For we will all arrive in the same place At the right time. Justice will be served. There will be no better or worse, No big and small, no rewards, no punishment, No guilt, no judges, no hierarchies; Only silent equality.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Don’t rush your healing, don’t pretend to be okay when you’re not and don’t apologize for being broken.
quotes.author: Lizelle Gutierrez

quotes.quote: Do not rush in the ride of life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Time appears to rush by without any concern for its impact upon you.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Wisely and slowly; they stumble that run fast.
quotes.author: Hugh Howey

quotes.quote: Don't rush in order to have things done early. Be prepared before you set off. That's the rule. However, this does not mean that you keep delaying the time for beginning. You must begin by all means! Go, get prepared!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: There is no need to rush in life. Just with one word at a time, your sweet life history will be written boldly in capitals and highlighted for easy access. Be sure you are passing the test of patience!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Nothing good ever comes out of hurry and frustration, only misery.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: The best things are never arrived at in haste. God is in no hurry, His plans are never rushed.
quotes.author: Michael R. Phillips

quotes.quote: If you must be in a hurry, then let it be according to the old adage, and hasten slowly.
quotes.author: Saint Vincent de Paul

quotes.quote: He is invariably in a hurry. Being in a hurry is one of the tributes he pays to life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: Whoever is in a hurry shows that the thing he is about is too big for him.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: No matter how you hurry, you will notice at the end of the day that you traveled at the speed of time.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: We have to slow the rhythm of rush in our lives so that the best of who are can emerge.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Hurrying and delaying are alike ways of trying to resist the present.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Learn diligence before speedy execution
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: You are hurrying to the sweet place, To the nonsense chasing your spirit And in the nonsense you look for answers.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Quality and perfection are achieved with time. You do not create a perfect painting or a perfect poem by hurrying. Time is always coming.
quotes.author: Satish Kumar

quotes.quote: Let us not go hurrying about and collecting honey, bee-like buzzing here and there for a knowledge of what is not to be arrived at, but let us open our leaves like a flower, and be passive and receptive, budding patiently under the eye of Apollo, and taking hints from every noble insect that favors us with a visit - sap will be given us for meat and dew for drink.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Don't try to rush things that need time to grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Slow down. Rushing means you miss what's right here.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great and unexpected successes are often the cause of foolish rushing into acts of extravagance.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Are you aware that rushing toward a goal is a sublimated death wish? It's no coincidence we call them 'deadlines.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Don't be in such a rush to reach a goal, that you reach the goal before you are ready. Sometimes, we learn such valuable lessons along the way. Sometimes, we learn more about ourselves and discover that we actually want something different. Put your heart into what you do, but don't rush. Good things take time.
quotes.author: Akiroq Brost

quotes.quote: We hurry over the road that stretches from childhood to maturity only to discover that its most beautiful scenery escaped our vision.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Everywhere, people are discovering that doing things more slowly often means doing them better and enjoying them more. It means living life instead of rushing through it. You can apply this to everything from food to parenting to work.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.quote: Rushing around smartly is no proof of accomplishing much.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Better start rushing before the rush begins!
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Rushing into action, you fail. Trying to grasp things, you lose them. Forcing a project to completion, you ruin what was almost ripe.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: It is more important to go slow and gain the lessons you need along the journey then to rush the process and arrive at your destination empty.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Wisely and slow; they stumble that run fast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Unreasonable haste is the direct road to error.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: While you'll feel compelled to charge forward it's often a gentle step back that will reveal to you where you and what you truly seek.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: There are some things that are just not worth rushing, especially something that you wish would last forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As the years go on a sense of deep patience comes over one; one seems to know the virtue of ripeness, and the danger of rushing events.
quotes.author: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.quote: When you hurry, you're more apt to make mistakes. But you have to be quick. If you're not quick you can't get things done.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Take time for deliberation. Haste spoils everything.
quotes.author: Statius

quotes.quote: How quick and rushing life can sometimes seem, when at the same time it's so slow and sweet and everlasting.
quotes.author: Graham Swift

quotes.quote: You have to know why you're rushing about. It's OK to rush about but it's important to know what's driving you, the positives of it and the negatives of it.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Nothing good ever comes out of hurry and frustration, only misery.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: No matter how you hurry, you will notice at the end of the day that you traveled at the speed of time.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Hasty and adventurous schemes are at first view flattering, in execution difficult, and in the issue disastrous.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: Rushing never saved the time that planning did.
quotes.author: Ben Parris

quotes.quote: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.
quotes.author: Earl Monroe

quotes.quote: Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When 'being rushed' is the problem . . . Rushing is never the solution.
quotes.author: Bill Crawford

quotes.quote: There is no need to rush in life. Just with one word at a time, your sweet life history will be written boldly in capitals and highlighted for easy access. Be sure you are passing the test of patience!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
quotes.author: St Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: One can only see clearly if one is going slowly. Quick motion creates a life-blur.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Most people rust out due to lack of challenge. Few people rust out due to overuse.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: In an age of rust, she comes up stainless steel.
quotes.author: M.R. Carey

quotes.quote: The rust of the mind is the destruction of genius.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Just as rust, which arose from the iron itself, wears out the iron, likewise, performing an action without examination would destroy us by projecting us into a negative state of existence.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you rest, you rust.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: It is better to rust out than wear out.
quotes.author: Richard Cumberland

quotes.quote: As rust corrupts iron, so envy corrupts man.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: The rust of business is sometimes polished off in a camp; but never in a court.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Negligence is the rust of the soul that corrodes through all her best resolves.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Solitude may rust your words.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Idleness is to the human mind like rust to iron.
quotes.author: Ezra Cornell

quotes.quote: Negligence is the rust of the soul, that corrodes through all her best resolves.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Gold does not rust on the ground, and rocks don't get soaked in the rain.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Worry... is rust upon the blade.
quotes.author: Simon Hughes

quotes.quote: Few minds wear out; more rust out.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Sorrow is the mere rust of the soul. Activity will cleanse and brighten it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Great talents, by the rust of long disuse, Grow lethargic and shrink from what they were.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Just as iron rusts from disuse, even so does inaction spoil the intellect.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci
